GE09ram_05_u:6: 5.001.003a dvijān vitrāsayan dhīmān urasā pādapān haran
GE09ram_05_u:7: 5.001.003c mṛgāṃś ca subahūn nighnan pravṛddha iva kesarī
GE09ram_05_u:13: 5.001.006c tiṣṭhan kapivaras tatra hrade nāga ivābabhau
GE09ram_05_u:15: 5.001.007c bhūtebhyaś cāñjaliṃ kṛtvā cakāra gamane matim
GE09ram_05_u:17: 5.001.008c tato hi vavṛdhe gantuṃ dakṣiṇo dakṣiṇāṃ diśam
GE09ram_05_u:21: 5.001.010c bāhubhyāṃ pīḍayām āsa caraṇābhyāṃ ca parvatam
GE09ram_05_u:25: 5.001.012c sarvataḥ saṃvṛtaḥ śailo babhau puṣpamayo yathā
GE09ram_05_u:27: 5.001.013c salilaṃ saṃprasusrāva madaṃ matta iva dvipaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:28: 5.001.014a pīḍyamānas tu balinā mahendras tena parvataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:30: 5.001.014e mumoca ca śilāḥ śailo viśālāḥ samanaḥśilāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:34: 5.001.016c pṛthivīṃ pūrayām āsa diśaś copavanāni ca
GE09ram_05_u:36: 5.001.017c vamantaḥ pāvakaṃ ghoraṃ dadaṃśur daśanaiḥ śilāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:37: 5.001.018a tās tadā saviṣair daṣṭāḥ kupitais tair mahāśilāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:40: 5.001.019c viṣaghnāny api nāgānāṃ na śekuḥ śamituṃ viṣam
GE09ram_05_u:41: 5.001.020a bhidyate 'yaṃ girir bhūtair iti matvā tapasvinaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:42: 5.001.020c trastā vidyādharās tasmād utpetuḥ strīgaṇaiḥ saha
GE09ram_05_u:44: 5.001.021c pātrāṇi ca mahārhāṇi karakāṃś ca hiraṇmayān
GE09ram_05_u:45: 5.001.022a lehyān uccāvacān bhakṣyān māṃsāni vividhāni ca
GE09ram_05_u:46: 5.001.022c ārṣabhāṇi ca carmāṇi khaḍgāṃś ca kanakatsarūn
GE09ram_05_u:50: 5.001.024c vismitāḥ sasmitās tasthur ākāśe ramaṇaiḥ saha
GE09ram_05_u:52: 5.001.025c sahitās tasthur ākāśe vīkṣāṃ cakruś ca parvatam
GE09ram_05_u:53: 5.001.026a śuśruvuś ca tadā śabdam ṛṣīṇāṃ bhāvitātmanām
GE09ram_05_u:57: 5.001.028a rāmārthaṃ vānarārthaṃ ca cikīrṣan karma duṣkaram
GE09ram_05_u:58: 5.001.028c samudrasya paraṃ pāraṃ duṣprāpaṃ prāptum icchati
GE09ram_05_u:59: 5.001.029a dudhuve ca sa romāṇi cakampe cācalopamaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:60: 5.001.029c nanāda ca mahānādaṃ sumahān iva toyadaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:61: 5.001.030a ānupūrvyāc ca vṛttaṃ ca lāṅgūlaṃ romabhiś citam
GE09ram_05_u:66: 5.001.032c sasāda ca kapiḥ kaṭyāṃ caraṇau saṃcukopa ca
GE09ram_05_u:67: 5.001.033a saṃhṛtya ca bhujau śrīmāṃs tathaiva ca śirodharām
GE09ram_05_u:68: 5.001.033c tejaḥ sattvaṃ tathā vīryam āviveśa sa vīryavān
GE09ram_05_u:71: 5.001.035a padbhyāṃ dṛḍham avasthānaṃ kṛtvā sa kapikuñjaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:76: 5.001.037a na hi drakṣyāmi yadi tāṃ laṅkāyāṃ janakātmajām
GE09ram_05_u:78: 5.001.038a yadi vā tridive sītāṃ na drakṣyāmi kṛtaśramaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:82: 5.001.040a evam uktvā tu hanumān vānarān vānarottamaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:84: 5.001.041a samutpatati tasmiṃs tu vegāt te nagarohiṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:89: 5.001.043c prasthitaṃ dīrgham adhvānaṃ svabandhum iva bāndhavāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:98: 5.001.048a vimuktās tasya vegena muktvā puṣpāṇi te drumāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:108: 5.001.053a pibann iva babhau cāpi sormijālaṃ mahārṇavam
GE09ram_05_u:109: 5.001.053c pipāsur iva cākāśaṃ dadṛśe sa mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:114: 5.001.056a mukhaṃ nāsikayā tasya tāmrayā tāmram ābabhau
GE09ram_05_u:124: 5.001.061a khe yathā nipataty ulkā uttarāntād viniḥsṛtā
GE09ram_05_u:125: 5.001.061c dṛśyate sānubandhā ca tathā sa kapikuñjaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:129: 5.001.063c sāgare mārutāviṣṭā naur ivāsīt tadā kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:130: 5.001.064a yaṃ yaṃ deśaṃ samudrasya jagāma sa mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:131: 5.001.064c sa sa tasyāṅgavegena sonmāda iva lakṣyate
GE09ram_05_u:133: 5.001.065c abhighnaṃs tu mahāvegaḥ pupluve sa mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:134: 5.001.066a kapivātaś ca balavān meghavātaś ca niḥsṛtaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:139: 5.001.068c vyomni taṃ kapiśārdūlaṃ suparṇam iti menire
GE09ram_05_u:143: 5.001.070c tasya sā śuśubhe chāyā vitatā lavaṇāmbhasi
GE09ram_05_u:144: 5.001.071a plavamānaṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā plavagaṃ tvaritaṃ tadā
GE09ram_05_u:146: 5.001.072a tatāpa na hi taṃ sūryaḥ plavantaṃ vānareśvaram
GE09ram_05_u:150: 5.001.074a nāgāś ca tuṣṭuvur yakṣā rakṣāṃsi vibudhāḥ khagāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:158: 5.001.078a tathā mayā vidhātavyaṃ viśrameta yathā kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:160: 5.001.079a iti kṛtvā matiṃ sādhvīṃ samudraś channam ambhasi
GE09ram_05_u:166: 5.001.082a tiryag ūrdhvam adhaś caiva śaktis te śailavardhitum
GE09ram_05_u:168: 5.001.083a sa eṣa kapiśārdūlas tvām uparyeti vīryavān
GE09ram_05_u:171: 5.001.084c mama ikṣvākavaḥ pūjyāḥ paraṃ pūjyatamās tava
GE09ram_05_u:172: 5.001.085a kuru sācivyam asmākaṃ na naḥ kāryam atikramet
GE09ram_05_u:173: 5.001.085c kartavyam akṛtaṃ kāryaṃ satāṃ manyum udīrayet
GE09ram_05_u:174: 5.001.086a salilād ūrdhvam uttiṣṭha tiṣṭhatv eṣa kapis tvayi
GE09ram_05_u:175: 5.001.086c asmākam atithiś caiva pūjyaś ca plavatāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:177: 5.001.087c hanūmāṃs tvayi viśrāntas tataḥ śeṣaṃ gamiṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:190: 5.001.094a tam utthitam asaṃgena hanūmān agrataḥ sthitam
GE09ram_05_u:192: 5.001.095a sa tam ucchritam atyarthaṃ mahāvego mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:193: 5.001.095c urasā pātayām āsa jīmūtam iva mārutaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:194: 5.001.096a sa tadā pātitas tena kapinā parvatottamaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:195: 5.001.096c buddhvā tasya kaper vegaṃ jaharṣa ca nananda ca
GE09ram_05_u:197: 5.001.097c prīto hṛṣṭamanā vākyam abravīt parvataḥ kapim
GE09ram_05_u:198: 5.001.097e mānuṣaṃ dharayan rūpam ātmanaḥ śikhare sthitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:199: 5.001.098a duṣkaraṃ kṛtavān karma tvam idaṃ vānarottama
GE09ram_05_u:202: 5.001.099c sa tvāṃ rāmahite yuktaṃ pratyarcayati sāgaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:203: 5.001.100a kṛte ca pratikartavyam eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:204: 5.001.100c so 'yaṃ tat pratikārārthī tvattaḥ saṃmānam arhati
GE09ram_05_u:206: 5.001.101c yojanānāṃ śataṃ cāpi kapir eṣa samāplutaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:207: 5.001.101e tava sānuṣu viśrāntaḥ śeṣaṃ prakramatām iti
GE09ram_05_u:208: 5.001.102a tiṣṭha tvaṃ hariśārdūla mayi viśramya gamyatām
GE09ram_05_u:209: 5.001.102c tad idaṃ gandhavat svādu kandamūlaphalaṃ bahu
GE09ram_05_u:211: 5.001.103a asmākam api saṃbandhaḥ kapimukhyas tvayāsti vai
GE09ram_05_u:214: 5.001.104c teṣāṃ mukhyatamaṃ manye tvām ahaṃ kapikuñjara
GE09ram_05_u:216: 5.001.105c dharmaṃ jijñāsamānena kiṃ punar yādṛśo bhavān
GE09ram_05_u:219: 5.001.107a pūjite tvayi dharmajña pūjāṃ prāpnoti mārutaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:220: 5.001.107c tasmāt tvaṃ pūjanīyo me śṛṇu cāpy atra kāraṇam
GE09ram_05_u:224: 5.001.109c bhūtāni ca bhayaṃ jagmus teṣāṃ patanaśaṅkayā
GE09ram_05_u:226: 5.001.110c pakṣāṃś ciccheda vajreṇa tatra tatra sahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:227: 5.001.111a sa mām upagataḥ kruddho vajram udyamya devarāṭ
GE09ram_05_u:231: 5.001.113a tato 'haṃ mānayāmi tvāṃ mānyo hi mama mārutaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:232: 5.001.113c tvayā me hy eṣa saṃbandhaḥ kapimukhya mahāguṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:233: 5.001.114a asminn evaṃgate kārye sāgarasya mamaiva ca
GE09ram_05_u:234: 5.001.114c prītiṃ prītamanā kartuṃ tvam arhasi mahākape
GE09ram_05_u:235: 5.001.115a śramaṃ mokṣaya pūjāṃ ca gṛhāṇa kapisattama
GE09ram_05_u:236: 5.001.115c prītiṃ ca bahumanyasva prīto 'smi tava darśanāt
GE09ram_05_u:237: 5.001.116a evam uktaḥ kapiśreṣṭhas taṃ nagottamam abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:239: 5.001.117a tvarate kāryakālo me ahaś cāpy ativartate
GE09ram_05_u:240: 5.001.117c pratijñā ca mayā dattā na sthātavyam ihāntarā
GE09ram_05_u:241: 5.001.118a ity uktvā pāṇinā śailam ālabhya haripuṃgavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:247: 5.001.121a bhūyaś cordhvagatiṃ prāpya giriṃ tam avalokayan
GE09ram_05_u:249: 5.001.122a tad dvitīyaṃ hanumato dṛṣṭvā karma suduṣkaram
GE09ram_05_u:250: 5.001.122c praśaśaṃsuḥ surāḥ sarve siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:251: 5.001.123a devatāś cābhavan hṛṣṭās tatrasthās tasya karmaṇā
GE09ram_05_u:256: 5.001.125c abhayaṃ te prayacchāmi tiṣṭha saumya yathāsukham
GE09ram_05_u:257: 5.001.126a sāhyaṃ kṛtaṃ te sumahad vikrāntasya hanūmataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:259: 5.001.127a rāmasyaiṣa hi dautyena yāti dāśarather hariḥ
GE09ram_05_u:260: 5.001.127c satkriyāṃ kurvatā śakyā toṣito 'smi dṛḍhaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_05_u:263: 5.001.129a sa vai dattavaraḥ śailo babhūvāvasthitas tadā
GE09ram_05_u:265: 5.001.130a tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:268: 5.001.131c hanūmān nāma tasya tvaṃ muhūrtaṃ vighnam ācara
GE09ram_05_u:271: 5.001.133a balam icchāmahe jñātuṃ bhūyaś cāsya parākramam
GE09ram_05_u:272: 5.001.133c tvāṃ vijeṣyaty upāyena viṣadaṃ vā gamiṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:273: 5.001.134a evam uktā tu sā devī daivatair abhisatkṛtā
GE09ram_05_u:275: 5.001.135a vikṛtaṃ ca virūpaṃ ca sarvasya ca bhayāvaham
GE09ram_05_u:277: 5.001.136a mama bhakṣaḥ pradiṣṭas tvam īśvarair vānararṣabha
GE09ram_05_u:282: 5.001.138c lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā vaidehyā cāpi bhāryayā
GE09ram_05_u:284: 5.001.139c tasya sītā hṛtā bhāryā rāvaṇena yaśasvinī
GE09ram_05_u:287: 5.001.141a atha vā maithilīṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmaṃ cākliṣṭakāriṇam
GE09ram_05_u:288: 5.001.141c āgamiṣyāmi te vaktraṃ satyaṃ pratiśṛṇomi te
GE09ram_05_u:290: 5.001.142c abravīn nātivarten māṃ kaś cid eṣa varo mama
GE09ram_05_u:292: 5.001.143c abravīt kuru vai vaktraṃ yena māṃ viṣahiṣyase
GE09ram_05_u:293: 5.001.144a ity uktvā surasāṃ kruddho daśayojanam āyataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:297: 5.001.146a hanumāṃs tu tataḥ kruddhas triṃśadyojanam āyataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:305: 5.001.150a tad dṛṣṭvā vyāditaṃ tv āsyaṃ vāyuputraḥ sa buddhimān
GE09ram_05_u:307: 5.001.151a sa saṃkṣipyātmanaḥ kāyaṃ jīmūta iva mārutiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:309: 5.001.152a so 'bhipatyāśu tad vaktraṃ niṣpatya ca mahājavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:310: 5.001.152c antarikṣe sthitaḥ śrīmān idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:311: 5.001.153a praviṣṭo 'smi hi te vaktraṃ dākṣāyaṇi namo 'stu te
GE09ram_05_u:312: 5.001.153c gamiṣye yatra vaidehī satyaṃ cāstu vacas tava
GE09ram_05_u:313: 5.001.154a taṃ dṛṣṭvā vadanān muktaṃ candraṃ rāhumukhād iva
GE09ram_05_u:314: 5.001.154c abravīt surasā devī svena rūpeṇa vānaram
GE09ram_05_u:317: 5.001.156a tat tṛtīyaṃ hanumato dṛṣṭvā karma suduṣkaram
GE09ram_05_u:318: 5.001.156c sādhu sādhv iti bhūtāni praśaśaṃsus tadā harim
GE09ram_05_u:335: 5.001.165a praviśann abhrajālāni niṣpataṃś ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:337: 5.001.166a plavamānaṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā siṃhikā nāma rākṣasī
GE09ram_05_u:339: 5.001.167a adya dīrghasya kālasya bhaviṣyāmy aham āśitā
GE09ram_05_u:340: 5.001.167c idaṃ hi me mahat sattvaṃ cirasya vaśam āgatam
GE09ram_05_u:341: 5.001.168a iti saṃcintya manasā chāyām asya samakṣipat
GE09ram_05_u:345: 5.001.170a tiryag ūrdhvam adhaś caiva vīkṣamāṇas tataḥ kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:348: 5.001.171c chāyāgrāhi mahāvīryaṃ tad idaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:349: 5.001.172a sa tāṃ buddhvārthatattvena siṃhikāṃ matimān kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:351: 5.001.173a tasya sā kāyam udvīkṣya vardhamānaṃ mahākapeḥ
GE09ram_05_u:353: 5.001.174a sa dadarśa tatas tasyā vikṛtaṃ sumahan mukham
GE09ram_05_u:354: 5.001.174c kāyamātraṃ ca medhāvī marmāṇi ca mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:355: 5.001.175a sa tasyā vivṛte vaktre vajrasaṃhananaḥ kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:358: 5.001.176c grasyamānaṃ yathā candraṃ pūrṇaṃ parvaṇi rāhuṇā
GE09ram_05_u:359: 5.001.177a tatas tasya nakhais tīkṣṇair marmāṇy utkṛtya vānaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:361: 5.001.178a tāṃ hatāṃ vānareṇāśu patitāṃ vīkṣya siṃhikām
GE09ram_05_u:363: 5.001.179a bhīmam adya kṛtaṃ karma mahat sattvaṃ tvayā hatam
GE09ram_05_u:365: 5.001.180a yasya tv etāni catvāri vānarendra yathā tava
GE09ram_05_u:366: 5.001.180c dhṛtir dṛṣṭir matir dākṣyaṃ sa karmasu na sīdati
GE09ram_05_u:374: 5.001.184c sāgarasya ca patnīnāṃ mukhāny api vilokayan
GE09ram_05_u:377: 5.001.186a kāyavṛddhiṃ pravegaṃ ca mama dṛṣṭvaiva rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:378: 5.001.186c mayi kautūhalaṃ kuryur iti mene mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:394: 5.002.001c trikūṭaśikhare laṅkāṃ sthitāṃ svastho dadarśa ha
GE09ram_05_u:396: 5.002.002c abhivṛṣṭaḥ sthitas tatra babhau puṣpamayo yathā
GE09ram_05_u:398: 5.002.003c aniśvasan kapis tatra na glānim adhigacchati
GE09ram_05_u:399: 5.002.004a śatāny ahaṃ yojanānāṃ krameyaṃ subahūny api
GE09ram_05_u:401: 5.002.005a sa tu vīryavatāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ plavatām api cottamaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:403: 5.002.006a śādvalāni ca nīlāni gandhavanti vanāni ca
GE09ram_05_u:404: 5.002.006c gaṇḍavanti ca madhyena jagāma nagavanti ca
GE09ram_05_u:405: 5.002.007a śailāṃś ca tarusaṃchannān vanarājīś ca puṣpitāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:407: 5.002.008a sa tasminn acale tiṣṭhan vanāny upavanāni ca
GE09ram_05_u:408: 5.002.008c sa nagāgre ca tāṃ laṅkāṃ dadarśa pavanātmajaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:409: 5.002.009a saralān karṇikārāṃś ca kharjūrāṃś ca supuṣpitān
GE09ram_05_u:410: 5.002.009c priyālān muculindāṃś ca kuṭajān ketakān api
GE09ram_05_u:411: 5.002.010a priyaṅgūn gandhapūrṇāṃś ca nīpān saptacchadāṃs tathā
GE09ram_05_u:412: 5.002.010c asanān kovidārāṃś ca karavīrāṃś ca puṣpitān
GE09ram_05_u:416: 5.002.012c ākrīḍān vividhān ramyān vividhāṃś ca jalāśayān
GE09ram_05_u:426: 5.002.017c dadarśa hanumāṃl laṅkāṃ divi devapurīm iva
GE09ram_05_u:427: 5.002.018a girimūrdhni sthitāṃ laṅkāṃ pāṇḍurair bhavanaiḥ śubhaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:428: 5.002.018c dadarśa sa kapiḥ śrīmān puram ākāśagaṃ yathā
GE09ram_05_u:431: 5.002.020a saṃpūrṇāṃ rākṣasair ghorair nāgair bhogavatīm iva
GE09ram_05_u:434: 5.002.021c rakṣitāṃ rākṣasair ghorair guhām āśīviṣair api
GE09ram_05_u:437: 5.002.023a dvāram uttaram āsādya cintayām āsa vānaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:440: 5.002.024a tasyāś ca mahatīṃ guptiṃ sāgaraṃ ca nirīkṣya saḥ
GE09ram_05_u:441: 5.002.024c rāvaṇaṃ ca ripuṃ ghoraṃ cintayām āsa vānaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:443: 5.002.025c na hi yuddhena vai laṅkā śakyā jetuṃ surair api
GE09ram_05_u:444: 5.002.026a imāṃ tu viṣamāṃ durgāṃ laṅkāṃ rāvaṇapālitām
GE09ram_05_u:445: 5.002.026c prāpyāpi sa mahābāhuḥ kiṃ kariṣyati rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:447: 5.002.027c na dānasya na bhedasya naiva yuddhasya dṛśyate
GE09ram_05_u:448: 5.002.028a caturṇām eva hi gatir vānarāṇāṃ mahātmanām
GE09ram_05_u:449: 5.002.028c vāliputrasya nīlasya mama rājñaś ca dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:450: 5.002.029a yāvaj jānāmi vaidehīṃ yadi jīvati vā na vā
GE09ram_05_u:452: 5.002.030a tataḥ sa cintayām āsa muhūrtaṃ kapikuñjaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:454: 5.002.031a anena rūpeṇa mayā na śakyā rakṣasāṃ purī
GE09ram_05_u:458: 5.002.033a lakṣyālakṣyeṇa rūpeṇa rātrau laṅkā purī mayā
GE09ram_05_u:459: 5.002.033c praveṣṭuṃ prāptakālaṃ me kṛtyaṃ sādhayituṃ mahat
GE09ram_05_u:460: 5.002.034a tāṃ purīṃ tādṛśīṃ dṛṣṭvā durādharṣāṃ surāsuraiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:461: 5.002.034c hanūmāṃś cintayām āsa viniḥśvasya muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_05_u:464: 5.002.036a na vinaśyet kathaṃ kāryaṃ rāmasya viditātmanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:465: 5.002.036c ekām ekaś ca paśyeyaṃ rahite janakātmajām
GE09ram_05_u:467: 5.002.037c viklavaṃ dūtam āsādya tamaḥ sūryodaye yathā
GE09ram_05_u:470: 5.002.039a na vinaśyet kathaṃ kāryaṃ vaiklavyaṃ na kathaṃ bhavet
GE09ram_05_u:471: 5.002.039c laṅghanaṃ ca samudrasya kathaṃ nu na vṛthā bhavet
GE09ram_05_u:472: 5.002.040a mayi dṛṣṭe tu rakṣobhī rāmasya viditātmanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:473: 5.002.040c bhaved vyartham idaṃ kāryaṃ rāvaṇānartham icchataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:474: 5.002.041a na hi śakyaṃ kva cit sthātum avijñātena rākṣasaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:475: 5.002.041c api rākṣasarūpeṇa kim utānyena kena cit
GE09ram_05_u:476: 5.002.042a vāyur apy atra nājñātaś cared iti matir mama
GE09ram_05_u:477: 5.002.042c na hy asty aviditaṃ kiṃ cid rākṣasānāṃ balīyasām
GE09ram_05_u:478: 5.002.043a ihāhaṃ yadi tiṣṭhāmi svena rūpeṇa saṃvṛtaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:479: 5.002.043c vināśam upayāsyāmi bhartur arthaś ca hīyate
GE09ram_05_u:480: 5.002.044a tad ahaṃ svena rūpeṇa rajanyāṃ hrasvatāṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:494: 5.002.050c talaiḥ śuśubhire tāni bhavanāny atra rakṣasām
GE09ram_05_u:498: 5.002.052c āsīd viṣaṇṇo hṛṣṭaś ca vaidehyā darśanotsukaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:534: 5.003.012c kham ivotpatitāṃ laṅkāṃ jaharṣa hanumān kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:535: 5.003.013a tāṃ samīkṣya purīṃ laṅkāṃ rākṣasādhipateḥ śubhām
GE09ram_05_u:537: 5.003.014a neyam anyena nagarī śakyā dharṣayituṃ balāt
GE09ram_05_u:542: 5.003.016c ṛkṣasya ketumālasya mama caiva gatir bhavet
GE09ram_05_u:544: 5.003.017c lakṣmaṇasya ca vikrāntam abhavat prītimān kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:547: 5.003.019a tāṃ naṣṭatimirāṃ dīpair bhāsvaraiś ca mahāgṛhaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:553: 5.003.021e gṛhamedhaiḥ purī ramyā babhāse dyaur ivāmbudaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:558: 5.003.023c rāghavārthaṃ carañ śrīmān dadarśa ca nananda ca
GE09ram_05_u:563: 5.003.025e āsphoṭitaninādāṃś ca kṣveḍitāṃś ca tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:564: 5.003.026a svādhyāya niratāṃś caiva yātudhānān dadarśa saḥ
GE09ram_05_u:567: 5.003.027c dadarśa madhyame gulme rākṣasasya carān bahūn
GE09ram_05_u:572: 5.003.030a karālān bhugnavaktrāṃś ca vikaṭān vāmanāṃs tathā
GE09ram_05_u:576: 5.003.031c virūpān bahurūpāṃś ca surūpāṃś ca suvarcasaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:585: 5.003.036a rathair yānair vimānaiś ca tathā gajahayaiḥ śubhaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:637: 5.004.013a nananda dṛṣṭvā sa ca tān surūpān;
GE09ram_05_u:640: dadarśa kāṃś cic ca punar virūpān
GE09ram_05_u:689: 5.005.003a rakṣitaṃ rākṣasair bhīmaiḥ siṃhair iva mahad vanam
GE09ram_05_u:692: 5.005.004c vicitrābhiś ca kakṣyābhir dvāraiś ca rucirair vṛtam
GE09ram_05_u:696: 5.005.006c ghoṣavadbhir vicitraiś ca sadā vicaritaṃ rathaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:699: 5.005.008a dṛśyaiś ca paramodārais tais taiś ca mṛgapakṣibhiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:701: 5.005.009a vinītair antapālaiś ca rakṣobhiś ca surakṣitam
GE09ram_05_u:708: 5.005.012c samudram iva gambhīraṃ samudram iva niḥsvanam
GE09ram_05_u:713: 5.005.015a gṛhād gṛhaṃ rākṣasānām udyānāni ca vānaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:714: 5.005.015c vīkṣamāṇo hy asaṃtrastaḥ prāsādāṃś ca cacāra saḥ
GE09ram_05_u:718: 5.005.017c vibhīṣaṇasya ca tathā pupluve sa mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:719: 5.005.018a mahodarasya ca tathā virūpākṣasya caiva hi
GE09ram_05_u:721: 5.005.018e vajradaṃṣṭrasya ca tathā pupluve sa mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:722: 5.005.019a śukasya ca mahāvegaḥ sāraṇasya ca dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:725: 5.005.020c raśmiketoś ca bhavanaṃ sūryaśatros tathaiva ca
GE09ram_05_u:735: 5.005.025c teṣām ṛddhimatām ṛddhiṃ dadarśa sa mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:741: 5.005.028a dadarśa vividhān gulmāṃs tasya rakṣaḥpater gṛhe
GE09ram_05_u:742: 5.005.029a raktāñ śvetān sitāṃś caiva harīṃś caiva mahājavān
GE09ram_05_u:745: 5.005.030c nihantṝn parasainyānāṃ gṛhe tasmin dadarśa saḥ
GE09ram_05_u:746: 5.005.031a kṣarataś ca yathā meghān sravataś ca yathā girīn
GE09ram_05_u:754: 5.005.035a kāmasya gṛhakaṃ ramyaṃ divāgṛhakam eva ca
GE09ram_05_u:760: 5.005.038a arcirbhiś cāpi ratnānāṃ tejasā rāvaṇasya ca
GE09ram_05_u:761: 5.005.038c virarājātha tad veśma raśmimān iva raśmibhiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:766: 5.005.041a nūpurāṇāṃ ca ghoṣeṇa kāñcīnāṃ ninadena ca
GE09ram_05_u:830: 5.006.016a tataḥ sa tāṃ kapir abhipatya pūjitāṃ;
GE09ram_05_u:850: 5.007.007a yā hi vaiśvaraṇe lakṣmīr yā cendre harivāhane
GE09ram_05_u:852: 5.007.008a yā ca rājñaḥ kuberasya yamasya varuṇasya ca
GE09ram_05_u:853: 5.007.008c tādṛśī tad viśiṣṭā vā ṛddhī rakṣo gṛheṣv iha
GE09ram_05_u:854: 5.007.009a tasya harmyasya madhyasthaṃ veśma cānyat sunirmitam
GE09ram_05_u:856: 5.007.010a brahmaṇo 'rthe kṛtaṃ divyaṃ divi yad viśvakarmaṇā
GE09ram_05_u:858: 5.007.011a pareṇa tapasā lebhe yat kuberaḥ pitāmahāt
GE09ram_05_u:859: 5.007.011c kuberam ojasā jitvā lebhe tad rākṣaseśvaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:861: 5.007.012c sukṛtair ācitaṃ stambhaiḥ pradīptam iva ca śriyā
GE09ram_05_u:871: 5.007.017a sa gandhas taṃ mahāsattvaṃ bandhur bandhum ivottamam
GE09ram_05_u:872: 5.007.017c ita ehīty uvāceva tatra yatra sa rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:873: 5.007.018a tatas tāṃ prasthitaḥ śālāṃ dadarśa mahatīṃ śubhām
GE09ram_05_u:877: 5.007.020a muktābhiś ca pravālaiś ca rūpyacāmīkarair api
GE09ram_05_u:880: 5.007.021c stambhaiḥ pakṣair ivātyuccair divaṃ saṃprasthitām iva
GE09ram_05_u:888: 5.007.025c tāṃ śokanāśinīṃ divyāṃ śriyaḥ saṃjananīm iva
GE09ram_05_u:892: 5.007.027c siddhir veyaṃ parā hi syād ity amanyata mārutiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:895: 5.007.029a dīpānāṃ ca prakāśena tejasā rāvaṇasya ca
GE09ram_05_u:910: 5.007.036c mene hi guṇatas tāni samāni salilodbhavaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:911: 5.007.037a sā tasya śuśubhe śālā tābhiḥ strībhir virājitā
GE09ram_05_u:913: 5.007.038a sa ca tābhiḥ parivṛtaḥ śuśubhe rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:914: 5.007.038c yathā hy uḍupatiḥ śrīmāṃs tārābhir abhisaṃvṛtaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:916: 5.007.039c imās tāḥ saṃgatāḥ kṛtsnā iti mene haris tadā
GE09ram_05_u:921: 5.007.042a vyāvṛttatilakāḥ kāś cit kāś cid udbhrāntanūpurāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:922: 5.007.042c pārśve galitahārāś ca kāś cit paramayoṣitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:923: 5.007.043a mukhā hāravṛtāś cānyāḥ kāś cit prasrastavāsasaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:927: 5.007.045a candrāṃśukiraṇābhāś ca hārāḥ kāsāṃ cid utkaṭāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:928: 5.007.045c haṃsā iva babhuḥ suptāḥ stanamadhyeṣu yoṣitām
GE09ram_05_u:929: 5.007.046a aparāsāṃ ca vaidūryāḥ kādambā iva pakṣiṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:932: 5.007.047c āpagā iva tā rejur jaghanaiḥ pulinair iva
GE09ram_05_u:935: 5.007.049a mṛduṣv aṅgeṣu kāsāṃ cit kucāgreṣu ca saṃsthitāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:938: 5.007.050c upary upari vaktrāṇāṃ vyādhūyante punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:941: 5.007.052a vavalguś cātra kāsāṃ cit kuṇḍalāni śubhārciṣām
GE09ram_05_u:946: 5.007.054c mukhāni sma sapatnīnām upājighran punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:950: 5.007.056c aṃśukāni ca ramyāṇi pramadās tatra śiśyire
GE09ram_05_u:951: 5.007.057a anyā vakṣasi cānyasyās tasyāḥ kā cit punar bhujam
GE09ram_05_u:952: 5.007.057c aparā tv aṅkam anyasyās tasyāś cāpy aparā bhujau
GE09ram_05_u:962: 5.007.062c āsīd vanam ivoddhūtaṃ strīvanaṃ rāvaṇasya tat
GE09ram_05_u:963: 5.007.063a uciteṣv api suvyaktaṃ na tāsāṃ yoṣitāṃ tadā
GE09ram_05_u:968: 5.007.065c rakṣasāṃ cābhavan kanyās tasya kāmavaśaṃ gatāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:969: 5.007.066a na tatra kā cit pramadā prasahya;
GE09ram_05_u:990: 5.008.003c gandhaiś ca vividhair juṣṭaṃ varadhūpena dhūpitam
GE09ram_05_u:1001: 5.008.009a pītvāpy uparataṃ cāpi dadarśa sa mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1021: 5.008.019a dadarśa sa kapis tasya bāhū śayanasaṃsthitau
GE09ram_05_u:1028: 5.008.022c śayānasya viniḥśvāsaḥ pūrayann iva tad gṛham
GE09ram_05_u:1040: 5.008.028c patnīḥ sa priyabhāryasya tasya rakṣaḥpater gṛhe
GE09ram_05_u:1048: 5.008.032c virarāja vimānaṃ tan nabhas tārāgaṇair iva
GE09ram_05_u:1051: 5.008.034a kā cid vīṇāṃ pariṣvajya prasuptā saṃprakāśate
GE09ram_05_u:1057: 5.008.037a kā cid aṃśaṃ pariṣvajya suptā kamalalocanā
GE09ram_05_u:1069: 5.008.043a pāṇibhyāṃ ca kucau kā cit suvarṇakalaśopamau
GE09ram_05_u:1074: 5.008.045c nipīḍya ca kucaiḥ suptāḥ kāminyaḥ kāmukān iva
GE09ram_05_u:1076: 5.008.046c dadarśa rūpasaṃpannām aparāṃ sa kapiḥ striyam
GE09ram_05_u:1081: 5.008.049a sa tāṃ dṛṣṭvā mahābāhur bhūṣitāṃ mārutātmajaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1088: 5.009.001a avadhūya ca tāṃ buddhiṃ babhūvāvasthitas tadā
GE09ram_05_u:1089: 5.009.001c jagāma cāparāṃ cintāṃ sītāṃ prati mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1090: 5.009.002a na rāmeṇa viyuktā sā svaptum arhati bhāminī
GE09ram_05_u:1091: 5.009.002c na bhoktuṃ nāpy alaṃkartuṃ na pānam upasevitum
GE09ram_05_u:1092: 5.009.003a nānyaṃ naram upasthātuṃ surāṇām api ceśvaram
GE09ram_05_u:1093: 5.009.003c na hi rāmasamaḥ kaś cid vidyate tridaśeṣv api
GE09ram_05_u:1094: 5.009.003e anyeyam iti niścitya pānabhūmau cacāra saḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1095: 5.009.004a krīḍitenāparāḥ klāntā gītena ca tathā parāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1104: 5.009.008c goṣṭhe mahati mukhyānāṃ gavāṃ madhye yathā vṛṣaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1105: 5.009.009a sa rākṣasendraḥ śuśubhe tābhiḥ parivṛtaḥ svayam
GE09ram_05_u:1109: 5.009.011a mṛgāṇāṃ mahiṣāṇāṃ ca varāhāṇāṃ ca bhāgaśaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1110: 5.009.011c tatra nyastāni māṃsāni pānabhūmau dadarśa saḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1116: 5.009.014c mahiṣān ekaśalyāṃś ca chāgāṃś ca kṛtaniṣṭhitān
GE09ram_05_u:1117: 5.009.014e lekhyam uccāvacaṃ peyaṃ bhojyāni vividhāni ca
GE09ram_05_u:1122: 5.009.017a tatra tatra ca vinyastaiḥ suśliṣṭaiḥ śayanāsanaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1126: 5.009.019a divyāḥ prasannā vividhāḥ surāḥ kṛtasurā api
GE09ram_05_u:1128: 5.009.019e vāsacūrṇaiś ca vividhair mṛṣṭās tais taiḥ pṛthakpṛthak
GE09ram_05_u:1129: 5.009.020a saṃtatā śuśubhe bhūmir mālyaiś ca bahusaṃsthitaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1130: 5.009.020c hiraṇmayaiś ca karakair bhājanaiḥ sphāṭikair api
GE09ram_05_u:1133: 5.009.021c pānaśreṣṭhaṃ tadā bhūri kapis tatra dadarśa ha
GE09ram_05_u:1136: 5.009.023a kva cid ardhāvaśeṣāṇi kva cit pītāni sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1137: 5.009.023c kva cin naiva prapītāni pānāni sa dadarśa ha
GE09ram_05_u:1138: 5.009.024a kva cid bhakṣyāṃś ca vividhān kva cit pānāni bhāgaśaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1139: 5.009.024c kva cid annāvaśeṣāṇi paśyan vai vicacāra ha
GE09ram_05_u:1140: 5.009.025a kva cit prabhinnaiḥ karakaiḥ kva cid āloḍitair ghaṭaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1141: 5.009.025c kva cit saṃpṛktamālyāni jalāni ca phalāni ca
GE09ram_05_u:1142: 5.009.026a śayanāny atra nārīṇāṃ śūnyāni bahudhā punaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1143: 5.009.026c parasparaṃ samāśliṣya kāś cit suptā varāṅganāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1144: 5.009.027a kā cic ca vastram anyasyā apahṛtyopaguhya ca
GE09ram_05_u:1146: 5.009.028a tāsām ucchvāsavātena vastraṃ mālyaṃ ca gātrajam
GE09ram_05_u:1147: 5.009.028c nātyarthaṃ spandate citraṃ prāpya mandam ivānilam
GE09ram_05_u:1148: 5.009.029a candanasya ca śītasya śīdhor madhurasasya ca
GE09ram_05_u:1149: 5.009.029c vividhasya ca mālyasya puṣpasya vividhasya ca
GE09ram_05_u:1150: 5.009.030a bahudhā mārutas tatra gandhaṃ vividham udvahan
GE09ram_05_u:1151: 5.009.030c snānānāṃ candanānāṃ ca dhūpānāṃ caiva mūrchitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1152: 5.009.030e pravavau surabhir gandho vimāne puṣpake tadā
GE09ram_05_u:1153: 5.009.031a śyāmāvadātās tatrānyāḥ kāś cit kṛṣṇā varāṅganāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1156: 5.009.032c padminīnāṃ prasuptānāṃ rūpam āsīd yathaiva hi
GE09ram_05_u:1158: 5.009.033c dadarśa sumahātejā na dadarśa ca jānakīm
GE09ram_05_u:1159: 5.009.034a nirīkṣamāṇaś ca tatas tāḥ striyaḥ sa mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1163: 5.009.036a na hi me paradārāṇāṃ dṛṣṭir viṣayavartinī
GE09ram_05_u:1167: 5.009.038a kāmaṃ dṛṣṭvā mayā sarvā viśvastā rāvaṇastriyaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1168: 5.009.038c na tu me manasaḥ kiṃ cid vaikṛtyam upapadyate
GE09ram_05_u:1169: 5.009.039a mano hi hetuḥ sarveṣām indriyāṇāṃ pravartate
GE09ram_05_u:1170: 5.009.039c śubhāśubhāsv avasthāsu tac ca me suvyavasthitam
GE09ram_05_u:1171: 5.009.040a nānyatra hi mayā śakyā vaidehī parimārgitum
GE09ram_05_u:1172: 5.009.040c striyo hi strīṣu dṛśyante sadā saṃparimārgaṇe
GE09ram_05_u:1173: 5.009.041a yasya sattvasya yā yonis tasyāṃ tat parimārgyate
GE09ram_05_u:1174: 5.009.041c na śakyaṃ pramadā naṣṭā mṛgīṣu parimārgitum
GE09ram_05_u:1175: 5.009.042a tad idaṃ mārgitaṃ tāvac chuddhena manasā mayā
GE09ram_05_u:1176: 5.009.042c rāvaṇāntaḥpuraṃ saraṃ dṛśyate na ca jānakī
GE09ram_05_u:1179: 5.009.044a tām apaśyan kapis tatra paśyaṃś cānyā varastriyaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1187: 5.010.002c dhruvaṃ nu sītā mriyate yathā na me;
GE09ram_05_u:1202: 5.010.006c na sītā dṛśyate sādhvī vṛthā jāto mama śramaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1203: 5.010.007a kiṃ nu māṃ vānarāḥ sarve gataṃ vakṣyanti saṃgatāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1204: 5.010.007c gatvā tatra tvayā vīra kiṃ kṛtaṃ tad vadasva naḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1205: 5.010.008a adṛṣṭvā kiṃ pravakṣyāmi tām ahaṃ janakātmajām
GE09ram_05_u:1207: 5.010.009a kiṃ vā vakṣyati vṛddhaś ca jāmbavān aṅgadaś ca saḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1208: 5.010.009c gataṃ pāraṃ samudrasya vānarāś ca samāgatāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1209: 5.010.010a anirvedaḥ śriyo mūlam anirvedaḥ paraṃ sukham
GE09ram_05_u:1210: 5.010.010c bhūyas tāvad viceṣyāmi na yatra vicayaḥ kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1212: 5.010.011c karoti saphalaṃ jantoḥ karma yac ca karoti saḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1213: 5.010.012a tasmād anirveda kṛtaṃ yatnaṃ ceṣṭe 'ham uttamam
GE09ram_05_u:1216: 5.010.013c citraśālāś ca vicitā bhūyaḥ krīḍāgṛhāṇi ca
GE09ram_05_u:1220: 5.010.015c utpatan nipataṃś cāpi tiṣṭhan gacchan punaḥ kva cit
GE09ram_05_u:1222: 5.010.016c praviśan niṣpataṃś cāpi prapatann utpatann api
GE09ram_05_u:1223: 5.010.016e sarvam apy avakāśaṃ sa vicacāra mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1225: 5.010.017c rāvaṇāntaḥpure tasmin yaṃ kapir na jagāma saḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1227: 5.010.018c śvabhrāś ca puṣkariṇyaś ca sarvaṃ tenāvalokitam
GE09ram_05_u:1229: 5.010.019c dṛṣṭā hanūmatā tatra na tu sā janakātmajā
GE09ram_05_u:1231: 5.010.020c dṛṭā hanūmatā tatra na tu rāghavanandinī
GE09ram_05_u:1233: 5.010.021c dṛṣṭā hanūmatā tatra na tu sītā sumadhyamā
GE09ram_05_u:1235: 5.010.022c dṛṣṭā hanūmatā tatra na sā janakanandinī
GE09ram_05_u:1236: 5.010.023a so 'paśyaṃs tāṃ mahābāhuḥ paśyaṃś cānyā varastriyaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1245: 5.011.002c adṛṣṭvā jānakīṃ sītām abravīd vacanaṃ kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1246: 5.011.003a bhūyiṣṭhaṃ loḍitā laṅkā rāmasya caratā priyam
GE09ram_05_u:1247: 5.011.003c na hi paśyāmi vaidehīṃ sītāṃ sarvāṅgaśobhanām
GE09ram_05_u:1250: 5.011.004e loḍitā vasudhā sarvā na ca paśyāmi jānakīm
GE09ram_05_u:1252: 5.011.005c ākhyātā gṛdhrarājena na ca paśyāmi tām aham
GE09ram_05_u:1253: 5.011.006a kiṃ nu sītātha vaidehī maithilī janakātmajā
GE09ram_05_u:1255: 5.011.007a kṣipram utpatato manye sītām ādāya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1258: 5.011.008c manye patitam āryāyā hṛdayaṃ prekṣya sāgaram
GE09ram_05_u:1260: 5.011.009c tayā manye viśālākṣyā tyaktaṃ jīvitam āryayā
GE09ram_05_u:1261: 5.011.010a upary upari vā nūnaṃ sāgaraṃ kramatas tadā
GE09ram_05_u:1263: 5.011.011a āho kṣudreṇa cānena rakṣantī śīlam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1268: 5.011.013c rāmasya dhyāyatī vaktraṃ pañcatvaṃ kṛpaṇā gatā
GE09ram_05_u:1269: 5.011.014a hā rāma lakṣmaṇety eva hāyodhyeti ca maithilī
GE09ram_05_u:1271: 5.011.015a atha vā nihitā manye rāvaṇasya niveśane
GE09ram_05_u:1275: 5.011.017a vinaṣṭā vā pranaṣṭā vā mṛtā vā janakātmajā
GE09ram_05_u:1277: 5.011.018a nivedyamāne doṣaḥ syād doṣaḥ syād anivedane
GE09ram_05_u:1278: 5.011.018c kathaṃ nu khalu kartavyaṃ viṣamaṃ pratibhāti me
GE09ram_05_u:1279: 5.011.019a asminn evaṃgate karye prāptakālaṃ kṣamaṃ ca kim
GE09ram_05_u:1280: 5.011.019c bhaved iti matiṃ bhūyo hanumān pravicārayan
GE09ram_05_u:1282: 5.011.020c gamiṣyāmi tataḥ ko me puruṣārtho bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:1284: 5.011.021c praveśaś civa laṅkāyā rākṣasānāṃ ca darśanam
GE09ram_05_u:1285: 5.011.022a kiṃ vā vakṣyati sugrīvo harayo va samāgatāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1287: 5.011.023a gatvā tu yadi kākutsthaṃ vakṣyāmi param apriyam
GE09ram_05_u:1288: 5.011.023c na dṛṣṭeti mayā sītā tatas tyakṣyanti jīvitam
GE09ram_05_u:1290: 5.011.024c sītānimittaṃ durvākyaṃ śrutvā sa na bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:1294: 5.011.026c bharataṃ ca mṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā śatrughno na bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:1295: 5.011.027a putrān mṛtān samīkṣyātha na bhaviṣyanti mātaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1296: 5.011.027c kausalyā ca sumitrā ca kaikeyī ca na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1298: 5.011.028c rāmaṃ tathā gataṃ dṛṣṭvā tatas tyakṣyanti jīvitam
GE09ram_05_u:1306: 5.011.032c śirāṃsy abhihaniṣyanti talair muṣṭibhir eva ca
GE09ram_05_u:1309: 5.011.034a na vaneṣu na śaileṣu na nirodheṣu vā punaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1313: 5.011.036a viṣam udbandhanaṃ vāpi praveśaṃ jvalanasya vā
GE09ram_05_u:1315: 5.011.037a ghoram ārodanaṃ manye gate mayi bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:1317: 5.011.038a so 'haṃ naiva gamiṣyāmi kiṣkindhāṃ nagarīm itaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1318: 5.011.038c na hi śakṣyāmy ahaṃ draṣṭuṃ sugrīvaṃ maithilīṃ vinā
GE09ram_05_u:1320: 5.011.039c āśayā tau dhariṣyete vanarāś ca manasvinaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1327: 5.011.043a idam apy ṛṣibhir dṛṣṭaṃ niryāṇam iti me matiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1328: 5.011.043c samyag āpaḥ pravekṣyāmi na cet paśyāmi jānakīm
GE09ram_05_u:1334: 5.011.046c aṅgadaḥ sahitaiḥ sarvair vānarair na bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:1335: 5.011.047a vināśe bahavo doṣā jīvan prāpnoti bhadrakam
GE09ram_05_u:1336: 5.011.047c tasmāt prāṇān dhariṣyāmi dhruvo jīvati saṃgamaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1337: 5.011.048a evaṃ bahuvidhaṃ duḥkhaṃ manasā dhārayan muhuḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1340: 5.011.049c kāmam astu hṛtā sītā pratyācīrṇaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:1343: 5.011.051a iti cintā samāpannaḥ sītām anadhigamya tām
GE09ram_05_u:1345: 5.011.052a yāvat sītāṃ na paśyāmi rāmapatnīṃ yaśasvinīm
GE09ram_05_u:1346: 5.011.052c tāvad etāṃ purīṃ laṅkāṃ vicinomi punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1347: 5.011.053a saṃpāti vacanāc cāpi rāmaṃ yady ānayāmy aham
GE09ram_05_u:1350: 5.011.054c na matkṛte vinaśyeyuḥ sarve te naravānarāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1352: 5.011.055c imām abhigamiṣyāmi na hīyaṃ vicitā mayā
GE09ram_05_u:1353: 5.011.056a vasūn rudrāṃs tathādityān aśvinau maruto 'pi ca
GE09ram_05_u:1363: 5.011.060a sa tebhyas tu namaskṛtvā sugrīvāya ca mārutiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1365: 5.011.061a sa gatvā manasā pūrvam aśokavanikāṃ śubhām
GE09ram_05_u:1369: 5.011.063a rakṣiṇaś cātra vihitā nūnaṃ rakṣanti pādapān
GE09ram_05_u:1371: 5.011.064a saṃkṣipto 'yaṃ mayātmā ca rāmārthe rāvaṇasya ca
GE09ram_05_u:1372: 5.011.064c siddhiṃ me saṃvidhāsyanti devāḥ sarṣigaṇās tv iha
GE09ram_05_u:1373: 5.011.065a brahmā svayambhūr bhagavān devāś caiva diśantu me
GE09ram_05_u:1374: 5.011.065c siddhim agniś ca vāyuś ca puruhūtaś ca vajradhṛt
GE09ram_05_u:1375: 5.011.066a varuṇaḥ pāśahastaś ca somādityai tathaiva ca
GE09ram_05_u:1376: 5.011.066c aśvinau ca mahātmānau marutaḥ sarva eva ca
GE09ram_05_u:1377: 5.011.067a siddhiṃ sarvāṇi bhūtāni bhūtānāṃ caiva yaḥ prabhuḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1378: 5.011.067c dāsyanti mama ye cānye adṛṣṭāḥ pathi gocarāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1381: 5.011.068c drakṣye tad āryāvadanaṃ kadā nv ahaṃ;
GE09ram_05_u:1386: kathaṃ nu me dṛṣṭapathe 'dya sā bhavet
GE09ram_05_u:1387: 5.012.001a sa muhūrtam iva dhyatvā manasā cādhigamya tām
GE09ram_05_u:1391: 5.012.003a sālān aśokān bhavyāṃś ca campakāṃś ca supuṣpitān
GE09ram_05_u:1395: 5.012.005a sa praviṣya vicitrāṃ tāṃ vihagair abhināditām
GE09ram_05_u:1410: 5.012.012c dṛṣṭvā sarvāṇi bhūtāni vasanta iti menire
GE09ram_05_u:1423: 5.012.019a tathā lāṅgūlahastaiś ca caraṇābhyāṃ ca marditā
GE09ram_05_u:1427: 5.012.021a sa tatra maṇibhūmīś ca rājatīś ca manoramāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1428: 5.012.021c tathā kāñcanabhūmīś ca vicaran dadṛśe kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1443: 5.012.029a dadarśa ca nagāt tasmān nadīṃ nipatitāṃ kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1444: 5.012.029c aṅkād iva samutpatya priyasya patitāṃ priyām
GE09ram_05_u:1447: 5.012.031a punar āvṛttatoyāṃ ca dadarśa sa mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1448: 5.012.031c prasannām iva kāntasya kāntāṃ punar upasthitām
GE09ram_05_u:1451: 5.012.033a kṛtrimāṃ dīrghikāṃ cāpi pūrṇāṃ śītena vāriṇā
GE09ram_05_u:1456: 5.012.035a ye ke cit pādapās tatra puṣpopagaphalopagāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1458: 5.012.036a latāpratānair bahubhiḥ parṇaiś ca bahubhir vṛtām
GE09ram_05_u:1459: 5.012.036c kāñcanīṃ śiṃśupām ekāṃ dadarśa sa mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1462: 5.012.038a teṣāṃ drumāṇāṃ prabhayā meror iva mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1464: 5.012.039a tāṃ kāñcanais tarugaṇair mārutena ca vījitām
GE09ram_05_u:1469: 5.012.041c itaś cetaś ca duḥkhārtāṃ saṃpatantīṃ yadṛcchayā
GE09ram_05_u:1471: 5.012.042c campakaiś candanaiś cāpi bakulaiś ca vibhūṣitā
GE09ram_05_u:1473: 5.012.043c imāṃ sā rāmamahiṣī nūnam eṣyati jānakī
GE09ram_05_u:1474: 5.012.044a sā rāma rāmamahiṣī rāghavasya priyā sadā
GE09ram_05_u:1481: 5.012.047c rāmasya dayitā bhāryā janakasya sutā satī
GE09ram_05_u:1485: 5.012.049c śubhā yā pārthivendrasya patnī rāmasya saṃmitā
GE09ram_05_u:1492: 5.013.001a sa vīkṣamāṇas tatrastho mārgamāṇaś ca maithilīm
GE09ram_05_u:1493: 5.013.001c avekṣamāṇaś ca mahīṃ sarvāṃ tām anvavaikṣata
GE09ram_05_u:1508: 5.013.008c sa deśaḥ prabhayā teṣāṃ pradīpta iva sarvataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1511: 5.013.010a śātakumbhanibhāḥ ke cit ke cid agniśikhopamāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1514: 5.013.011c ativṛttam ivācintyaṃ divyaṃ ramyaṃ śriyā vṛtam
GE09ram_05_u:1525: 5.013.017a muṣṇantam iva cakṣūṃṣi dyotamānam iva śriyā
GE09ram_05_u:1542: 5.013.025a tāṃ samīkṣya viśālākṣīm adhikaṃ malināṃ kṛśām
GE09ram_05_u:1545: 5.013.026c yathārūpā hi dṛṣṭā vai tathārūpeyam aṅganā
GE09ram_05_u:1547: 5.013.027c kurvantīṃ prabhayā devīṃ sarvā vitimirā diśaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1551: 5.013.029c bhūmau sutanum āsīnāṃ niyatām iva tāpasīm
GE09ram_05_u:1555: 5.013.031c tāṃ smṛtīm iva saṃdighdām ṛddhiṃ nipatitām iva
GE09ram_05_u:1556: 5.013.032a vihatām iva ca śraddhām āśāṃ pratihatām iva
GE09ram_05_u:1557: 5.013.032c sopasargāṃ yathā siddhiṃ buddhiṃ sakaluṣām iva
GE09ram_05_u:1565: 5.013.036a tasya saṃdidihe buddhir muhuḥ sītāṃ nirīkṣya tu
GE09ram_05_u:1573: 5.013.040a sukṛtau karṇaveṣṭau ca śvadaṃṣṭrau ca susaṃsthitau
GE09ram_05_u:1577: 5.013.042a tatra yāny avahīnāni tāny ahaṃ nopalakṣaye
GE09ram_05_u:1578: 5.013.042c yāny asyā nāvahīnāni tānīmāni na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1579: 5.013.043a pītaṃ kanakapaṭṭābhaṃ srastaṃ tad vasanaṃ śubham
GE09ram_05_u:1584: 5.013.045c tathā hi nūnaṃ tad varṇaṃ tathā śrīmad yathetarat
GE09ram_05_u:1586: 5.013.046c pranaṣṭāpi satī yasya manaso na praṇaśyati
GE09ram_05_u:1587: 5.013.047a iyaṃ sā yat kṛte rāmaś caturbhiḥ paritapyate
GE09ram_05_u:1590: 5.013.048c patnī naṣṭeti śokena priyeti madanena ca
GE09ram_05_u:1593: 5.013.050a asyā devyā manas tasmiṃs tasya cāsyāṃ pratiṣṭhitam
GE09ram_05_u:1594: 5.013.050c teneyaṃ sa ca dharmātmā muhūrtam api jīvati
GE09ram_05_u:1595: 5.013.051a duṣkaraṃ kurute rāmo ya imāṃ mattakāśinīm
GE09ram_05_u:1596: 5.013.051c sītāṃ vinā mahābāhur muhūrtam api jīvati
GE09ram_05_u:1597: 5.013.052a evaṃ sītāṃ tadā dṛṣṭvā hṛṣṭaḥ pavanasaṃbhavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1598: 5.013.052c jagāma manasā rāmaṃ praśaśaṃsa ca taṃ prabhum
GE09ram_05_u:1599: 5.014.001a praśasya tu praśastavyāṃ sītāṃ tāṃ haripuṃgavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1602: 5.014.002c sītām āśritya tejasvī hanumān vilalāpa ha
GE09ram_05_u:1604: 5.014.003c yadi sītāpi duḥkhārtā kālo hi duratikramaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1609: 5.014.006a tāṃ dṛṣṭvā navahemābhāṃ lokakāntām iva śriyam
GE09ram_05_u:1610: 5.014.006c jagāma manasā rāmaṃ vacanaṃ cedam abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:1611: 5.014.007a asyā hetor viśālākṣyā hato vālī mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1613: 5.014.008a virādhaś ca hataḥ saṃkhye rākṣaso bhīmavikramaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1617: 5.014.010a kharaś ca nihataḥ saṃkhye triśirāś ca nipātitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1621: 5.014.012a sāgaraś ca mayā krāntaḥ śrīmān nadanadīpatiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1622: 5.014.012c asyā hetor viśālākṣyāḥ purī ceyaṃ nirīkṣitā
GE09ram_05_u:1624: 5.014.013c asyāḥ kṛte jagac cāpi yuktam ity eva me matiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1625: 5.014.014a rājyaṃ vā triṣu lokeṣu sītā vā janakātmajā
GE09ram_05_u:1634: 5.014.018c iyaṃ sā dayitā bhāryā rākṣasī vaśam āgatā
GE09ram_05_u:1638: 5.014.020c yā parāṃ bhajate prītiṃ vane 'pi bhavane yathā
GE09ram_05_u:1641: 5.014.022a imāṃ tu śīlasaṃpannāṃ draṣṭum icchati rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1643: 5.014.023a asyā nūnaṃ punar lābhād rāghavaḥ prītim eṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:1649: 5.014.026a bhartā nāma paraṃ nāryā bhūṣaṇaṃ bhūṣaṇād api
GE09ram_05_u:1650: 5.014.026c eṣā hi rahitā tena śobhanārhā na śobhate
GE09ram_05_u:1651: 5.014.027a duṣkaraṃ kurute rāmo hīno yad anayā prabhuḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1654: 5.014.028c sukhārhāṃ duḥkhitāṃ dṛṣṭvā mamāpi vyathitaṃ manaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1672: 5.015.001c prajagāma nabhaś candro haṃso nīlam ivodakam
GE09ram_05_u:1673: 5.015.002a sācivyam iva kurvan sa prabhayā nirmalaprabhaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1676: 5.015.003c śokabhārair iva nyastāṃ bhārair nāvam ivāmbhasi
GE09ram_05_u:1685: 5.015.008a hrasvāṃ dīrghāṃ ca kubjāṃ ca vikaṭāṃ vāmanāṃ tathā
GE09ram_05_u:1693: 5.015.012a anāsā atināsāś ca tiryan nāsā vināsikāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1706: 5.015.018c tasyādhastāc ca tāṃ devīṃ rājaputrīm aninditām
GE09ram_05_u:1709: 5.015.020a kṣīṇapuṇyāṃ cyutāṃ bhūmau tārāṃ nipatitām iva
GE09ram_05_u:1716: 5.015.023c sītāṃ bhartṛhite yuktām ayuktāṃ rakṣasāṃ vaśe
GE09ram_05_u:1718: 5.015.024c tābhiḥ parivṛtāṃ tatra sagrahām iva rohiṇīm
GE09ram_05_u:1719: 5.015.025a dadarśa hanumān devīṃ latām akusumām iva
GE09ram_05_u:1720: 5.015.025c sā malena ca digdhāṅgī vapuṣā cāpy alaṃkṛtā
GE09ram_05_u:1721: 5.015.026a mṛṇālī paṅkadighdeva vibhāti ca na bhāti ca
GE09ram_05_u:1731: 5.015.031a praharṣam atulaṃ lebhe mārutiḥ prekṣya maithilīm
GE09ram_05_u:1732: 5.015.031c harṣajāni ca so 'śrūṇi tāṃ dṛṣṭvā madirekṣaṇām
GE09ram_05_u:1733: 5.015.032a mumoca hanumāṃs tatra namaś cakre ca rāghavam
GE09ram_05_u:1734: 5.015.032c namaskṛtvā ca rāmāya lakṣmaṇāya ca vīryavān
GE09ram_05_u:1737: 5.016.001c vicinvataś ca vaidehīṃ kiṃ cic cheṣā niśābhavat
GE09ram_05_u:1744: 5.016.005a bhṛśaṃ niyuktas tasyāṃ ca madanena madotkaṭaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1745: 5.016.005c na sa taṃ rākṣasaḥ kāmaṃ śaśākātmani gūhitum
GE09ram_05_u:1746: 5.016.006a sa sarvābharaṇair yukto bibhrac chriyam anuttamām
GE09ram_05_u:1756: 5.016.011a dīpikāḥ kāñcanīḥ kāś cij jagṛhus tatra yoṣitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1758: 5.016.012a kāñcanair api bhṛṅgārair jahruḥ salilam agrataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1759: 5.016.012c maṇḍalāgrān asīṃś caiva gṛhyānyāḥ pṛṣṭhato yayuḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1760: 5.016.013a kā cid ratnamayīṃ pātrīṃ pūrṇāṃ pānasya bhāminī
GE09ram_05_u:1765: 5.016.015c anujagmuḥ patiṃ vīraṃ ghanaṃ vidyullatā iva
GE09ram_05_u:1766: 5.016.016a tataḥ kāñcīninādaṃ ca nūpurāṇāṃ ca niḥsvanam
GE09ram_05_u:1783: 5.016.024c tena viśravasaḥ putraḥ sa dṛṣṭo rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1788: 5.016.027a sa tathāpy ugratejāḥ san nirdhūtas tasya tejasā
GE09ram_05_u:1792: 5.017.001a tasminn eva tataḥ kāle rājaputrī tv aninditā
GE09ram_05_u:1796: 5.017.003a ūrubhyām udaraṃ chādya bāhubhyāṃ ca payodharau
GE09ram_05_u:1799: 5.017.004c dadarśa dīnāṃ duḥkhārtaṃ nāvaṃ sannām ivārṇave
GE09ram_05_u:1801: 5.017.005c chinnāṃ prapatitāṃ bhūmau śākhām iva vanaspateḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1810: 5.017.009c punaḥ saṃskāram āpannāṃ jātam iva ca duṣkule
GE09ram_05_u:1811: 5.017.010a sannām iva mahākīrtiṃ śraddhām iva vimānitām
GE09ram_05_u:1812: 5.017.010c prajñām iva parikṣīṇām āśāṃ pratihatām iva
GE09ram_05_u:1813: 5.017.011a āyatīm iva vidhvastām ājñāṃ pratihatām iva
GE09ram_05_u:1814: 5.017.011c dīptām iva diśaṃ kāle pūjām apahṛtām iva
GE09ram_05_u:1815: 5.017.012a padminīm iva vidhvastāṃ hataśūrāṃ camūm iva
GE09ram_05_u:1817: 5.017.013a vedīm iva parāmṛṣṭāṃ śāntām agniśikhām iva
GE09ram_05_u:1822: 5.017.015c parayā mṛjayā hīnāṃ kṛṣṇapakṣe niśām iva
GE09ram_05_u:1829: 5.017.019a upavāsena śokena dhyānena ca bhayena ca
GE09ram_05_u:1837: 5.018.001a sa tāṃ parivṛtāṃ dīnāṃ nirānandāṃ tapasvinīm
GE09ram_05_u:1840: 5.018.002c adarśanam ivātmānaṃ bhayān netuṃ tvam icchasi
GE09ram_05_u:1841: 5.018.003a kāmaye tvāṃ viśālākṣi bahumanyasva māṃ priye
GE09ram_05_u:1843: 5.018.004a neha ke cin manuṣyā vā rākṣasāḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1844: 5.018.004c vyapasarpatu te sīte bhayaṃ mattaḥ samutthitam
GE09ram_05_u:1845: 5.018.005a svadharme rakṣasāṃ bhīru sarvathaiṣa na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1846: 5.018.005c gamanaṃ vā parastrīṇāṃ haraṇaṃ saṃpramathya vā
GE09ram_05_u:1847: 5.018.006a evaṃ caitad akāmāṃ ca na tvāṃ sprakṣyāmi maithili
GE09ram_05_u:1848: 5.018.006c kāmaṃ kāmaḥ śarīre me yathākāmaṃ pravartatām
GE09ram_05_u:1849: 5.018.007a devi neha bhayaṃ kāryaṃ mayi viśvasihi priye
GE09ram_05_u:1850: 5.018.007c praṇayasva ca tattvena maivaṃ bhūḥ śokalālasā
GE09ram_05_u:1852: 5.018.008c asthāne 'py upavāsaś ca naitāny aupayikāni te
GE09ram_05_u:1853: 5.018.009a vicitrāṇi ca mālyāni candanāny agarūṇi ca
GE09ram_05_u:1854: 5.018.009c vividhāni ca vāsāṃsi divyāny ābharaṇāni ca
GE09ram_05_u:1855: 5.018.010a mahārhāṇi ca pānāni yānāni śayanāni ca
GE09ram_05_u:1856: 5.018.010c gītaṃ nṛttaṃ ca vādyaṃ ca labha māṃ prāpya maithili
GE09ram_05_u:1857: 5.018.011a strīratnam asi maivaṃ bhūḥ kuru gātreṣu bhūṣaṇam
GE09ram_05_u:1858: 5.018.011c māṃ prāpya tu kathaṃ hi syās tvam anarhā suvigrahe
GE09ram_05_u:1860: 5.018.012c yad atītaṃ punar naiti srotaḥ śīghram apām iva
GE09ram_05_u:1861: 5.018.013a tvāṃ kṛtvoparato manye rūpakartā sa viśvakṛt
GE09ram_05_u:1862: 5.018.013c na hi rūpopamā tv anyā tavāsti śubhadarśane
GE09ram_05_u:1864: 5.018.014c kaḥ pumān ativarteta sākṣād api pitāmahaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1865: 5.018.015a yad yat paśyāmi te gātraṃ śītāṃśusadṛśānane
GE09ram_05_u:1866: 5.018.015c tasmiṃs tasmin pṛthuśroṇi cakṣur mama nibadhyate
GE09ram_05_u:1867: 5.018.016a bhava maithili bhāryā me moham enaṃ visarjaya
GE09ram_05_u:1870: 5.018.017c tāni te bhīru sarvāṇi rājyaṃ caitad ahaṃ ca te
GE09ram_05_u:1873: 5.018.019a neha paśyāmi loke 'nyaṃ yo me pratibalo bhavet
GE09ram_05_u:1874: 5.018.019c paśya me sumahad vīryam apratidvandvam āhave
GE09ram_05_u:1877: 5.018.021a iccha māṃ kriyatām adya pratikarma tavottamam
GE09ram_05_u:1879: 5.018.021e sādhu paśyāmi te rūpaṃ saṃyuktaṃ pratikarmaṇā
GE09ram_05_u:1881: 5.018.022c bhuṅkṣva bhogān yathākāmaṃ piba bhīru ramasva ca
GE09ram_05_u:1882: 5.018.022e yatheṣṭaṃ ca prayaccha tvaṃ pṛthivīṃ vā dhanāni ca
GE09ram_05_u:1883: 5.018.023a lalasva mayi visrabdhā dhṛṣṭam ājñāpayasva ca
GE09ram_05_u:1884: 5.018.023c matprabhāvāl lalantyāś ca lalantāṃ bāndhavās tava
GE09ram_05_u:1885: 5.018.024a ṛddhiṃ mamānupaśya tvaṃ śriyaṃ bhadre yaśaś ca me
GE09ram_05_u:1888: 5.018.025c vratī sthaṇḍilaśāyī ca śaṅke jīvati vā na vā
GE09ram_05_u:1889: 5.018.026a na hi vaidehi rāmas tvāṃ draṣṭuṃ vāpy upalapsyate
GE09ram_05_u:1890: 5.018.026c puro balākair asitair meghair jyotsnām ivāvṛtām
GE09ram_05_u:1891: 5.018.027a na cāpi mama hastāt tvāṃ prāptum arhati rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1894: 5.018.028c mano harasi me bhīru suparṇaḥ pannagaṃ yathā
GE09ram_05_u:1896: 5.018.029c tāṃ dṛṣṭvā sveṣu dāreṣu ratiṃ nopalabhāmy aham
GE09ram_05_u:1898: 5.018.030c yāvantyo mama sarvāsām aiśvaryaṃ kuru jānaki
GE09ram_05_u:1900: 5.018.031c tās tvāṃ paricariṣyanti śriyam apsaraso yathā
GE09ram_05_u:1901: 5.018.032a yāni vaiśravaṇe subhru ratnāni ca dhanāni ca
GE09ram_05_u:1902: 5.018.032c tāni lokāṃś ca suśroṇi māṃ ca bhuṅkṣva yathāsukham
GE09ram_05_u:1903: 5.018.033a na rāmas tapasā devi na balena na vikramaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1904: 5.018.033c na dhanena mayā tulyas tejasā yaśasāpi vā
GE09ram_05_u:1908: tvayi ca sametya lalantu bāndhavās te
GE09ram_05_u:1913: 5.019.001a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā sītā raudrasya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1914: 5.019.001c ārtā dīnasvarā dīnaṃ pratyuvāca śanair vacaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1918: 5.019.003c nivartaya mano mattaḥ svajane kriyatāṃ manaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1919: 5.019.004a na māṃ prārthayituṃ yuktas tvaṃ siddhim iva pāpakṛt
GE09ram_05_u:1920: 5.019.004c akāryaṃ na mayā kāryam ekapatnyā vigarhitam
GE09ram_05_u:1921: 5.019.004e kulaṃ saṃprāptayā puṇyaṃ kule mahati jātayā
GE09ram_05_u:1922: 5.019.005a evam uktvā tu vaidehī rāvaṇaṃ taṃ yaśasvinī
GE09ram_05_u:1923: 5.019.005c rākṣasaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtvā bhūyo vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:1924: 5.019.006a nāham aupayikī bhāryā parabhāryā satī tava
GE09ram_05_u:1925: 5.019.006c sādhu dharmam avekṣasva sādhu sādhuvrataṃ cara
GE09ram_05_u:1926: 5.019.007a yathā tava tathānyeṣāṃ rakṣyā dārā niśācara
GE09ram_05_u:1927: 5.019.007c ātmānam upamāṃ kṛtvā sveṣu dāreṣu ramyatām
GE09ram_05_u:1930: 5.019.009a iha santo na vā santi sato vā nānuvartase
GE09ram_05_u:1931: 5.019.009c vaco mithyā praṇītātmā pathyam uktaṃ vicakṣaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1934: 5.019.011a tatheyaṃ tvāṃ samāsādya laṅkā ratnaugha saṃkulā
GE09ram_05_u:1938: 5.019.013a evaṃ tvāṃ pāpakarmāṇaṃ vakṣyanti nikṛtā janāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1939: 5.019.013c diṣṭyaitad vyasanaṃ prāpto raudra ity eva harṣitāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1940: 5.019.014a śakyā lobhayituṃ nāham aiśvaryeṇa dhanena vā
GE09ram_05_u:1943: 5.019.015c kathaṃ nāmopadhāsyāmi bhujam anyasya kasya cit
GE09ram_05_u:1946: 5.019.017a sādhu rāvaṇa rāmeṇa māṃ samānaya duḥkhitām
GE09ram_05_u:1948: 5.019.018a mitram aupayikaṃ kartuṃ rāmaḥ sthānaṃ parīpsatā
GE09ram_05_u:1950: 5.019.019a varjayed vajram utsṛṣṭaṃ varjayed antakaś ciram
GE09ram_05_u:1951: 5.019.019c tvadvidhaṃ na tu saṃkruddho lokanāthaḥ sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1952: 5.019.020a rāmasya dhanuṣaḥ śabdaṃ śroṣyasi tvaṃ mahāsvanam
GE09ram_05_u:1960: 5.019.024a apaneṣyati māṃ bhartā tvattaḥ śīghram ariṃdamaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1961: 5.019.024c asurebhyaḥ śriyaṃ dīptāṃ viṣṇus tribhir iva kramaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1963: 5.019.025c aśaktena tvayā rakṣaḥ kṛtam etad asādhu vai
GE09ram_05_u:1964: 5.019.026a āśramaṃ tu tayoḥ śūnyaṃ praviśya narasiṃhayoḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1966: 5.019.027a na hi gandham upāghrāya rāmalakṣmaṇayos tvayā
GE09ram_05_u:1967: 5.019.027c śakyaṃ saṃdarśane sthātuṃ śunā śārdūlayor iva
GE09ram_05_u:1968: 5.019.028a tasya te vigrahe tābhyāṃ yugagrahaṇam asthiram
GE09ram_05_u:1970: 5.019.029a kṣipraṃ tava sa nātho me rāmaḥ saumitriṇā saha
GE09ram_05_u:1971: 5.019.029c toyam alpam ivādityaḥ prāṇān ādāsyate śaraiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1978: 5.020.002a yathā yathā sāntvayitā vaśyaḥ strīṇāṃ tathā tathā
GE09ram_05_u:1979: 5.020.002c yathā yathā priyaṃ vaktā paribhūtas tathā tathā
GE09ram_05_u:1980: 5.020.003a saṃniyacchati me krodhaṃ tvayi kāmaḥ samutthitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1981: 5.020.003c dravato mārgam āsādya hayān iva susārathiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1982: 5.020.004a vāmaḥ kāmo manuṣyāṇāṃ yasmin kila nibadhyate
GE09ram_05_u:1983: 5.020.004c jane tasmiṃs tv anukrośaḥ snehaś ca kila jāyate
GE09ram_05_u:1984: 5.020.005a etasmāt kāraṇān na tāṃ ghatayāmi varānane
GE09ram_05_u:1986: 5.020.006a paruṣāṇi hi vākyāni yāni yāni bravīṣi mām
GE09ram_05_u:1987: 5.020.006c teṣu teṣu vadho yuktas tava maithili dāruṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1988: 5.020.007a evam uktvā tu vaidehīṃ rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1990: 5.020.008a dvau māsau rakṣitavyau me yo 'vadhis te mayā kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1991: 5.020.008c tataḥ śayanam āroha mama tvaṃ varavarṇini
GE09ram_05_u:1992: 5.020.009a dvābhyām ūrdhvaṃ tu māsābhyāṃ bhartāraṃ mām anicchatīm
GE09ram_05_u:1997: 5.020.011c sītām āśvāsayām āsus tarjitāṃ tena rakṣasā
GE09ram_05_u:2000: 5.020.013a nūnaṃ na te janaḥ kaś cid asin niḥśreyase sthitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2001: 5.020.013c nivārayati yo na tvāṃ karmaṇo 'smād vigarhitāt
GE09ram_05_u:2002: 5.020.014a māṃ hi dharmātmanaḥ patnīṃ śacīm iva śacīpateḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2003: 5.020.014c tvadanyas triṣu lokeṣu prārthayen manasāpi kaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2005: 5.020.015c uktavān asi yat pāpaṃ kva gatas tasya mokṣyase
GE09ram_05_u:2006: 5.020.016a yathā dṛptaś ca mātaṅgaḥ śaśaś ca sahitau vane
GE09ram_05_u:2007: 5.020.016c tathā dviradavad rāmas tvaṃ nīca śaśavat smṛtaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2008: 5.020.017a sa tvam ikṣvākunāthaṃ vai kṣipann iha na lajjase
GE09ram_05_u:2009: 5.020.017c cakṣuṣo viṣayaṃ tasya na tāvad upagacchasi
GE09ram_05_u:2010: 5.020.018a ime te nayane krūre virūpe kṛṣṇapiṅgale
GE09ram_05_u:2011: 5.020.018c kṣitau na patite kasmān mām anāryanirīkṣitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2012: 5.020.019a tasya dharmātmanaḥ patnīṃ snuṣāṃ daśarathasya ca
GE09ram_05_u:2013: 5.020.019c kathaṃ vyāharato māṃ te na jihvā pāpa śīryate
GE09ram_05_u:2015: 5.020.020c na tvāṃ kurmi daśagrīva bhasma bhasmārhatejasā
GE09ram_05_u:2016: 5.020.021a nāpahartum ahaṃ śakyā tasya rāmasya dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2017: 5.020.021c vidhis tava vadhārthāya vihito nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2019: 5.020.022c apohya rāmaṃ kasmād dhi dāracāuryaṃ tvayā kṛtam
GE09ram_05_u:2031: 5.020.028c uvāca rāvaṇaḥ sītāṃ bhujaṃga iva niḥśvasan
GE09ram_05_u:2033: 5.020.029c nāśayāmy aham adya tvāṃ sūryaḥ saṃdhyām ivaujasā
GE09ram_05_u:2034: 5.020.030a ity uktvā maithilīṃ rājā rāvaṇaḥ śatrurāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2043: 5.020.034a yathā madvaśagā sītā kṣipraṃ bhavati jānakī
GE09ram_05_u:2044: 5.020.034c tathā kuruta rākṣasyaḥ sarvāḥ kṣipraṃ sametya ca
GE09ram_05_u:2054: 5.020.039a evam uktas tu rākṣasyā samutkṣiptas tato balī
GE09ram_05_u:2056: 5.020.040a devagandharvakanyāś ca nāgakanyāś ca tās tataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2062: 5.021.001a ity uktvā maithilīṃ rājā rāvaṇaḥ śatrurāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2063: 5.021.001c saṃdiśya ca tataḥ sarvā rākṣasīr nirjagāma ha
GE09ram_05_u:2064: 5.021.002a niṣkrānte rākṣasendre tu punar antaḥpuraṃ gate
GE09ram_05_u:2067: 5.021.003c paraṃ paruṣayā vācā vaidehīm idam abruvan
GE09ram_05_u:2069: 5.021.004c daśagrīvasya bhāryātvaṃ sīte na bahu manyase
GE09ram_05_u:2070: 5.021.005a tatas tv ekajaṭā nāma rākṣasī vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:2072: 5.021.006a prajāpatīnāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ tu caturtho yaḥ prajāpatiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2073: 5.021.006c mānaso brahmaṇaḥ putraḥ pulastya iti viśrutaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2074: 5.021.007a pulastyasya tu tejasvī maharṣir mānasaḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2077: 5.021.008c tasya tvaṃ rākṣasendrasya bhāryā bhavitum arhasi
GE09ram_05_u:2079: 5.021.009a tato harijaṭā nāma rākṣasī vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:2081: 5.021.010a yena devās trayastriṃśad devarājaś ca nirjitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2082: 5.021.010c tasya tvaṃ rākṣasendrasya bhāryā bhavitum arhasi
GE09ram_05_u:2084: 5.021.011c balino vīryayuktasyā bhāryātvaṃ kiṃ na lapsyase
GE09ram_05_u:2085: 5.021.012a priyāṃ bahumatāṃ bhāryāṃ tyaktvā rājā mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2086: 5.021.012c sarvāsāṃ ca mahābhāgāṃ tvām upaiṣyati rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2090: 5.021.014c nirjitāḥ samare yena sa te pārśvam upāgataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2093: 5.021.016a yasya sūryo na tapati bhīto yasya ca mārutaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2094: 5.021.016c na vāti smāyatāpāṅge kiṃ tvaṃ tasya na tiṣṭhasi
GE09ram_05_u:2095: 5.021.017a puṣpavṛṣṭiṃ ca taravo mumucur yasya vai bhayāt
GE09ram_05_u:2096: 5.021.017c śailāś ca subhru pānīyaṃ jaladāś ca yadecchati
GE09ram_05_u:2098: 5.021.018c kiṃ tvaṃ na kuruṣe buddhiṃ bhāryārthe rāvaṇasya hi
GE09ram_05_u:2099: 5.021.019a sādhu te tattvato devi kathitaṃ sādhu bhāmini
GE09ram_05_u:2100: 5.021.019c gṛhāṇa susmite vākyam anyathā na bhaviṣyasi
GE09ram_05_u:2102: 5.022.001c paruṣaṃ paruṣā nārya ūcus tā vākyam apriyam
GE09ram_05_u:2106: 5.022.003c pratyāhara mano rāmān na tvaṃ jātu bhaviṣyasi
GE09ram_05_u:2107: 5.022.004a mānuṣī mānuṣaṃ taṃ tu rāmam icchasi śobhane
GE09ram_05_u:2108: 5.022.004c rājyād bhraṣṭam asiddhārthaṃ viklavaṃ tam anindite
GE09ram_05_u:2112: 5.022.006c naitan manasi vākyaṃ me kilbiṣaṃ pratitiṣṭhati
GE09ram_05_u:2113: 5.022.007a na mānuṣī rākṣasasya bhāryā bhavitum arhati
GE09ram_05_u:2114: 5.022.007c kāmaṃ khādata māṃ sarvā na kariṣyāmi vo vacaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2115: 5.022.007e dīno vā rājyahīno vā yo me bhartā sa me guruḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2119: 5.022.009c sītāṃ saṃtarjayantīs tā rākṣasīr aśṛṇot kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2125: 5.022.012c sā bāṣpam apamārjantī śiṃśapāṃ tām upāgamat
GE09ram_05_u:2126: 5.022.013a tatas tāṃ śiṃśapāṃ sītā rākṣasībhiḥ samāvṛtā
GE09ram_05_u:2129: 5.022.014c bhartsayāṃ cakrire bhīmā rākṣasyas tāḥ samantataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2130: 5.022.015a tatas tāṃ vinatā nāma rākṣasī bhīmadarśanā
GE09ram_05_u:2134: 5.022.017a parituṣṭāsmi bhadraṃ te mānuṣas te kṛto vidhiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2135: 5.022.017c mamāpi tu vacaḥ pathyaṃ bruvantyāḥ kuru maithili
GE09ram_05_u:2137: 5.022.018c vikrāntaṃ rūpavantaṃ ca sureśam iva vāsavam
GE09ram_05_u:2139: 5.022.019c mānuṣaṃ kṛpaṇaṃ rāmaṃ tyaktvā rāvaṇam āśraya
GE09ram_05_u:2141: 5.022.020c adya prabhṛti sarveṣāṃ lokānām īśvarī bhava
GE09ram_05_u:2142: 5.022.020e agneḥ svāhā yathā devī śacīvendrasya śobhane
GE09ram_05_u:2143: 5.022.021a kiṃ te rāmeṇa vaidehi kṛpaṇena gatāyuṣā
GE09ram_05_u:2144: 5.022.022a etad uktaṃ ca me vākyaṃ yadi tvaṃ na kariṣyasi
GE09ram_05_u:2145: 5.022.022c asmin muhūrte sarvās tvāṃ bhakṣayiṣyāmahe vayam
GE09ram_05_u:2147: 5.022.023c abravīt kupitā sītāṃ muṣṭim udyamya garjatī
GE09ram_05_u:2149: 5.022.024c anukrośān mṛdutvāc ca soḍhāni tava maithili
GE09ram_05_u:2150: 5.022.024e na ca naḥ kuruṣe vākyaṃ hitaṃ kālapuraskṛtam
GE09ram_05_u:2153: 5.022.026a rāvaṇasya gṛhe rudhā asmābhis tu surakṣitā
GE09ram_05_u:2154: 5.022.026c na tvāṃ śaktaḥ paritrātum api sākṣāt puraṃdaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2157: 5.022.028a bhaja prītiṃ praharṣaṃ ca tyajaitāṃ nityadainyatām
GE09ram_05_u:2159: 5.022.029a jānāsi hi yathā bhīru strīṇāṃ yauvanam adhruvam
GE09ram_05_u:2160: 5.022.029c yāvan na te vyatikrāmet tāvat sukham avāpnuhi
GE09ram_05_u:2163: 5.022.031a strīsahasrāṇi te sapta vaśe sthāsyanti sundari
GE09ram_05_u:2165: 5.022.032a utpāṭya vā te hṛdayaṃ bhakṣayiṣyāmi maithili
GE09ram_05_u:2166: 5.022.032c yadi me vyāhṛtaṃ vākyaṃ na yathāvat kariṣyasi
GE09ram_05_u:2168: 5.022.033c bhrāmayantī mahac chūlam idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:2170: 5.022.034c rāvaṇena hṛtāṃ dṛṣṭvā daurhṛdo me mahān abhūt
GE09ram_05_u:2172: 5.022.035c antrāṇy api tathā śīrṣaṃ khādeyam iti me matiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2173: 5.022.036a tatas tu praghasā nāma rākṣasī vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:2174: 5.022.036c kaṇṭham asyā nṛśaṃsāyāḥ pīḍayāmaḥ kim āsyate
GE09ram_05_u:2175: 5.022.037a nivedyatāṃ tato rājñe mānuṣī sā mṛteti ha
GE09ram_05_u:2176: 5.022.037c nātra kaś cana saṃdehaḥ khādateti sa vakṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:2177: 5.022.038a tatas tv ajāmukhī nāma rākṣasī vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:2178: 5.022.038c viśasyemāṃ tataḥ sarvān samān kuruta pīlukān
GE09ram_05_u:2179: 5.022.039a vibhajāma tataḥ sarvā vivādo me na rocate
GE09ram_05_u:2180: 5.022.039c peyam ānīyatāṃ kṣipraṃ mālyaṃ ca vividhaṃ bahu
GE09ram_05_u:2181: 5.022.040a tataḥ śūrpaṇakhā nāma rākṣasī vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:2182: 5.022.040c ajāmukhā yad uktaṃ hi tad eva mama rocate
GE09ram_05_u:2187: 5.023.001a tathā tāsāṃ vadantīnāṃ paruṣaṃ dāruṇaṃ bahu
GE09ram_05_u:2189: 5.023.002a evam uktā tu vaidehī rākṣasībhir manasvinī
GE09ram_05_u:2191: 5.023.003a na mānuṣī rākṣasasya bhāryā bhavitum arhati
GE09ram_05_u:2192: 5.023.003c kāmaṃ khādata māṃ sarvā na kariṣyāmi vo vacaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2194: 5.023.004c na śarma lebhe duḥkhārtā rāvaṇena ca tarjitā
GE09ram_05_u:2197: 5.023.006a sā tv aśokasya vipulāṃ śākhām ālambya puṣpitām
GE09ram_05_u:2201: 5.023.008a sā vepamānā patitā pravāte kadalī yathā
GE09ram_05_u:2203: 5.023.009a tasyā sā dīrghavipulā vepantyāḥ sītayā tadā
GE09ram_05_u:2206: 5.023.010c ārtā vyasṛjad aśrūṇi maithilī vilalāpa ha
GE09ram_05_u:2207: 5.023.011a hā rāmeti ca duḥkhārtā punar hā lakṣmaṇeti ca
GE09ram_05_u:2208: 5.023.011c hā śvaśru mama kausalye hā sumitreti bhāvini
GE09ram_05_u:2210: 5.023.012c akāle durlabho mṛtyuḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā
GE09ram_05_u:2212: 5.023.013c jīvāmi hīnā rāmeṇa muhūrtam api duḥkhitā
GE09ram_05_u:2216: 5.023.015c sīdāmi khalu śokena kūlaṃ toyahataṃ yathā
GE09ram_05_u:2218: 5.023.016c dhanyāḥ paśyanti me nāthaṃ kṛtajñaṃ priyavādinam
GE09ram_05_u:2220: 5.023.017c tīṣkṇaṃ viṣam ivāsvādya durlabhaṃ mama jīvitam
GE09ram_05_u:2221: 5.023.018a kīdṛśaṃ tu mayā pāpaṃ purā dehāntare kṛtam
GE09ram_05_u:2222: 5.023.018c yenedaṃ prāpyate duḥkhaṃ mayā ghoraṃ sudāruṇam
GE09ram_05_u:2223: 5.023.019a jīvitaṃ tyaktum icchāmi śokena mahatā vṛtā
GE09ram_05_u:2224: 5.023.019c rākṣasībhiś ca rakṣantyā rāmo nāsādyate mayā
GE09ram_05_u:2225: 5.023.020a dhig astu khalu mānuṣyaṃ dhig astu paravaśyatām
GE09ram_05_u:2226: 5.023.020c na śakyaṃ yat parityaktum ātmacchandena jīvitam
GE09ram_05_u:2235: 5.024.005a na hi me jīvitenārtho naivārthair na ca bhūṣaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2236: 5.024.005c vasantyā rākṣasī madhye vinā rāmaṃ mahāratham
GE09ram_05_u:2237: 5.024.006a dhiṅ mām anāryām asatīṃ yāhaṃ tena vinā kṛtā
GE09ram_05_u:2239: 5.024.007a kā ca me jīvite śraddhā sukhe vā taṃ priyaṃ vinā
GE09ram_05_u:2241: 5.024.008a bhidyatāṃ bhakṣyatāṃ vāpi śarīraṃ visṛjāmy aham
GE09ram_05_u:2242: 5.024.008c na cāpy ahaṃ ciraṃ duḥkhaṃ saheyaṃ priyavarjitā
GE09ram_05_u:2244: 5.024.009c rāvaṇaṃ kiṃ punar ahaṃ kāmayeyaṃ vigarhitam
GE09ram_05_u:2245: 5.024.010a pratyākhyātaṃ na jānāti nātmānaṃ nātmanaḥ kulam
GE09ram_05_u:2246: 5.024.010c yo nṛśaṃsa svabhāvena māṃ prārthayitum icchati
GE09ram_05_u:2247: 5.024.011a chinnā bhinnā vibhaktā vā dīpte vāgnau pradīpitā
GE09ram_05_u:2248: 5.024.011c rāvaṇaṃ nopatiṣṭheyaṃ kiṃ pralāpena vaś ciram
GE09ram_05_u:2249: 5.024.012a khyātaḥ prājñaḥ kṛtajñaś ca sānukrośaś ca rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2252: 5.024.013c yenaikena nirastāni sa māṃ kiṃ nābhipadyate
GE09ram_05_u:2254: 5.024.014c samarthaḥ khalu me bhartā rāvaṇaṃ hantum āhave
GE09ram_05_u:2256: 5.024.015c raṇe rāmeṇa nihataḥ sa māṃ kiṃ nābhipadyate
GE09ram_05_u:2258: 5.024.016c na tu rāghavabāṇānāṃ gatirodhī ha vidyate
GE09ram_05_u:2259: 5.024.017a kiṃ nu tat kāraṇaṃ yena rāmo dṛḍhaparākramaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2261: 5.024.018a ihasthāṃ māṃ na jānīte śaṅke lakṣmaṇapūrvajaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2262: 5.024.018c jānann api hi tejasvī dharṣaṇāṃ marṣayiṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:2265: 5.024.020a kṛtaṃ karma mahat tena māṃ tadābhyavapadyatā
GE09ram_05_u:2267: 5.024.021a yadi mām iha jānīyād vartamānāṃ sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2268: 5.024.021c adya bāṇair abhikruddhaḥ kuryāl lokam arākṣasaṃ
GE09ram_05_u:2269: 5.024.022a vidhamec ca purīṃ laṅkāṃ śoṣayec ca mahodadhim
GE09ram_05_u:2270: 5.024.022c rāvaṇasya ca nīcasya kīrtiṃ nāma ca nāśayet
GE09ram_05_u:2272: 5.024.023c yathāham evaṃ rudatī tathā bhūyo na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2273: 5.024.023e anviṣya rakṣasāṃ laṅkāṃ kuryād rāmaḥ salakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2274: 5.024.024a na hi tābhyāṃ ripur dṛṣṭo muhūtam api jīvati
GE09ram_05_u:2279: 5.024.026a yādṛśāni tu dṛśyante laṅkāyām aśubhāni tu
GE09ram_05_u:2281: 5.024.027a nūnaṃ laṅkā hate pāpe rāvaṇe rākṣasādhipe
GE09ram_05_u:2282: 5.024.027c śoṣaṃ yāsyati durdharṣā pramadā vidhavā yathā
GE09ram_05_u:2286: 5.024.029c śroṣyāmi nacirād eva duḥkhārtānām iha dhvanim
GE09ram_05_u:2289: 5.024.031a yadi nāma sa śūro māṃ rāmo raktāntalocanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2292: 5.024.032c samayo yas tu nirdiṣṭas tasya kālo 'yam āgataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2293: 5.024.033a akāryaṃ ye na jānanti nairṛtāḥ pāpakāriṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2294: 5.024.033c adharmāt tu mahotpāto bhaviṣyati hi sāmpratam
GE09ram_05_u:2297: 5.024.035a sāhaṃ kathaṃ kariṣyāmi taṃ vinā priyadarśanam
GE09ram_05_u:2299: 5.024.036a yadi kaś cit pradātā me viṣasyādya bhaved iha
GE09ram_05_u:2300: 5.024.036c kṣipraṃ vaivasvataṃ devaṃ paśyeyaṃ patinā vinā
GE09ram_05_u:2301: 5.024.037a nājānāj jīvatīṃ rāmaḥ sa māṃ lakṣmaṇapūrvajaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2302: 5.024.037c jānantau tau na kuryātāṃ norvyāṃ hi mama mārgaṇam
GE09ram_05_u:2303: 5.024.038a nūnaṃ mamaiva śokena sa vīro lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2304: 5.024.038c devalokam ito yātas tyaktvā dehaṃ mahītale
GE09ram_05_u:2305: 5.024.039a dhanyā devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2306: 5.024.039c mama paśyanti ye nāthaṃ rāmaṃ rājīvalocanam
GE09ram_05_u:2307: 5.024.040a atha vā na hi tasyārthe dharmakāmasya dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2309: 5.024.041a dṛśyamāne bhavet prītaḥ sauhṛdaṃ nāsty apaśyataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2310: 5.024.041c nāśayanti kṛtaghrās tu na rāmo nāśayiṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:2311: 5.024.042a kiṃ nu me na guṇāḥ ke cit kiṃ vā bhāgya kṣayo hi me
GE09ram_05_u:2312: 5.024.042c yāhaṃ sītā varārheṇa hīnā rāmeṇa bhāminī
GE09ram_05_u:2313: 5.024.043a śreyo me jīvitān martuṃ vihīnā yā mahātmanā
GE09ram_05_u:2315: 5.024.044a atha vā nyastaśastrau tau vane mūlaphalāśanau
GE09ram_05_u:2316: 5.024.044c bhrātarau hi nara śreṣṭhau carantau vanagocarau
GE09ram_05_u:2319: 5.024.046a sāham evaṃgate kāle martum icchāmi sarvathā
GE09ram_05_u:2320: 5.024.046c na ca me vihito mṛtyur asmin duḥkhe 'pi vartati
GE09ram_05_u:2322: 5.024.047c jitātmāno mahābhāgā yeṣāṃ na staḥ priyāpriye
GE09ram_05_u:2323: 5.024.048a priyān na saṃbhaved duḥkham apriyād adhikaṃ bhayam
GE09ram_05_u:2324: 5.024.048c tābhyāṃ hi ye viyujyante namas teṣāṃ mahātmanām
GE09ram_05_u:2326: 5.024.049c prāṇāṃs tyakṣyāmi pāpasya rāvaṇasya gatā vaśam
GE09ram_05_u:2327: 5.025.001a ity uktāḥ sītayā ghoraṃ rākṣasyaḥ krodhamūrchitāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2328: 5.025.001c kāś cij jagmus tad ākhyātuṃ rāvaṇasya tarasvinaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2333: 5.025.004a sītāṃ tābhir anāryābhir dṛṣṭvā saṃtarjitāṃ tadā
GE09ram_05_u:2336: 5.025.005c janakasya sutām iṣṭāṃ snuṣāṃ daśarathasya ca
GE09ram_05_u:2337: 5.025.006a svapno hy adya mayā dṛṣṭo dāruṇo romaharṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2338: 5.025.006c rākṣasānām abhāvāya bhartur asyā bhavāya ca
GE09ram_05_u:2340: 5.025.007c sarvā evābruvan bhītās trijaṭāṃ tām idaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2341: 5.025.008a kathayasva tvayā dṛṣṭaḥ svapne 'yaṃ kīdṛśo niśi
GE09ram_05_u:2342: 5.025.009a tāsāṃ śrutvā tu vacanaṃ rākṣasīnāṃ mukhodgatam
GE09ram_05_u:2346: 5.025.011a svapne cādya mayā dṛṣṭā sītā śuklāmbarāvṛtā
GE09ram_05_u:2348: 5.025.011e rāmeṇa saṃgatā sītā bhāskareṇa prabhā yathā
GE09ram_05_u:2349: 5.025.012a rāghavaś ca mayā dṛṣṭaś caturdantaṃ mahāgajam
GE09ram_05_u:2357: 5.025.016a tatas tābhyāṃ kumārābhyām āsthitaḥ sa gajottamaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2358: 5.025.016c sītayā ca viśālākṣyā laṅkāyā upari sthitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2361: 5.025.017e lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā sītayā saha bhāryayā
GE09ram_05_u:2362: 5.025.018a vimānāt puṣpakād adya rāvaṇaḥ patito bhuvi
GE09ram_05_u:2363: 5.025.018c kṛṣyapāṇaḥ striyā dṛṣṭo muṇḍaḥ kṛṣṇāmbaraḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2365: 5.025.019c prayāto dakṣiṇām āśāṃ praviṣṭaḥ kardamaṃ hradam
GE09ram_05_u:2369: 5.025.021c uṣṭreṇa kumbhakarṇaś ca prayāto dakṣiṇāṃ diśam
GE09ram_05_u:2374: 5.025.024a pītva tailaṃ pranṛttāś ca prahasantyo mahāsvanāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2379: 5.025.026c ghātayet paramāmarṣī sarvaiḥ sārdhaṃ hi rākṣasaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2382: 5.025.028a tad alaṃ krūravākyair vaḥ sāntvam evābhidhīyatām
GE09ram_05_u:2383: 5.025.028c abhiyācāma vaidehīm etad dhi mama rocate
GE09ram_05_u:2384: 5.025.029a yasyā hy evaṃ vidhaḥ svapno duḥkhitāyāḥ pradṛśyate
GE09ram_05_u:2385: 5.025.029c sā duḥkhair bahubhir muktā priyaṃ prāpnoty anuttamam
GE09ram_05_u:2386: 5.025.030a bhartsitām api yācadhvaṃ rākṣasyaḥ kiṃ vivakṣayā
GE09ram_05_u:2387: 5.025.030c rāghavād dhi bhayaṃ ghoraṃ rākṣasānām upasthitam
GE09ram_05_u:2389: 5.025.031c alam eṣā paritrātuṃ rākṣasyo mahato bhayāt
GE09ram_05_u:2390: 5.025.032a api cāsyā viśālākṣyā na kiṃ cid upalakṣaye
GE09ram_05_u:2391: 5.025.032c viruddham api cāṅgeṣu susūkṣmam api lakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_05_u:2392: 5.025.033a chāyā vaiguṇya mātraṃ tu śaṅke duḥkham upasthitam
GE09ram_05_u:2394: 5.025.034a arthasiddhiṃ tu vaidehyāḥ paśyāmy aham upasthitām
GE09ram_05_u:2396: 5.025.035a nimittabhūtam etat tu śrotum asyā mahat priyam
GE09ram_05_u:2397: 5.025.035c dṛśyate ca sphurac cakṣuḥ padmapatram ivāyatam
GE09ram_05_u:2398: 5.025.036a īṣac ca hṛṣito vāsyā dakṣiṇāyā hy adakṣiṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2399: 5.025.036c akasmād eva vaidehyā bāhur ekaḥ prakampate
GE09ram_05_u:2417: jīvāmi kiṃ cit kṣaṇam apy apuṇyā
GE09ram_05_u:2419: idaṃ tu nūnaṃ hṛdayaṃ sthiraṃ me
GE09ram_05_u:2434: 5.026.008a hā rāma hā lakṣmaṇa hā sumitre;
GE09ram_05_u:2435: hā rāma mātaḥ saha me jananyā
GE09ram_05_u:2449: vadhyāṃ na māṃ vetsi hi rākṣasānām
GE09ram_05_u:2451: bhūmau ca śayyā niyamaś ca dharme
GE09ram_05_u:2456: 5.026.013c yā tvāṃ na paśyāmi kṛśā vivarṇā;
GE09ram_05_u:2468: 5.026.016c viṣasya dātā na tu me 'sti kaś cic;
GE09ram_05_u:2518: 5.028.001a hanumān api vikrāntaḥ sarvaṃ śuśrāva tattvataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2519: 5.028.001c sītāyās trijaṭāyāś ca rākṣasīnāṃ ca tarjanam
GE09ram_05_u:2520: 5.028.002a avekṣamāṇas tāṃ devīṃ devatām iva nandane
GE09ram_05_u:2521: 5.028.002c tato bahuvidhāṃ cintāṃ cintayām āsa vānaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2522: 5.028.003a yāṃ kapīnāṃ sahasrāṇi subahūny ayutāni ca
GE09ram_05_u:2523: 5.028.003c dikṣu sarvāsu mārgante seyam āsāditā mayā
GE09ram_05_u:2524: 5.028.004a cāreṇa tu suyuktena śatroḥ śaktim avekṣitā
GE09ram_05_u:2525: 5.028.004c gūḍhena caratā tāvad avekṣitam idaṃ mayā
GE09ram_05_u:2526: 5.028.005a rākṣasānāṃ viśeṣaś ca purī ceyam avekṣitā
GE09ram_05_u:2531: 5.028.007c adṛṣṭaduḥkhāṃ duḥkhasya na hy antam adhigacchatīm
GE09ram_05_u:2532: 5.028.008a yadi hy aham imāṃ devīṃ śokopahatacetanām
GE09ram_05_u:2534: 5.028.009a gate hi mayi tatreyaṃ rājaputrī yaśasvinī
GE09ram_05_u:2539: 5.028.011c kathaṃ nu khalu kartavyam idaṃ kṛcchra gato hy aham
GE09ram_05_u:2542: 5.028.013a rāmaś ca yadi pṛcchen māṃ kiṃ māṃ sītābravīd vacaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2543: 5.028.013c kim ahaṃ taṃ pratibrūyām asaṃbhāṣya sumadhyamām
GE09ram_05_u:2545: 5.028.014c nirdahed api kākutsthaḥ kruddhas tīvreṇa cakṣuṣā
GE09ram_05_u:2548: 5.028.016a antaraṃ tv aham āsādya rākṣasīnām iha sthitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2550: 5.028.017a ahaṃ hy atitanuś caiva vanaraś ca viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2552: 5.028.018a yadi vācaṃ pradāsyāmi dvijātir iva saṃskṛtām
GE09ram_05_u:2553: 5.028.018c rāvaṇaṃ manyamānā māṃ sītā bhītā bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:2554: 5.028.019a avaśyam eva vaktavyaṃ mānuṣaṃ vākyam arthavat
GE09ram_05_u:2556: 5.028.020a seyam ālokya me rūpaṃ jānakī bhāṣitaṃ tathā
GE09ram_05_u:2557: 5.028.020c rakṣobhis trāsitā pūrvaṃ bhūyas trāsaṃ gamiṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:2560: 5.028.022a sītayā ca kṛte śabde sahasā rākṣasīgaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2563: 5.028.023c vadhe ca grahaṇe caiva kuryur yatnaṃ yathābalam
GE09ram_05_u:2564: 5.028.024a taṃ māṃ śākhāḥ praśākhāś ca skandhāṃś cottamaśākhinām
GE09ram_05_u:2566: 5.028.025a mama rūpaṃ ca saṃprekṣya vanaṃ vicarato mahat
GE09ram_05_u:2568: 5.028.026a tataḥ kuryuḥ samāhvānaṃ rākṣasyo rakṣasām api
GE09ram_05_u:2572: 5.028.028a saṃkruddhas tais tu parito vidhaman rakṣasāṃ balam
GE09ram_05_u:2573: 5.028.028c śaknuyaṃ na tu saṃprāptuṃ paraṃ pāraṃ mahodadheḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2574: 5.028.029a māṃ vā gṛhṇīyur āplutya bahavaḥ śīghrakāriṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2575: 5.028.029c syād iyaṃ cāgṛhītārthā mama ca grahaṇaṃ bhavet
GE09ram_05_u:2577: 5.028.030c vipannaṃ syāt tataḥ kāryaṃ rāmasugrīvayor idam
GE09ram_05_u:2580: 5.028.032a viśaste vā gṛhīte vā rakṣobhir mayi saṃyuge
GE09ram_05_u:2582: 5.028.033a vimṛśaṃś ca na paśyāmi yo hate mayi vānaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2584: 5.028.034a kāmaṃ hantuṃ samartho 'smi sahasrāṇy api rakṣasām
GE09ram_05_u:2585: 5.028.034c na tu śakṣyāmi saṃprāptuṃ paraṃ pāraṃ mahodadheḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2586: 5.028.035a asatyāni ca yuddhāni saṃśayo me na rocate
GE09ram_05_u:2587: 5.028.035c kaś ca niḥsaṃśayaṃ kāryaṃ kuryāt prājñaḥ sasaṃśayam
GE09ram_05_u:2588: 5.028.036a eṣa doṣo mahān hi syān mama sītābhibhāṣaṇe
GE09ram_05_u:2591: 5.028.037c viklavaṃ dūtam āsādya tamaḥ sūryodaye yathā
GE09ram_05_u:2594: 5.028.039a na vinaśyet kathaṃ kāryaṃ vaiklavyaṃ na kathaṃ bhavet
GE09ram_05_u:2595: 5.028.039c laṅghanaṃ ca samudrasya kathaṃ nu na vṛthā bhavet
GE09ram_05_u:2596: 5.028.040a kathaṃ nu khalu vākyaṃ me śṛṇuyān nodvijeta ca
GE09ram_05_u:2597: 5.028.040c iti saṃcintya hanumāṃś cakāra matimān matim
GE09ram_05_u:2603: 5.028.043c śraddhāsyati yathā hīyaṃ tathā sarvaṃ samādadhe
GE09ram_05_u:2609: 5.029.001c saṃśrave madhuraṃ vākyaṃ vaidehyā vyājahāra ha
GE09ram_05_u:2622: 5.029.007c sabhāryaḥ saha ca bhrātrā vīraḥ pravrajito vanam
GE09ram_05_u:2625: 5.029.008e tatas tv amarṣāpahṛtā jānakī rāvaṇena tu
GE09ram_05_u:2629: 5.029.010c jānakī cāpi tac chrutvā vismayaṃ paramaṃ gatā
GE09ram_05_u:2632: 5.029.012a sā tiryag ūrdhvaṃ ca tathāpy adhastān;
GE09ram_05_u:2637: 5.030.001c sā dadarśa kapiṃ tatra praśritaṃ priyavādinam
GE09ram_05_u:2638: 5.030.002a sā tu dṛṣṭvā hariśreṣṭhaṃ vinītavad upasthitam
GE09ram_05_u:2639: 5.030.002c maithilī cintayām āsa svapno 'yam iti bhāminī
GE09ram_05_u:2648: 5.030.005a svapno 'pi nāyaṃ na hi me 'sti nidrā;
GE09ram_05_u:2650: 5.030.005c sukhaṃ hi me nāsti yato 'smi hīnā;
GE09ram_05_u:2658: 5.030.007c kiṃ kāraṇaṃ tasya hi nāsti rūpaṃ;
GE09ram_05_u:2665: 5.031.001c śirasy añjalim ādhāya sītāṃ madhurayā girā
GE09ram_05_u:2667: 5.031.002c drumasya śākhām ālambya tiṣṭhasi tvam aninditā
GE09ram_05_u:2668: 5.031.003a kimarthaṃ tava netrābhyāṃ vāri sravati śokajam
GE09ram_05_u:2671: 5.031.004c yakṣāṇāṃ kiṃnarāṇāṃ ca kā tvaṃ bhavasi śobhane
GE09ram_05_u:2672: 5.031.005a kā tvaṃ bhavasi rudrāṇāṃ marutāṃ vā varānane
GE09ram_05_u:2673: 5.031.005c vasūnāṃ vā varārohe devatā pratibhāsi me
GE09ram_05_u:2674: 5.031.006a kiṃ nu candramasā hīnā patitā vibudhālayāt
GE09ram_05_u:2676: 5.031.007a kopād vā yadi vā mohād bhartāram asitekṣaṇā
GE09ram_05_u:2677: 5.031.007c vasiṣṭhaṃ kopayitvā tvaṃ nāsi kalyāṇy arundhatī
GE09ram_05_u:2678: 5.031.008a ko nau putraḥ pitā bhrāta bhartā vā te sumadhyame
GE09ram_05_u:2679: 5.031.008c asmāl lokād amuṃ lokaṃ gataṃ tvam anuśocasi
GE09ram_05_u:2680: 5.031.009a vyañjanāni hi te yāni lakṣaṇāni ca lakṣaye
GE09ram_05_u:2683: 5.031.010c sītā tvam asi bhadraṃ te tan mamācakṣva pṛcchataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2687: 5.031.012c sītā ca nāma nāmnāhaṃ bhāryā rāmasya dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2693: 5.031.015c kaikeyī nāma bhartāraṃ devī vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:2694: 5.031.016a na pibeyaṃ na khādeyaṃ pratyahaṃ mama bhojanam
GE09ram_05_u:2695: 5.031.016c eṣa me jīvitasyānto rāmo yady abhiṣicyate
GE09ram_05_u:2696: 5.031.017a yat tad uktaṃ tvayā vākyaṃ prītyā nṛpatisattama
GE09ram_05_u:2697: 5.031.017c tac cen na vitathaṃ kāryaṃ vanaṃ gacchatu rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2698: 5.031.018a sa rājā satyavāg devyā varadānam anusmaran
GE09ram_05_u:2699: 5.031.018c mumoha vacanaṃ śrutvā kaikeyyāḥ krūram apriyam
GE09ram_05_u:2700: 5.031.019a tatas tu sthaviro rājā satyadharme vyavasthitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2701: 5.031.019c jyeṣṭhaṃ yaśasvinaṃ putraṃ rudan rājyam ayācata
GE09ram_05_u:2702: 5.031.020a sa pitur vacanaṃ śrīmān abhiṣekāt paraṃ priyam
GE09ram_05_u:2704: 5.031.021a dadyān na pratigṛhṇīyān na brūyat kiṃ cid apriyam
GE09ram_05_u:2707: 5.031.022c visṛjya manasā rājyaṃ jananyai māṃ samādiśat
GE09ram_05_u:2709: 5.031.023c na hi me tena hīnāyā vāsaḥ svarge 'pi rocate
GE09ram_05_u:2710: 5.031.024a prāg eva tu mahābhāgaḥ saumitrir mitranandanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2712: 5.031.025a te vayaṃ bhartur ādeśaṃ bahu mānyadṛḍhavratāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2713: 5.031.025c praviṣṭāḥ sma purād dṛṣṭaṃ vanaṃ gambhīradarśanam
GE09ram_05_u:2716: 5.031.027a dvau māsau tena me kālo jīvitānugrahaḥ kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2717: 5.031.027c ūrdhvaṃ dvābhyāṃ tu māsābhyāṃ tatas tyakṣyāmi jīvitam
GE09ram_05_u:2720: 5.032.002a ahaṃ rāmasya saṃdeśād devi dūtas tavāgataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2721: 5.032.002c vaidehi kuśalī rāmas tvāṃ ca kauśalam abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:2722: 5.032.003a yo brāhmam astraṃ vedāṃś ca veda vedavidāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2723: 5.032.003c sa tvāṃ dāśarathī rāmo devi kauśalam abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:2724: 5.032.004a lakṣmaṇaś ca mahātejā bhartus te 'nucaraḥ priyaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2726: 5.032.005a sā tayoḥ kuśalaṃ devī niśamya narasiṃhayoḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2728: 5.032.006a kalyāṇī bata gatheyaṃ laukikī pratibhāti me
GE09ram_05_u:2729: 5.032.006c ehi jīvantam ānado naraṃ varṣaśatād api
GE09ram_05_u:2734: 5.032.009a yathā yathā samīpaṃ sa hanūmān upasarpati
GE09ram_05_u:2735: 5.032.009c tathā tathā rāvaṇaṃ sā taṃ sītā pariśaṅkate
GE09ram_05_u:2736: 5.032.010a aho dhig dhik kṛtam idaṃ kathitaṃ hi yad asya me
GE09ram_05_u:2737: 5.032.010c rūpāntaram upāgamya sa evāyaṃ hi rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2738: 5.032.011a tām aśokasya śākhāṃ sā vimuktvā śokakarśitā
GE09ram_05_u:2742: 5.032.013a taṃ dṛṣṭvā vandamānaṃ tu sītā śaśinibhānanā
GE09ram_05_u:2744: 5.032.014a māyāṃ praviṣṭo māyāvī yadi tvaṃ rāvaṇaḥ svayam
GE09ram_05_u:2745: 5.032.014c utpādayasi me bhūyaḥ saṃtāpaṃ tan na śobhanam
GE09ram_05_u:2747: 5.032.015c janasthāne mayā dṛṣṭas tvaṃ sa evāsi rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2749: 5.032.016c saṃtāpayasi māṃ bhūyaḥ saṃtāpaṃ tan na śobhanam
GE09ram_05_u:2750: 5.032.017a yadi rāmasya dūtas tvam āgato bhadram astu te
GE09ram_05_u:2751: 5.032.017c pṛcchāmi tvāṃ hariśreṣṭha priyā rāma kathā hi me
GE09ram_05_u:2752: 5.032.018a guṇān rāmasya kathaya priyasya mama vānara
GE09ram_05_u:2753: 5.032.018c cittaṃ harasi me saumya nadīkūlaṃ yathā rayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2754: 5.032.019a aho svapnasya sukhatā yāham evaṃ cirāhṛtā
GE09ram_05_u:2756: 5.032.020a svapne 'pi yady ahaṃ vīraṃ rāghavaṃ sahalakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_05_u:2758: 5.032.021a nāhaṃ svapnam imaṃ manye svapne dṛṣṭvā hi vānaram
GE09ram_05_u:2759: 5.032.021c na śakyo 'bhyudayaḥ prāptuṃ prāptaś cābhyudayo mama
GE09ram_05_u:2760: 5.032.022a kiṃ nu syāc cittamoho 'yaṃ bhaved vātagatis tv iyam
GE09ram_05_u:2761: 5.032.022c unmādajo vikāro vā syād iyaṃ mṛgatṛṣṇikā
GE09ram_05_u:2762: 5.032.023a atha vā nāyam unmādo moho 'py unmādalakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2763: 5.032.023c saṃbudhye cāham ātmānam imaṃ cāpi vanaukasaṃ
GE09ram_05_u:2764: 5.032.024a ity evaṃ bahudhā sītā saṃpradhārya balābalam
GE09ram_05_u:2766: 5.032.025a etāṃ buddhiṃ tadā kṛtvā sītā sā tanumadhyamā
GE09ram_05_u:2770: 5.032.027a āditya iva tejasvī lokakāntaḥ śaśī yathā
GE09ram_05_u:2771: 5.032.027c rājā sarvasya lokasya devo vaiśravaṇo yathā
GE09ram_05_u:2774: 5.032.029a rūpavān subhagaḥ śrīmān kandarpa iva mūrtimān
GE09ram_05_u:2778: 5.032.030c śūnye yenāpanītāsi tasya drakṣyasi yat phalam
GE09ram_05_u:2779: 5.032.031a nacirād rāvaṇaṃ saṃkhye yo vadhiṣyati vīryavān
GE09ram_05_u:2782: 5.032.032c tvadviyogena duḥkhārtaḥ sa tvāṃ kauśalam abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:2785: 5.032.034a rāmasya ca sakhā devi sugrīvo nāma vānaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2786: 5.032.034c rājā vānaramukhyānāṃ sa tvāṃ kauśalam abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:2787: 5.032.035a nityaṃ smarati rāmas tvāṃ sasugrīvaḥ salakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2788: 5.032.035c diṣṭyā jīvasi vaidehi rākṣasī vaśam āgatā
GE09ram_05_u:2789: 5.032.036a nacirād drakṣyase rāmaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahāratham
GE09ram_05_u:2795: 5.032.039a nāham asmi tathā devi yathā mām avagacchasi
GE09ram_05_u:2796: 5.032.039c viśaṅkā tyajyatām eṣā śraddhatsva vadato mama
GE09ram_05_u:2797: 5.033.001a tāṃ tu rāma kathāṃ śrutvā vaidehī vānararṣabhāt
GE09ram_05_u:2798: 5.033.001c uvāca vacanaṃ sāntvam idaṃ madhurayā girā
GE09ram_05_u:2799: 5.033.002a kva te rāmeṇa saṃsargaḥ kathaṃ jānāsi lakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_05_u:2800: 5.033.002c vānarāṇāṃ narāṇāṃ ca katham āsīt samāgamaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2801: 5.033.003a yāni rāmasya liṅgāni lakṣmaṇasya ca vānara
GE09ram_05_u:2802: 5.033.003c tāni bhūyaḥ samācakṣva na māṃ śokaḥ samāviśet
GE09ram_05_u:2803: 5.033.004a kīdṛśaṃ tasya saṃsthānaṃ rūpaṃ rāmasya kīdṛśam
GE09ram_05_u:2804: 5.033.004c katham ūrū kathaṃ bāhū lakṣmaṇasya ca śaṃsa me
GE09ram_05_u:2805: 5.033.005a evam uktas tu vaidehyā hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2807: 5.033.006a jānantī bata diṣṭyā māṃ vaidehi paripṛcchasi
GE09ram_05_u:2809: 5.033.007a yāni rāmasya cihnāni lakṣmaṇasya ca yāni vai
GE09ram_05_u:2810: 5.033.007c lakṣitāni viśālākṣi vadataḥ śṛṇu tāni me
GE09ram_05_u:2816: 5.033.010c rakṣitā svasya vṛttasya dharmasya ca paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2818: 5.033.011c maryādānāṃ ca lokasya kartā kārayitā ca saḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2824: 5.033.014c dhanurvede ca vede ca vedāṅgeṣu ca niṣṭhitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2826: 5.033.015c gūḍhajatruḥ sutāmrākṣo rāmo devi janaiḥ śrutaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2829: 5.033.017a tristhiras tripralambaś ca trisamas triṣu connataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2838: 5.033.021a bhrātā ca tasya dvaimātraḥ saumitrir aparājitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2840: 5.033.022a tvām eva mārgamāṇo tau vicarantau vasuṃdharām
GE09ram_05_u:2844: 5.033.024a vayaṃ tu harirājaṃ taṃ sugrīvaṃ satyasaṃgaram
GE09ram_05_u:2848: 5.033.026a sa tau dṛṣṭvā naravyāghrau dhanvinau vānararṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2850: 5.033.027a tataḥ sa śikhare tasmin vānarendro vyavasthitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2851: 5.033.027c tayoḥ samīpaṃ mām eva preṣayām āsa satvaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2855: 5.033.029c pṛṣṭham āropya taṃ deśaṃ prāpitau puruṣarṣabhau
GE09ram_05_u:2860: 5.033.032a taṃ tataḥ sāntvayām āsa sugrīvaṃ lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2861: 5.033.032c strīhetor vālinā bhrātrā nirastam uru tejasā
GE09ram_05_u:2864: 5.033.034a sa śrutvā vānarendras tu lakṣmaṇeneritaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2869: 5.033.036c saṃhṛṣṭā darśayām āsur gatiṃ tu na vidus tava
GE09ram_05_u:2872: 5.033.038a tāny aṅke darśanīyāni kṛtvā bahuvidhaṃ tataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2874: 5.033.039a paśyatas tasyā rudatas tāmyataś ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2876: 5.033.040a śayitaṃ ca ciraṃ tena duḥkhārtena mahātmanā
GE09ram_05_u:2877: 5.033.040c mayāpi vividhair vākyaiḥ kṛcchrād utthāpitaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2878: 5.033.041a tāni dṛṣṭvā mahārhāṇi darśayitvā muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2882: 5.033.043a tvatkṛte tam anidrā ca śokaś cintā ca rāghavam
GE09ram_05_u:2887: 5.033.045c caran na ratim āpnoti tvam apaśyan nṛpātmaje
GE09ram_05_u:2888: 5.033.046a sa tvāṃ manujaśārdūlaḥ kṣipraṃ prāpsyati rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2891: 5.033.047c samayaṃ vālinaṃ hantuṃ tava cānveṣaṇaṃ tathā
GE09ram_05_u:2892: 5.033.048a tato nihatya tarasā rāmo vālinam āhave
GE09ram_05_u:2895: 5.033.049c hanūmantaṃ ca māṃ viddhi tayor dūtam ihāgatam
GE09ram_05_u:2897: 5.033.050c tvadarthaṃ preṣayām āsa diśo daśa mahābalān
GE09ram_05_u:2905: 5.033.054c bhayāc ca kapirājasya prāṇāṃs tyaktuṃ vyavasthitāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2907: 5.033.055c anāsādya padaṃ devyāḥ prāṇāṃs tyaktuṃ vyavasthitāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2909: 5.033.056c tava nāśaṃ ca vaidehi vālinaś ca tathā vadham
GE09ram_05_u:2914: 5.033.058c śrutvā bhrātṛvadhaṃ kopād idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:2915: 5.033.059a yavīyān kena me bhrātā hataḥ kva ca vināśitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2919: 5.033.061a jaṭāyos tu vadhaṃ śrutvā duḥkhitaḥ so 'ruṇātmajaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2920: 5.033.061c tvām āha sa varārohe vasantīṃ rāvaṇālaye
GE09ram_05_u:2925: 5.033.063c vyavadhūya bhayaṃ tīvraṃ yojanānāṃ śataṃ plutaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2926: 5.033.064a laṅkā cāpi mayā rātrau praviṣṭā rākṣasākulā
GE09ram_05_u:2927: 5.033.064c rāvaṇaś ca mayā dṛṣṭas tvaṃ ca śokanipīḍitā
GE09ram_05_u:2928: 5.033.065a etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ yathāvṛttam anindite
GE09ram_05_u:2929: 5.033.065c abhibhāṣasva māṃ devi dūto dāśarather aham
GE09ram_05_u:2933: 5.033.067c guror ārādhane yukto lakṣmaṇaś ca sulakṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2934: 5.033.068a tasya vīryavato devi bhartus tava hite rataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2935: 5.033.068c aham ekas tu saṃprāptaḥ sugrīvavacanād iha
GE09ram_05_u:2940: 5.033.071a diṣṭyā hi na mama vyarthaṃ devi sāgaralaṅghanam
GE09ram_05_u:2941: 5.033.071c prāpsyāmy aham idaṃ diṣṭyā tvaddarśanakṛtaṃ yaśaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2942: 5.033.072a rāghavaś ca mahāvīryaḥ kṣipraṃ tvām abhipatsyate
GE09ram_05_u:2944: 5.033.073a kaurajo nāma vaidehi girīṇām uttamo giriḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2945: 5.033.073c tato gacchati gokarṇaṃ parvataṃ kesarī hariḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2946: 5.033.074a sa ca devarṣibhir dṛṣṭaḥ pitā mama mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2948: 5.033.075a tasyāhaṃ hariṇaḥ kṣetre jāto vātena maithili
GE09ram_05_u:2949: 5.033.075c hanūmān iti vikhyāto loke svenaiva karmaṇā
GE09ram_05_u:2950: 5.033.075e viśvāsārthaṃ tu vaidehi bhartur uktā mayā guṇāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2953: 5.033.077a atulaṃ ca gatā harṣaṃ praharṣeṇa tu jānakī
GE09ram_05_u:2957: 5.033.078e hanūmantaṃ kapiṃ vyaktaṃ manyate nānyatheti sā
GE09ram_05_u:2967: 5.034.002e samāśvasihi bhadraṃ te kṣīṇaduḥkhaphalā hy asi
GE09ram_05_u:2972: 5.034.005a tataḥ sā hrīmatī bālā bhartuḥ saṃdeśaharṣitā
GE09ram_05_u:2974: 5.034.006a vikrāntas tvaṃ samarthas tvaṃ prājñas tvaṃ vānarottama
GE09ram_05_u:2978: 5.034.008a na hi tvāṃ prākṛtaṃ manye vanaraṃ vanararṣabha
GE09ram_05_u:2979: 5.034.008c yasya te nāsti saṃtrāso rāvaṇān nāpi saṃbhramaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2981: 5.034.009c yady asi preṣitas tena rāmeṇa viditātmanā
