GE09ram_05_u:2982: 5.034.010a preṣayiṣyati durdharṣo rāmo na hy aparīkṣitam
GE09ram_05_u:2984: 5.034.011a diṣṭyā ca kuśalī rāmo dharmātmā dharmavatsalaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2986: 5.034.012a kuśalī yadi kākutsthaḥ kiṃ nu sāgaramekhalām
GE09ram_05_u:2988: 5.034.013a atha vā śaktimantau tau surāṇām api nigrahe
GE09ram_05_u:2989: 5.034.013c mamaiva tu na duḥkhānām asti manye viparyayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2990: 5.034.014a kaccic ca vyathate rāmaḥ kaccin na paripatyate
GE09ram_05_u:2992: 5.034.015a kaccin na dīnaḥ saṃbhrāntaḥ kāryeṣu ca na muhyati
GE09ram_05_u:2995: 5.034.016c vijigīṣuḥ suhṛt kaccin mitreṣu ca paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2996: 5.034.017a kaccin mitrāṇi labhate mitraiś cāpy abhigamyate
GE09ram_05_u:2997: 5.034.017c kaccit kalyāṇamitraś ca mitraiś cāpi puraskṛtaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2999: 5.034.018c kaccit puruṣakāraṃ ca daivaṃ ca pratipadyate
GE09ram_05_u:3000: 5.034.019a kaccin na vigatasneho vivāsān mayi rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3001: 5.034.019c kaccin māṃ vyasanād asmān mokṣayiṣyati vānaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3003: 5.034.020c duḥkham uttaram āsādya kaccid rāmo na sīdati
GE09ram_05_u:3004: 5.034.021a kausalyāyās tathā kaccit sumitrāyās tathaiva ca
GE09ram_05_u:3005: 5.034.021c abhīkṣṇaṃ śrūyate kaccit kuśalaṃ bharatasya ca
GE09ram_05_u:3007: 5.034.022c kaccin nānyamanā rāmaḥ kaccin māṃ tārayiṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:3014: 5.034.026a raudreṇa kaccid astreṇa rāmeṇa nihataṃ raṇe
GE09ram_05_u:3022: 5.034.028c nāsīd vyathā yasya na bhīr na śokaḥ;
GE09ram_05_u:3024: 5.034.029a na cāsya mātā na pitā na cānyaḥ;
GE09ram_05_u:3033: 5.034.031c śirasy añjalim ādhāya vākyam uttaram abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:3034: 5.034.032a na tvām ihasthāṃ jānīte rāmaḥ kamalalocanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3035: 5.034.032c śrutvaiva tu vaco mahyaṃ kṣipram eṣyati rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3039: 5.034.034a tatra yady antarā mṛtyur yadi devāḥ sahāsurāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3040: 5.034.034c sthāsyanti pathi rāmasya sa tān api vadhiṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:3042: 5.034.035c na śarma labhate rāmaḥ siṃhārdita iva dvipaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3043: 5.034.036a dardareṇa ca te devi śape mūlaphalena ca
GE09ram_05_u:3044: 5.034.036c malayena ca vindhyena meruṇā mandareṇa ca
GE09ram_05_u:3047: 5.034.038a kṣipraṃ drakṣyasi vaidehi rāmaṃ prasravaṇe girau
GE09ram_05_u:3049: 5.034.039a na māṃsaṃ rāghavo bhuṅkte na cāpi madhusevate
GE09ram_05_u:3050: 5.034.039c vanyaṃ suvihitaṃ nityaṃ bhaktam aśnāti pañcamam
GE09ram_05_u:3051: 5.034.040a naiva daṃśān na maśakān na kīṭān na sarīsṛpān
GE09ram_05_u:3054: 5.034.041c nānyac cintayate kiṃ cit sa tu kāmavaśaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3055: 5.034.042a anidraḥ satataṃ rāmaḥ supto 'pi ca narottamaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3057: 5.034.043a dṛṣṭvā phalaṃ vā puṣpaṃ vā yac cānyat strīmanoharam
GE09ram_05_u:3058: 5.034.043c bahuśo hā priyety evaṃ śvasaṃs tvām abhibhāṣate
GE09ram_05_u:3070: 5.035.002c yac ca nānyamanā rāmo yac ca śokaparāyaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3071: 5.035.003a aiśvarye vā suvistīrṇe vyasane vā sudāruṇe
GE09ram_05_u:3074: 5.035.004c saumitriṃ māṃ ca rāmaṃ ca vyasanaiḥ paśya mohitān
GE09ram_05_u:3077: 5.035.006a rākṣasānāṃ kṣayaṃ kṛtvā sūdayitvā ca rāvaṇam
GE09ram_05_u:3078: 5.035.006c laṅkām unmūlitāṃ kṛtvā kadā drakṣyati māṃ patiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3079: 5.035.007a sa vācyaḥ saṃtvarasveti yāvad eva na pūryate
GE09ram_05_u:3080: 5.035.007c ayaṃ saṃvatsaraḥ kālas tāvad dhi mama jīvitam
GE09ram_05_u:3081: 5.035.008a vartate daśamo māso dvau tu śeṣau plavaṃgama
GE09ram_05_u:3082: 5.035.008c rāvaṇena nṛśaṃsena samayo yaḥ kṛto mama
GE09ram_05_u:3083: 5.035.009a vibhīṣaṇena ca bhrātrā mama niryātanaṃ prati
GE09ram_05_u:3084: 5.035.009c anunītaḥ prayatnena na ca tat kurute matim
GE09ram_05_u:3085: 5.035.010a mama pratipradānaṃ hi rāvaṇasya na rocate
GE09ram_05_u:3086: 5.035.010c rāvaṇaṃ mārgate saṃkhye mṛtyuḥ kālavaśaṃ gatam
GE09ram_05_u:3088: 5.035.011c tayā mamaitad ākhyātaṃ mātrā prahitayā svayam
GE09ram_05_u:3092: 5.035.013c na ca tasyāpi duṣṭātmā śṛṇoti vacanaṃ hitam
GE09ram_05_u:3093: 5.035.014a āśaṃseti hariśreṣṭha kṣipraṃ māṃ prāpsyate patiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3094: 5.035.014c antarātmā hi me śuddhas tasmiṃś ca bahavo guṇāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3096: 5.035.015c vikramaś ca prabhāvaś ca santi vānararāghave
GE09ram_05_u:3098: 5.035.016c janasthāne vinā bhrātrā śatruḥ kas tasya nodvijet
GE09ram_05_u:3099: 5.035.017a na sa śakyas tulayituṃ vyasanaiḥ puruṣarṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3105: 5.035.020a śrutvaiva tu vaco mahyaṃ kṣipram eṣyati rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3107: 5.035.021a atha vā mocayiṣyāmi tām adyaiva hi rākṣasāt
GE09ram_05_u:3108: 5.035.021c asmād duḥkhād upāroha mama pṛṣṭham anindite
GE09ram_05_u:3109: 5.035.022a tvaṃ hi pṛṣṭhagatāṃ kṛtvā saṃtariṣyāmi sāgaram
GE09ram_05_u:3110: 5.035.022c śaktir asti hi me voḍhuṃ laṅkām api sarāvaṇām
GE09ram_05_u:3117: 5.035.026a pṛṣṭham āroha me devi mā vikāṅkṣasva śobhane
GE09ram_05_u:3121: 5.035.028a na hi me saṃprayātasya tvām ito nayato 'ṅgane
GE09ram_05_u:3124: 5.035.029c yāsyāmi paśya vaidehi tvām udyamya vihāyasaṃ
GE09ram_05_u:3125: 5.035.030a maithilī tu hariśreṣṭhāc chrutvā vacanam adbhutam
GE09ram_05_u:3127: 5.035.031a hanūman dūram adhvanaṃ kathaṃ māṃ voḍhum icchasi
GE09ram_05_u:3128: 5.035.031c tad eva khalu te manye kapitvaṃ hariyūthapa
GE09ram_05_u:3129: 5.035.032a kathaṃ vālpaśarīras tvaṃ mām ito netum icchasi
GE09ram_05_u:3132: 5.035.033c cintayām āsa lakṣmīvān navaṃ paribhavaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_05_u:3133: 5.035.034a na me jānāti sattvaṃ vā prabhāvaṃ vāsitekṣaṇā
GE09ram_05_u:3134: 5.035.034c tasmāt paśyatu vaidehī yad rūpaṃ mama kāmataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3137: 5.035.036a sa tasmāt pādapād dhīmān āplutya plavagarṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3144: 5.035.039c laṅkām imāṃ sanathāṃ vā nayituṃ śaktir asti me
GE09ram_05_u:3145: 5.035.040a tad avasthāpya tāṃ buddhir alaṃ devi vikāṅkṣayā
GE09ram_05_u:3149: 5.035.042a tava sattvaṃ balaṃ caiva vijānāmi mahākape
GE09ram_05_u:3150: 5.035.042c vāyor iva gatiṃ cāpi tejaś cāgnir ivādbhutam
GE09ram_05_u:3151: 5.035.043a prākṛto 'nyaḥ kathaṃ cemāṃ bhūmim āgantum arhati
GE09ram_05_u:3153: 5.035.044a jānāmi gamane śaktiṃ nayane cāpi te mama
GE09ram_05_u:3155: 5.035.045a ayuktaṃ tu kapiśreṣṭha mayā gantuṃ tvayā saha
GE09ram_05_u:3157: 5.035.046a aham ākāśam āsaktā upary upari sāgaram
GE09ram_05_u:3158: 5.035.046c prapateyaṃ hi te pṛṣṭhād bhayād vegena gacchataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3160: 5.035.047c bhayeyam āśu vivaśā yādasām annam uttamam
GE09ram_05_u:3161: 5.035.048a na ca śakṣye tvayā sārdhaṃ gantuṃ śatruvināśana
GE09ram_05_u:3162: 5.035.048c kalatravati saṃdehas tvayy api syād asaṃśayam
GE09ram_05_u:3163: 5.035.049a hriyamāṇāṃ tu māṃ dṛṣṭvā rākṣasā bhīmavikramāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3165: 5.035.050a tais tvaṃ parivṛtaḥ śūraiḥ śūlam udgara pāṇibhiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3166: 5.035.050c bhaves tvaṃ saṃśayaṃ prāpto mayā vīra kalatravān
GE09ram_05_u:3167: 5.035.051a sāyudhā bahavo vyomni rākṣasās tvaṃ nirāyudhaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3168: 5.035.051c kathaṃ śakṣyasi saṃyātuṃ māṃ caiva parirakṣitum
GE09ram_05_u:3170: 5.035.052c prapateyaṃ hi te pṛṣṭhad bhayārtā kapisattama
GE09ram_05_u:3171: 5.035.053a atha rakṣāṃsi bhīmāni mahānti balavanti ca
GE09ram_05_u:3172: 5.035.053c kathaṃ cit sāmparāye tvāṃ jayeyuḥ kapisattama
GE09ram_05_u:3173: 5.035.054a atha vā yudhyamānasya pateyaṃ vimukhasya te
GE09ram_05_u:3174: 5.035.054c patitāṃ ca gṛhītvā māṃ nayeyuḥ pāparākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3175: 5.035.055a māṃ vā hareyus tvaddhastād viśaseyur athāpi vā
GE09ram_05_u:3178: 5.035.056c tvatprayatno hariśreṣṭha bhaven niṣphala eva tu
GE09ram_05_u:3179: 5.035.057a kāmaṃ tvam api paryāpto nihantuṃ sarvarākṣasān
GE09ram_05_u:3180: 5.035.057c rāghavasya yaśo hīyet tvayā śastais tu rākṣasaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3181: 5.035.058a atha vādāya rakṣāṃsi nyasyeyuḥ saṃvṛte hi mām
GE09ram_05_u:3182: 5.035.058c yatra te nābhijānīyur harayo nāpi rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3183: 5.035.059a ārambhas tu madartho 'yaṃ tatas tava nirarthakaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3184: 5.035.059c tvayā hi saha rāmasya mahān āgamane guṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3186: 5.035.060c bhrātṝṇāṃ ca mahābāho tava rājakulasya ca
GE09ram_05_u:3189: 5.035.062a bhartur bhaktiṃ puraskṛtya rāmād anyasya vānara
GE09ram_05_u:3190: 5.035.062c nāhaṃ spraṣṭuṃ padā gātram iccheyaṃ vānarottama
GE09ram_05_u:3191: 5.035.063a yad ahaṃ gātrasaṃsparśaṃ rāvaṇasya gatā balāt
GE09ram_05_u:3192: 5.035.063c anīśā kiṃ kariṣyāmi vināthā vivaśā satī
GE09ram_05_u:3193: 5.035.064a yadi rāmo daśagrīvam iha hatvā sarākṣasaṃ
GE09ram_05_u:3194: 5.035.064c mām ito gṛhya gaccheta tat tasya sadṛśaṃ bhavet
GE09ram_05_u:3195: 5.035.065a śrutā hi dṛṣṭāś ca mayā parākramā;
GE09ram_05_u:3211: 5.036.001a tataḥ sa kapiśārdūlas tena vākyena harṣitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3212: 5.036.001c sītām uvāca tac chrutvā vākyaṃ vākyaviśāradaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3215: 5.036.003a strītvaṃ na tu samarthaṃ hi sāgaraṃ vyativartitum
GE09ram_05_u:3217: 5.036.004a dvitīyaṃ kāraṇaṃ yac ca bravīṣi vinayānvite
GE09ram_05_u:3218: 5.036.004c rāmād anyasya nārhāmi saṃsparśam iti jānaki
GE09ram_05_u:3219: 5.036.005a etat te devi sadṛśaṃ patnyās tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3220: 5.036.005c kā hy anyā tvām ṛte devi brūyād vacanam īdṛśam
GE09ram_05_u:3222: 5.036.006c ceṣṭitaṃ yat tvayā devi bhāṣitaṃ mama cāgrataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3228: 5.036.009c gurusnehena bhaktyā ca nānyathā tad udāhṛtam
GE09ram_05_u:3229: 5.036.010a yadi notsahase yātuṃ mayā sārdham anindite
GE09ram_05_u:3230: 5.036.010c abhijñānaṃ prayaccha tvaṃ jānīyād rāghavo hi yat
GE09ram_05_u:3233: 5.036.012a idaṃ śreṣṭham abhijñānaṃ brūyās tvaṃ tu mama priyam
GE09ram_05_u:3241: 5.036.016c tam ahaṃ loṣṭam udyamya vārayāmi sma vāyasaṃ
GE09ram_05_u:3242: 5.036.017a dārayan sa ca māṃ kākas tatraiva parilīyate
GE09ram_05_u:3243: 5.036.017c na cāpy uparaman māṃsād bhakṣārthī balibhojanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3244: 5.036.018a utkarṣantyāṃ ca raśanāṃ kruddhāyāṃ mayi pakṣiṇe
GE09ram_05_u:3245: 5.036.018c sraṃsamāne ca vasane tato dṛṣṭā tvayā hy aham
GE09ram_05_u:3246: 5.036.019a tvayā vihasitā cāhaṃ kruddhā saṃlajjitā tadā
GE09ram_05_u:3247: 5.036.019c bhakṣya gṛddhena kālena dāritā tvām upāgatā
GE09ram_05_u:3248: 5.036.020a āsīnasya ca te śrāntā punar utsaṅgam āviśam
GE09ram_05_u:3252: 5.036.022a āśīviṣa iva kruddhaḥ śvasān vākyam abhāṣathāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3253: 5.036.022c kena te nāganāsoru vikṣataṃ vai stanāntaram
GE09ram_05_u:3255: 5.036.023a vīkṣamāṇas tatas taṃ vai vāyasaṃ samavaikṣathāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3256: 5.036.023c nakhaiḥ sarudhirais tīkṣṇair mām evābhimukhaṃ sthitam
GE09ram_05_u:3257: 5.036.024a putraḥ kila sa śakrasya vāyasaḥ patatāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3260: 5.036.025c vāyase kṛtavān krūrāṃ matiṃ matimatāṃ vara
GE09ram_05_u:3262: 5.036.026c sa dīpta iva kālāgnir jajvālābhimukho dvijam
GE09ram_05_u:3263: 5.036.027a cikṣepitha pradīptāṃ tām iṣīkāṃ vāyasaṃ prati
GE09ram_05_u:3264: 5.036.027c anusṛṣṭas tadā kālo jagāma vividhāṃ gatim
GE09ram_05_u:3265: 5.036.027e trāṇakāma imaṃ lokaṃ sarvaṃ vai vicacāra ha
GE09ram_05_u:3266: 5.036.028a sa pitrā ca parityaktaḥ suraiḥ sarvair maharṣibhiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3267: 5.036.028c trīṃl lokān saṃparikramya tvām eva śaraṇaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3268: 5.036.029a taṃ tvaṃ nipatitaṃ bhūmau śaraṇyaḥ śaraṇāgatam
GE09ram_05_u:3270: 5.036.029e na śarma labdhvā lokeṣu tvām eva śaraṇaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3271: 5.036.030a paridyūnaṃ viṣaṇṇaṃ ca sa tvam āyāntam uktavān
GE09ram_05_u:3272: 5.036.030c moghaṃ kartuṃ na śakyaṃ tu brāhmam astraṃ tad ucyatām
GE09ram_05_u:3273: 5.036.031a tatas tasyākṣi kākasya hinasti sma sa dakṣiṇam
GE09ram_05_u:3274: 5.036.032a sa te tadā namaskṛtvā rājñe daśarathāya ca
GE09ram_05_u:3275: 5.036.032c tvayā vīra visṛṣṭas tu pratipede svam ālayam
GE09ram_05_u:3277: 5.036.033c kasmād yo māṃ harat tvattaḥ kṣamase taṃ mahīpate
GE09ram_05_u:3278: 5.036.034a sa kuruṣva mahotsāhaṃ kṛpāṃ mayi nararṣabha
GE09ram_05_u:3279: 5.036.034c ānṛśaṃsyaṃ paro dharmas tvatta eva mayā śrutaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3283: 5.036.036a evam astravidāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ sattvavān balavān api
GE09ram_05_u:3284: 5.036.036c kimartham astraṃ rakṣaḥsu na yojayasi rāghava
GE09ram_05_u:3285: 5.036.037a na nāgā nāpi gandharvā nāsurā na marudgaṇāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3286: 5.036.037c rāmasya samare vegaṃ śaktāḥ prati samādhitum
GE09ram_05_u:3287: 5.036.038a tasyā vīryavataḥ kaś cid yady asti mayi saṃbhramaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3288: 5.036.038c kimarthaṃ na śarais tīkṣṇaiḥ kṣayaṃ nayati rākṣasān
GE09ram_05_u:3289: 5.036.039a bhrātur ādeśam ādāya lakṣmaṇo vā paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3290: 5.036.039c kasya hetor na māṃ vīraḥ paritrāti mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3292: 5.036.040c surāṇām api durdharṣo kimarthaṃ mām upekṣataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3293: 5.036.041a mamaiva duṣkṛtaṃ kiṃ cin mahad asti na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3294: 5.036.041c samarthāv api tau yan māṃ nāvekṣete paraṃtapau
GE09ram_05_u:3296: 5.036.042c taṃ mamārthe sukhaṃ pṛccha śirasā cābhivādaya
GE09ram_05_u:3297: 5.036.043a srajaś ca sarvaratnāni priyā yāś ca varāṅganāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3298: 5.036.043c aiśvaryaṃ ca viśālāyāṃ pṛthivyām api durlabham
GE09ram_05_u:3304: 5.036.046a pitṛvad vartate rāme mātṛvan māṃ samācaran
GE09ram_05_u:3305: 5.036.046c hriyamāṇāṃ tadā vīro na tu māṃ veda lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3308: 5.036.048a mattaḥ priyataro nityaṃ bhrātā rāmasya lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3309: 5.036.048c niyukto dhuri yasyāṃ tu tām udvahati vīryavān
GE09ram_05_u:3310: 5.036.049a yaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāghavo naiva vṛddham āryam anusmarat
GE09ram_05_u:3311: 5.036.049c sa mamārthāya kuśalaṃ vaktavyo vacanān mama
GE09ram_05_u:3312: 5.036.049e mṛdur nityaṃ śucir dakṣaḥ priyo rāmasya lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3313: 5.036.050a idaṃ brūyāś ca me nāthaṃ śūraṃ rāmaṃ punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3315: 5.036.050e ūrdhvaṃ māsān na jīveyaṃ satyenāhaṃ bravīmi te
GE09ram_05_u:3317: 5.036.051c trātum arhasi vīra tvaṃ pātālād iva kauśikīm
GE09ram_05_u:3318: 5.036.052a tato vastragataṃ muktvā divyaṃ cūḍāmaṇiṃ śubham
GE09ram_05_u:3321: 5.036.053c aṅgulyā yojayām āsa na hy asyā prābhavad bhujaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3323: 5.036.054c sītāṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā praṇataḥ pārśvataḥ sthitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3325: 5.036.055c hṛdayena gato rāmaṃ śarīreṇa tu viṣṭhitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3330: 5.037.001a maṇiṃ dattvā tataḥ sītā hanūmantam athābravīt
GE09ram_05_u:3332: 5.037.002a maṇiṃ tu dṛṣṭvā rāmo vai trayāṇāṃ saṃsmariṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:3333: 5.037.002c vīro jananyā mama ca rājño daśarathasya ca
GE09ram_05_u:3334: 5.037.003a sa bhūyas tvaṃ samutsāhe codito harisattama
GE09ram_05_u:3337: 5.037.004c tasya cintaya yo yatno duḥkhakṣayakaro bhavet
GE09ram_05_u:3343: 5.037.007c sugrīvaṃ ca sahāmātyaṃ vṛddhān sarvāṃś ca vānarān
GE09ram_05_u:3344: 5.037.008a yathā ca sa mahābāhur māṃ tārayati rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3346: 5.037.009a jīvantīṃ māṃ yathā rāmaḥ saṃbhāvayati kīrtimān
GE09ram_05_u:3347: 5.037.009c tat tvayā hanuman vācyaṃ vācā dharmam avāpnuhi
GE09ram_05_u:3348: 5.037.010a nityam utsāhayuktāś ca vācaḥ śrutvā mayeritāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3352: 5.037.012a sītāyās tad vacaḥ śrutvā hanumān mārutātmajaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3353: 5.037.012c śirasy añjalim ādhāya vākyam uttaram abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:3355: 5.037.013c yas te yudhi vijityārīñ śokaṃ vyapanayiṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:3356: 5.037.014a na hi paśyāmi martyeṣu nāmareṣv asureṣu vā
GE09ram_05_u:3357: 5.037.014c yas tasya vamato bāṇān sthātum utsahate 'grataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3358: 5.037.015a apy arkam api parjanyam api vaivasvataṃ yamam
GE09ram_05_u:3359: 5.037.015c sa hi soḍhuṃ raṇe śaktas tavahetor viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3360: 5.037.016a sa hi sāgaraparyantāṃ mahīṃ śāsitum īhate
GE09ram_05_u:3361: 5.037.016c tvan nimitto hi rāmasya jayo janakanandini
GE09ram_05_u:3362: 5.037.017a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā samyak satyaṃ subhāṣitam
GE09ram_05_u:3363: 5.037.017c jānakī bahu mene 'tha vacanaṃ cedam abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:3364: 5.037.018a tatas taṃ prasthitaṃ sītā vīkṣamāṇā punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3366: 5.037.019a yadi vā manyase vīra vasaikāham ariṃdama
GE09ram_05_u:3367: 5.037.019c kasmiṃś cit saṃvṛte deśe viśrāntaḥ śvo gamiṣyasi
GE09ram_05_u:3368: 5.037.020a mama ced alpabhāgyāyāḥ sāmnidhyāt tava vīryavān
GE09ram_05_u:3369: 5.037.020c asya śokasya mahato muhūrtaṃ mokṣaṇaṃ bhavet
GE09ram_05_u:3371: 5.037.021c prāṇānām api saṃdeho mama syān nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3374: 5.037.023a ayaṃ ca vīra saṃdehas tiṣṭhatīva mamāgrataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3376: 5.037.024a kathaṃ nu khalu duṣpāraṃ tariṣyanti mahodadhim
GE09ram_05_u:3379: 5.037.025c śaktiḥ syād vainateyasya tava vā mārutasya vā
GE09ram_05_u:3381: 5.037.026c kiṃ paśyasi samādhānaṃ tvaṃ hi kāryavidāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3382: 5.037.027a kāmam asya tvam evaikaḥ kāryasya parisādhane
GE09ram_05_u:3384: 5.037.028a balaiḥ samagrair yadi māṃ rāvaṇaṃ jitya saṃyuge
GE09ram_05_u:3385: 5.037.028c vijayī svapuraṃ yāyāt tat tu me syād yaśaskaram
GE09ram_05_u:3386: 5.037.029a balais tu saṃkulāṃ kṛtvā laṅkāṃ parabalārdanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3387: 5.037.029c māṃ nayed yadi kākutsthas tat tasya sadṛśaṃ bhavet
GE09ram_05_u:3388: 5.037.030a tad yathā tasya vikrāntam anurūpaṃ mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3389: 5.037.030c bhaved āhava śūrasya tathā tvam upapādaya
GE09ram_05_u:3391: 5.037.031c niśamya hanumāñ śeṣaṃ vākyam uttaram abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:3398: 5.037.035a yeṣāṃ nopari nādhastān na tiryak sajjate gatiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3399: 5.037.035c na ca karmasu sīdanti mahatsv amitatejasaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3402: 5.037.037a madviśiṣṭāś ca tulyāś ca santi tatra vanaukasaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3403: 5.037.037c mattaḥ pratyavaraḥ kaś cin nāsti sugrīvasaṃnidhau
GE09ram_05_u:3404: 5.037.038a ahaṃ tāvad iha prāptaḥ kiṃ punas te mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3405: 5.037.038c na hi prakṛṣṭāḥ preṣyante preṣyante hītare janāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3406: 5.037.039a tad alaṃ paritāpena devi śoko vyapaitu te
GE09ram_05_u:3408: 5.037.040a mama pṛṣṭhagatau tau ca candrasūryāv ivoditau
GE09ram_05_u:3410: 5.037.041a tau hi vīrau naravarau sahitau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_05_u:3414: 5.037.043a tad āśvasihi bhadraṃ te bhava tvaṃ kālakāṅkṣiṇī
GE09ram_05_u:3418: 5.037.045a kṣipraṃ tvaṃ devi śokasya pāraṃ yāsyasi maithili
GE09ram_05_u:3421: 5.037.046c gamanāya matiṃ kṛtvā vaidehīṃ punar abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:3422: 5.037.047a tam arighnaṃ kṛtātmānaṃ kṣipraṃ drakṣyasi rāghavam
GE09ram_05_u:3428: 5.037.050a sa tu marmaṇi ghoreṇa tāḍito manmatheṣuṇā
GE09ram_05_u:3429: 5.037.050c na śarma labhate rāmaḥ siṃhārdita iva dvipaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3430: 5.037.051a mā rudo devi śokena mā bhūt te manaso 'priyam
GE09ram_05_u:3431: 5.037.051c śacīva pathyā śakreṇa bhartrā nāthavatī hy asi
GE09ram_05_u:3432: 5.037.052a rāmād viśiṣṭaḥ ko 'nyo 'sti kaś cit saumitriṇā samaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3438: 5.038.001a śrutvā tu vacanaṃ tasya vāyusūnor mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3443: 5.038.003c saṃspṛśeyaṃ sakāmāhaṃ tathā kuru dayāṃ mayi
GE09ram_05_u:3447: 5.038.005c tvayā pranaṣṭe tilake taṃ kila smartum arhasi
GE09ram_05_u:3448: 5.038.006a sa vīryavān kathaṃ sītāṃ hṛtāṃ samanumanyase
GE09ram_05_u:3451: 5.038.007c etaṃ dṛṣṭvā prahṛṣyāmi vyasane tvām ivānagha
GE09ram_05_u:3452: 5.038.008a eṣa niryātitaḥ śrīmān mayā te vārisaṃbhavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3453: 5.038.008c ataḥ paraṃ na śakṣyāmi jīvituṃ śokalālasā
GE09ram_05_u:3454: 5.038.009a asahyāni ca duḥkhāni vācaś ca hṛdayacchidaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3457: 5.038.010c māsād ūrdhvaṃ na jīviṣye tvayā hīnā nṛpātmaja
GE09ram_05_u:3458: 5.038.011a ghoro rākṣasarājo 'yaṃ dṛṣṭiś ca na sukhā mayi
GE09ram_05_u:3459: 5.038.011c tvāṃ ca śrutvā vipadyantaṃ na jīveyam ahaṃ kṣaṇam
GE09ram_05_u:3462: 5.038.013a tvacchokavimukho rāmo devi satyena te śape
GE09ram_05_u:3464: 5.038.014a dṛṣṭā kathaṃ cid bhavatī na kālaḥ pariśocitum
GE09ram_05_u:3465: 5.038.014c imaṃ muhūrtaṃ duḥkhānām antaṃ drakṣyasi bhāmini
GE09ram_05_u:3468: 5.038.016a hatvā tu samare krūraṃ rāvaṇaṃ saha bāndhavam
GE09ram_05_u:3469: 5.038.016c rāghavau tvāṃ viśālākṣi svāṃ purīṃ prāpayiṣyataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3470: 5.038.017a yat tu rāmo vijānīyād abhijñānam anindite
GE09ram_05_u:3471: 5.038.017c prītisaṃjananaṃ tasya bhūyas tvaṃ dātum arhasi
GE09ram_05_u:3473: 5.038.018c etad eva hi rāmasya dṛṣṭvā matkeśabhūṣaṇam
GE09ram_05_u:3474: 5.038.018e śraddheyaṃ hanuman vākyaṃ tava vīra bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:3475: 5.038.019a sa taṃ maṇivaraṃ gṛhya śrīmān plavagasattamaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3481: 5.038.021c sugrīvaṃ ca sahāmātyaṃ sarvān brūyā anāmayam
GE09ram_05_u:3482: 5.038.022a yathā ca sa mahābāhur māṃ tārayati rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3492: 5.039.001a sa ca vāgbhiḥ praśastābhir gamiṣyan pūjitas tayā
GE09ram_05_u:3493: 5.039.001c tasmād deśād apakramya cintayām āsa vānaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3495: 5.039.002c trīn upāyān atikramya caturtha iha dṛśyate
GE09ram_05_u:3503: kathaṃ cid īyur yad ihādya mārdavam
GE09ram_05_u:3504: 5.039.005a kārye karmaṇi nirdiṣṭo yo bahūny api sādhayet
GE09ram_05_u:3506: 5.039.006a na hy ekaḥ sādhako hetuḥ svalpasyāpīha karmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3507: 5.039.006c yo hy arthaṃ bahudhā veda sa samartho 'rthasādhane
GE09ram_05_u:3512: 5.039.008a kathaṃ nu khalv adya bhavet sukhāgataṃ;
GE09ram_05_u:3519: 5.039.010c asmin bhagne tataḥ kopaṃ kariṣyati sa rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3530: 5.039.014a tatas tad dhanumān vīro babhañja pramadāvanam
GE09ram_05_u:3532: 5.039.015a tad vanaṃ mathitair vṛkṣair bhinnaiś ca salilāśayaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3547: 5.040.003c tad vanaṃ dadṛśur bhagnaṃ taṃ ca vīraṃ mahākapim
GE09ram_05_u:3548: 5.040.004a sa tā dṛṣṭva mahābāhur mahāsattvo mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3552: 5.040.006a ko 'yaṃ kasya kuto vāyaṃ kiṃnimittam ihāgataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3553: 5.040.006c kathaṃ tvayā sahānena saṃvādaḥ kṛta ity uta
GE09ram_05_u:3554: 5.040.007a ācakṣva no viśālākṣi mā bhūt te subhage bhayam
GE09ram_05_u:3555: 5.040.007c saṃvādam asitāpāṅge tvayā kiṃ kṛtavān ayam
GE09ram_05_u:3557: 5.040.008c rakṣasāṃ kāmarūpāṇāṃ vijñāne mama kā gatiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3558: 5.040.009a yūyam evāsya jānīta yo 'yaṃ yad vā kariṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:3559: 5.040.009c ahir eva aheḥ pādān vijānāti na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3560: 5.040.010a aham apy asya bhītāsmi nainaṃ jānāmi ko 'nvayam
GE09ram_05_u:3562: 5.040.011a vaidehyā vacanaṃ śrutvā rākṣasyo vidrutā drutam
GE09ram_05_u:3563: 5.040.011c sthitāḥ kāś cid gatāḥ kāś cid rāvaṇāya niveditum
GE09ram_05_u:3568: 5.040.014a na ca taṃ jānakī sītā hariṃ hariṇalocaṇā
GE09ram_05_u:3570: 5.040.015a vāsavasya bhaved dūto dūto vaiśravaṇasya vā
GE09ram_05_u:3572: 5.040.016a tena tvadbhūtarūpeṇa yat tat tava manoharam
GE09ram_05_u:3574: 5.040.017a na tatra kaś cid uddeśo yas tena na vināśitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3575: 5.040.017c yatra sā jānakī sītā sa tena na vināśitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3577: 5.040.018c atha vā kaḥ śramas tasya saiva tenābhirakṣitā
GE09ram_05_u:3581: 5.040.020c sītā saṃbhāṣitā yena tad vanaṃ ca vināśitam
GE09ram_05_u:3583: 5.040.021c kaḥ sītām abhibhāṣeta yo na syāt tyaktajīvitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3586: 5.040.023a ātmanaḥ sadṛśāñ śūrān kiṃkarān nāma rākṣasān
GE09ram_05_u:3592: 5.040.026a te kapiṃ taṃ samāsādya toraṇastham avasthitam
GE09ram_05_u:3597: 5.040.028c kṣitāv āvidhya lāṅgūlaṃ nanāda ca mahāsvanam
GE09ram_05_u:3601: 5.040.030c citraiḥ praharaṇair bhīmair abhipetus tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3602: 5.040.031a sa taiḥ parivṛtaḥ śūraiḥ sarvataḥ sa mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3604: 5.040.032a sa taṃ parigham ādāya jaghāna rajanīcarān
GE09ram_05_u:3607: 5.040.034a sa hatvā rākṣasān vīraḥ kiṃkarān mārutātmajaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3609: 5.040.035a tatas tasmād bhayān muktāḥ kati cit tatra rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3615: 5.041.001a tataḥ sa kiṃkarān hatvā hanūmān dhyānam āsthitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3616: 5.041.001c vanaṃ bhagnaṃ mayā caityaprāsādo na vināśitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3617: 5.041.001e tasmāt prāsādam apy evam imaṃ vidhvaṃsayāmy aham
GE09ram_05_u:3618: 5.041.002a iti saṃcintya hanumān manasā darśayan balam
GE09ram_05_u:3623: 5.041.004a sa bhūtvā tu mahākāyo hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3624: 5.041.004c dhṛṣṭam āsphoṭayām āsa laṅkāṃ śabdena pūrayan
GE09ram_05_u:3626: 5.041.005c petur vihaṃgā gaganād uccaiś cedam aghoṣayat
GE09ram_05_u:3627: 5.041.006a jayaty atibalo rāmo lakṣmaṇaś ca mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3631: 5.041.008a na rāvaṇasahasraṃ me yuddhe pratibalaṃ bhavet
GE09ram_05_u:3632: 5.041.008c śilābhis tu praharataḥ pādapaiś ca sahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3633: 5.041.009a ardayitvā purīṃ laṅkām abhivādya ca maithilīm
GE09ram_05_u:3637: 5.041.011a tena śabdena mahatā caityapālāḥ śataṃ yayuḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3638: 5.041.011c gṛhītvā vividhān astrān prāsān khaḍgān paraśvadhān
GE09ram_05_u:3640: 5.041.012a āvarta iva gaṅgāyās toyasya vipulo mahān
GE09ram_05_u:3641: 5.041.012c parikṣipya hariśreṣṭhaṃ sa babhau rakṣasāṃ gaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3645: 5.041.014e tatas taṃ bhrāmayām āsa śatadhāraṃ mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3650: 5.041.017a śataiḥ śatasahasraiś ca koṭībhir ayutair api
GE09ram_05_u:3652: 5.041.018a neyam asti purī laṅkā na yūyaṃ na ca rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3661: 5.042.004c pradiśaś ca nabhaś caiva sahasā samapūryata
GE09ram_05_u:3662: 5.042.005a rathena kharayuktena tam āgatam udīkṣya saḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3663: 5.042.005c hanūmān vegasaṃpanno jaharṣa ca nanāda ca
GE09ram_05_u:3667: 5.042.007c bāhvor vivyādha nārācair daśabhis taṃ kapīśvaram
GE09ram_05_u:3668: 5.042.008a tasya tac chuśubhe tāmraṃ śareṇābhihataṃ mukham
GE09ram_05_u:3672: 5.042.010a tarasā tāṃ samutpāṭya cikṣepa balavad balī
GE09ram_05_u:3673: 5.042.010c tāṃ śarair daśabhiḥ kruddhas tāḍayām āsa rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3674: 5.042.011a vipannaṃ karma tad dṛṣṭvā hanūmāṃś caṇḍavikramaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3675: 5.042.011c sālaṃ vipulam utpāṭya bhrāmayām āsa vīryavān
GE09ram_05_u:3678: 5.042.013a sālaṃ caturbhir ciccheda vānaraṃ pañcabhir bhuje
GE09ram_05_u:3679: 5.042.013c urasy ekena bāṇena daśabhis tu stanāntare
GE09ram_05_u:3680: 5.042.014a sa śaraiḥ pūritatanuḥ krodhena mahatā vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3681: 5.042.014c tam eva parighaṃ gṛhya bhrāmayām āsa vegitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3684: 5.042.016a tasya caiva śiro nāsti na bāhū na ca jānunī
GE09ram_05_u:3685: 5.042.016c na dhanur na ratho nāśvās tatrādṛśyanta neṣavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3686: 5.042.017a sa hatas tarasā tena jambumālī mahārathaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3688: 5.042.018a jambumāliṃ ca nihataṃ kiṃkarāṃś ca mahābalān
GE09ram_05_u:3694: 5.043.001a tatas te rākṣasendreṇa coditā mantriṇaḥ sutāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3702: 5.043.005a jananyas tās tatas teṣāṃ viditvā kiṃkarān hatān
GE09ram_05_u:3710: 5.043.009a sa śarān vañcayām āsa teṣām āśucaraḥ kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3712: 5.043.010a sa taiḥ krīḍan dhanuṣmadbhir vyomni vīraḥ prakāśate
GE09ram_05_u:3713: 5.043.010c dhanuṣmadbhir yathā meghair mārutaḥ prabhur ambare
GE09ram_05_u:3714: 5.043.011a sa kṛtvā ninadaṃ ghoraṃ trāsayaṃs tāṃ mahācamūm
GE09ram_05_u:3715: 5.043.011c cakāra hanumān vegaṃ teṣu rakṣaḥsu vīryavān
GE09ram_05_u:3716: 5.043.012a talenābhihanat kāṃś cit pādaiḥ kāṃś cit paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3717: 5.043.012c muṣṭinābhyahanat kāṃś cin nakhaiḥ kāṃś cid vyadārayat
GE09ram_05_u:3718: 5.043.013a pramamāthorasā kāṃś cid ūrubhyām aparān kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3719: 5.043.013c ke cit tasyaiva nādena tatraiva patitā bhuvi
GE09ram_05_u:3720: 5.043.014a tatas teṣv avapanneṣu bhūmau nipatiteṣu ca
GE09ram_05_u:3721: 5.043.014c tat sainyam agamat sarvaṃ diśo daśabhayārditam
GE09ram_05_u:3722: 5.043.015a vinedur visvaraṃ nāgā nipetur bhuvi vājinaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3736: 5.044.005a yat taiś ca khalu bhāvyaṃ syāt tam āsādya vanālayam
GE09ram_05_u:3738: 5.044.006a na hy ahaṃ taṃ kapiṃ manye karmaṇā pratitarkayan
GE09ram_05_u:3740: 5.044.006e bhaved indreṇa vā sṛṣṭam asmadarthaṃ tapobalāt
GE09ram_05_u:3742: 5.044.007c yuṣmābhiḥ sahitaiḥ sarvair mayā saha vinirjitāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3743: 5.044.008a tair avaśyaṃ vidhātavyaṃ vyalīkaṃ kiṃ cid eva naḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3744: 5.044.008c tad eva nātra saṃdehaḥ prasahya parigṛhyatām
GE09ram_05_u:3746: 5.044.009c dṛṣṭā hi harayaḥ śīghrā mayā vipulavikramāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3747: 5.044.010a vālī ca saha sugrīvo jāmbavāṃś ca mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3748: 5.044.010c nīlaḥ senāpatiś caiva ye cānye dvividādayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3749: 5.044.011a naiva teṣāṃ gatir bhīmā na tejo na parākramaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3750: 5.044.011c na matir na balotsāho na rūpaparikalpanam
GE09ram_05_u:3751: 5.044.012a mahat sattvam idaṃ jñeyaṃ kapirūpaṃ vyavasthitam
GE09ram_05_u:3752: 5.044.012c prayatnaṃ mahad āsthāya kriyatām asya nigrahaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3754: 5.044.013c bhavatām agrataḥ sthātuṃ na paryāptā raṇājire
GE09ram_05_u:3755: 5.044.014a tathāpi tu nayajñena jayam ākāṅkṣatā raṇe
GE09ram_05_u:3756: 5.044.014c ātmā rakṣyaḥ prayatnena yuddhasiddhir hi cañcalā
GE09ram_05_u:3759: 5.044.016a rathaiś ca mattair nāgaiś ca vājibhiś ca mahājavaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3760: 5.044.016c śastraiś ca vividhais tīkṣṇaiḥ sarvaiś copacitā balaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3761: 5.044.017a tatas taṃ dadṛśur vīrā dīpyamānaṃ mahākapim
GE09ram_05_u:3765: 5.044.019a taṃ samīkṣyaiva te sarve dikṣu sarvāsv avasthitāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3766: 5.044.019c tais taiḥ praharaṇair bhīmair abhipetus tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3767: 5.044.020a tasya pañcāyasās tīkṣṇāḥ sitāḥ pītamukhāḥ śarāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3769: 5.044.021a sa taiḥ pañcabhir āviddhaḥ śaraiḥ śirasi vānaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3770: 5.044.021c utpapāta nadan vyomni diśo daśa vinādayan
GE09ram_05_u:3771: 5.044.022a tatas tu durdharo vīraḥ sarathaḥ sajjakārmukaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3773: 5.044.023a sa kapir vārayām āsa taṃ vyomni śaravarṣiṇam
GE09ram_05_u:3776: 5.044.024c cakāra ninadaṃ bhūyo vyavardhata ca vegavān
GE09ram_05_u:3777: 5.044.025a sa dūraṃ sahasotpatya durdharasya rathe hariḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3787: 5.044.030a sa sālavṛkṣam āsādya samutpāṭya ca vānaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3788: 5.044.030c tāv ubhau rākṣasau vīrau jaghāna pavanātmajaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3789: 5.044.031a tatas tāṃs trīn hatāñ jñātvā vānareṇa tarasvinā
GE09ram_05_u:3791: 5.044.032a bhāsakarṇaś ca saṃkruddhaḥ śūlam ādāya vīryavān
GE09ram_05_u:3800: 5.044.036c balaṃ tad avaśeṣaṃ tu nāśayām āsa vānaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3801: 5.044.037a aśvair aśvān gajair nāgān yodhair yodhān rathai rathān
GE09ram_05_u:3802: 5.044.037c sa kapir nāśayām āsa sahasrākṣa ivāsurān
GE09ram_05_u:3803: 5.044.038a hatair nāgaiś ca turagair bhagnākṣaiś ca mahārathaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3804: 5.044.038c hataiś ca rākṣasair bhūmī ruddhamārgā samantataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3833: 5.045.007a sa pūrayan khaṃ ca mahīṃ ca sācalāṃ;
GE09ram_05_u:3841: 5.045.009a sa tasya vegaṃ ca kaper mahātmanaḥ;
GE09ram_05_u:3860: nanāda ca dyaur udadhiś ca cukṣubhe
GE09ram_05_u:3865: 5.045.015a sa taiḥ śarair mūrdhni samaṃ nipātitaiḥ;
GE09ram_05_u:3897: 5.045.023a sa tāñ śarāṃs tasya vimokṣayan kapiś;
GE09ram_05_u:3913: 5.045.027a ayaṃ mahātmā ca mahāṃś ca vīryataḥ;
GE09ram_05_u:3972: 5.046.003c na kaś cit triṣu lokeṣu saṃyuge na gataśramaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3977: 5.046.005c na so 'sti kaś cit triṣu saṃgraheṣu vai;
GE09ram_05_u:3978: na veda yas te 'strabalaṃ balaṃ ca te
GE09ram_05_u:3983: 5.046.007a nihatā iṃkarāḥ sarve jambumālī ca rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3985: 5.046.008a sahodaras te dayitaḥ kumāro 'kṣaś ca sūditaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3986: 5.046.008c na tu teṣv eva me sāro yas tvayy ariniṣūdana
GE09ram_05_u:3987: 5.046.009a idaṃ hi dṛṣṭvā matiman mahad balaṃ;
GE09ram_05_u:3995: 5.046.011a na khalv iyaṃ matiḥ śreṣṭhā yat tvāṃ saṃpreṣayāmy aham
GE09ram_05_u:3996: 5.046.011c iyaṃ ca rājadharmāṇāṃ kṣatrasya ca matir matā
GE09ram_05_u:3998: 5.046.012c avaśyam eva boddhavyaṃ kāmyaś ca vijayo raṇe
GE09ram_05_u:4003: 5.046.014a tatas taiḥ svagaṇair iṣṭair indrajit pratipūjitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4011: 5.046.017a sa rathī dhanvināṃ śreṣṭhaḥ śastrajño 'stravidāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4013: 5.046.018a sa tasya rathanirghoṣaṃ jyāsvanaṃ kārmukasya ca
GE09ram_05_u:4015: 5.046.019a sumahac cāpam ādāya śitaśalyāṃś ca sāyakān
GE09ram_05_u:4025: 5.046.022a āyantaṃ sarathaṃ dṛṣṭvā tūrṇam indrajitaṃ kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4027: 5.046.023a indrajit tu rathaṃ divyam āsthitaś citrakārmukaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4063: 5.046.034a tataḥ paitāmahāṃ vīraḥ so 'stram astravidāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4067: 5.046.036a tena baddhas tato 'streṇa rākṣasena sa vānaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4068: 5.046.036c abhavan nirviceṣṭaś ca papāta ca mahītale
GE09ram_05_u:4083: 5.046.041a astreṇāpi hi baddhasya bhayaṃ mama na jāyate
GE09ram_05_u:4085: 5.046.042a grahaṇe cāpi rakṣobhir mahan me guṇadarśanam
GE09ram_05_u:4086: 5.046.042c rākṣasendreṇa saṃvādas tasmād gṛhṇantu māṃ pare
GE09ram_05_u:4091: 5.046.044a tatas taṃ rākṣasā dṛṣṭvā nirviceṣṭam ariṃdamam
GE09ram_05_u:4092: 5.046.044c babandhuḥ śaṇavalkaiś ca drumacīraiś ca saṃhataiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4093: 5.046.045a sa rocayām āsa paraiś ca bandhanaṃ;
GE09ram_05_u:4097: 5.046.046a sa baddhas tena valkena vimukto 'streṇa vīryavān
GE09ram_05_u:4098: 5.046.046c astrabandhaḥ sa cānyaṃ hi na bandham anuvartate
GE09ram_05_u:4108: 5.046.049c kṛṣyamāṇas tu rakṣobhis taiś ca bandhair nipīḍitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4115: 5.046.052a taṃ mattam iva mātaṅgaṃ baddhaṃ kapivarottamam
GE09ram_05_u:4117: 5.046.053a ko 'yaṃ kasya kuto vāpi kiṃ kāryaṃ ko vyapāśrayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4119: 5.046.054a hanyatāṃ dahyatāṃ vāpi bhakṣyatām iti cāpare
GE09ram_05_u:4133: 5.046.059a yathākramaṃ taiḥ sa kapiś ca pṛṣṭaḥ;
GE09ram_05_u:4137: 5.047.001a tataḥ sa karmaṇā tasya vismito bhīmavikramaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4160: 5.047.012c kṛtsnaiḥ parivṛtaṃ lokaṃ caturbhir iva sāgaraiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4168: 5.047.016c manasā cintayām āsa tejasā tasya mohitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4169: 5.047.017a aho rūpam aho dhairyam aho sattvam aho dyutiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4171: 5.047.018a yady adharmo na balavān syād ayaṃ rākṣaseśvaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4173: 5.047.019a tena bibhyati khalv asmāl lokāḥ sāmaradānavāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4174: 5.047.019c ayaṃ hy utsahate kruddhaḥ kartum ekārṇavaṃ jagat
GE09ram_05_u:4175: 5.047.020a iti cintāṃ bahuvidhām akaron matimān kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4177: 5.048.001a tam udvīkṣya mahābāhuḥ piṅgākṣaṃ purataḥ sthitam
GE09ram_05_u:4181: 5.048.003a durātmā pṛcchyatām eṣa kutaḥ kiṃ vāsya kāraṇam
GE09ram_05_u:4182: 5.048.003c vanabhaṅge ca ko 'syārtho rākṣasīnāṃ ca tarjane
GE09ram_05_u:4183: 5.048.004a rāvaṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā prahasto vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:4184: 5.048.004c samāśvasihi bhadraṃ te na bhīḥ kāryā tvayā kape
GE09ram_05_u:4185: 5.048.005a yadi tāvat tvam indreṇa preṣito rāvaṇālayam
GE09ram_05_u:4186: 5.048.005c tattvam ākhyāhi mā te bhūd bhayaṃ vānara mokṣyase
GE09ram_05_u:4187: 5.048.006a yadi vaiśravaṇasya tvaṃ yamasya varuṇasya ca
GE09ram_05_u:4188: 5.048.006c cārurūpam idaṃ kṛtvā yamasya varuṇasya ca
GE09ram_05_u:4190: 5.048.007c na hi te vānaraṃ tejo rūpamātraṃ tu vānaram
GE09ram_05_u:4192: 5.048.008c anṛtaṃ vadataś cāpi durlabhaṃ tava jīvitam
GE09ram_05_u:4193: 5.048.009a atha vā yannimittas te praveśo rāvaṇālaye
GE09ram_05_u:4195: 5.048.010c abravīn nāsmi śakrasya yamasya varuṇasya vā
GE09ram_05_u:4196: 5.048.011a dhanadena na me sakhyaṃ viṣṇunā nāsmi coditaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4197: 5.048.011c jātir eva mama tv eṣā vānaro 'ham ihāgataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4198: 5.048.012a darśane rākṣasendrasya durlabhe tad idaṃ mayā
GE09ram_05_u:4200: 5.048.013a tatas te rākṣasāḥ prāptā balino yuddhakāṅkṣiṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4201: 5.048.013c rakṣaṇārthaṃ ca dehasya pratiyuddhā mayā raṇe
GE09ram_05_u:4202: 5.048.014a astrapāśair na śakyo 'haṃ baddhuṃ devāsurair api
GE09ram_05_u:4205: 5.048.015c vimukto aham astreṇa rākṣasais tv atipīḍitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4207: 5.048.016c śrūyatāṃ cāpi vacanaṃ mama pathyam idaṃ prabho
GE09ram_05_u:4209: 5.049.001c vākyam arthavad avyagras tam uvāca daśānanam
GE09ram_05_u:4211: 5.049.002c rākṣasendra harīśas tvāṃ bhrātā kuśalam abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:4213: 5.049.003c dharmārthopahitaṃ vākyam iha cāmutra ca kṣamam
GE09ram_05_u:4216: 5.049.005a jyeṣṭhas tasya mahābāhuḥ putraḥ priyakaraḥ prabhuḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4218: 5.049.006a lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā sītayā cāpi bhāryayā
GE09ram_05_u:4219: 5.049.006c rāmo nāma mahātejā dharmyaṃ panthānam āśritaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4220: 5.049.007a tasya bhāryā vane naṣṭā sītā patim anuvratā
GE09ram_05_u:4222: 5.049.008a sa mārgamāṇas tāṃ devīṃ rājaputraḥ sahānujaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4226: 5.049.010a tatas tena mṛdhe hatvā rājaputreṇa vālinam
GE09ram_05_u:4229: 5.049.011c harīn saṃpreṣayām āsa diśaḥ sarvā harīśvaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4230: 5.049.012a tāṃ harīṇāṃ sahasrāṇi śatāni niyutāni ca
GE09ram_05_u:4231: 5.049.012c dikṣu sarvāsu mārgante adhaś copari cāmbare
GE09ram_05_u:4232: 5.049.013a vainateya samāḥ ke cit ke cit tatrānilopamāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4234: 5.049.014a ahaṃ tu hanumān nāma mārutasyaurasaḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4235: 5.049.014c sītāyās tu kṛte tūrṇaṃ śatayojanam āyatam
GE09ram_05_u:4239: 5.049.016a na hi dharmaviruddheṣu bahv apāyeṣu karmasu
GE09ram_05_u:4242: 5.049.017c śarāṇām agrataḥ sthātuṃ śakto devāsureṣv api
GE09ram_05_u:4243: 5.049.018a na cāpi triṣu lokeṣu rājan vidyeta kaś cana
GE09ram_05_u:4244: 5.049.018c rāghavasya vyalīkaṃ yaḥ kṛtvā sukham avāpnuyāt
GE09ram_05_u:4245: 5.049.019a tat trikālahitaṃ vākyaṃ dharmyam arthānubandhi ca
GE09ram_05_u:4247: 5.049.020a dṛṣṭā hīyaṃ mayā devī labdhaṃ yad iha durlabham
GE09ram_05_u:4248: 5.049.020c uttaraṃ karma yac cheṣaṃ nimittaṃ tatra rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4250: 5.049.021c gṛhya yāṃ nābhijānāsi pañcāsyām iva pannagīm
GE09ram_05_u:4251: 5.049.022a neyaṃ jarayituṃ śakyā sāsurair amarair api
GE09ram_05_u:4256: 5.049.024c ātmanaḥ sāsurair devair hetus tatrāpy ayaṃ mahān
GE09ram_05_u:4257: 5.049.025a sugrīvo na hi devo 'yaṃ nāsuro na ca mānuṣaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4258: 5.049.025c na rākṣaso na gandharvo na yakṣo na ca pannagaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4259: 5.049.026a mānuṣo rāghavo rājan sugrīvaś ca harīśvaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4262: 5.049.027c tad eva phalam anveti dharmaś cādharmanāśanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4263: 5.049.028a prāptaṃ dharmaphalaṃ tāvad bhavatā nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4264: 5.049.028c phalam asyāpy adharmasya kṣipram eva prapatsyase
GE09ram_05_u:4267: 5.049.030a kāmaṃ khalv aham apy ekaḥ savājirathakuñjarām
GE09ram_05_u:4268: 5.049.030c laṅkāṃ nāśayituṃ śaktas tasyaiṣa tu viniścayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4270: 5.049.031c utsādanam amitrāṇāṃ sītā yais tu pradharṣitā
GE09ram_05_u:4271: 5.049.032a apakurvan hi rāmasya sākṣād api puraṃdaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4272: 5.049.032c na sukhaṃ prāpnuyād anyaḥ kiṃ punas tvadvidho janaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4273: 5.049.033a yāṃ sītety abhijānāsi yeyaṃ tiṣṭhati te vaśe
GE09ram_05_u:4287: 5.050.003a taṃ rakṣo'dhipatiṃ kruddhaṃ tac ca kāryam upasthitam
GE09ram_05_u:4288: 5.050.003c viditvā cintayām āsa kāryaṃ kāryavidhau sthitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4291: 5.050.005a rājan dharmaviruddhaṃ ca lokavṛtteś ca garhitam
GE09ram_05_u:4292: 5.050.005c tava cāsadṛśaṃ vīra kaper asya pramāpaṇam
GE09ram_05_u:4300: vadhas tu dūtasya na naḥ śruto 'pi
GE09ram_05_u:4309: 5.050.010a na cāpy asya kaper ghāte kaṃ cit paśyāmy ahaṃ guṇam
GE09ram_05_u:4310: 5.050.010c teṣv ayaṃ pātyatāṃ daṇḍo yair ayaṃ preṣitaḥ kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4311: 5.050.011a sādhur vā yadi vāsādhur parair eṣa samarpitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4312: 5.050.011c bruvan parārthaṃ paravān na dūto vadham arhati
GE09ram_05_u:4313: 5.050.012a api cāsmin hate rājan nānyaṃ paśyāmi khecaram
GE09ram_05_u:4314: 5.050.012c iha yaḥ punar āgacchet paraṃ pāraṃ mahodadhiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4315: 5.050.013a tasmān nāsya vadhe yatnaḥ kāryaḥ parapuraṃjaya
GE09ram_05_u:4316: 5.050.013c bhavān sendreṣu deveṣu yatnam āsthātum arhati
GE09ram_05_u:4317: 5.050.014a asmin vinaṣṭe na hi dūtam anyaṃ;
GE09ram_05_u:4325: 5.050.016a hitāś ca śūrāś ca samāhitāś ca;
GE09ram_05_u:4335: 5.051.002a samyag uktaṃ hi bhavatā dūtavadhyā vigarhitā
GE09ram_05_u:4336: 5.051.002c avaśyaṃ tu vadhād anyaḥ kriyatām asya nigrahaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4337: 5.051.003a kapīnāṃ kila lāṅgūlam iṣṭaṃ bhavati bhūṣaṇam
GE09ram_05_u:4338: 5.051.003c tad asya dīpyatāṃ śīghraṃ tena dagdhena gacchatu
GE09ram_05_u:4344: 5.051.006c veṣṭante tasya lāṅgūlaṃ jīrṇaiḥ kārpāsikaiḥ paṭaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4346: 5.051.007c śuṣkam indhanam āsādya vaneṣv iva hutāśanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4350: 5.051.010a sa bhūyaḥ saṃgataiḥ krūrai rākasair harisattamaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4352: 5.051.011a kāmaṃ khalu na me śaktā nibadhasyāpi rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4353: 5.051.011c chittvā pāśān samutpatya hanyām aham imān punaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4354: 5.051.012a sarveṣām eva paryāpto rākṣasānām ahaṃ yudhi
GE09ram_05_u:4355: 5.051.012c kiṃ tu rāmasya prītyarthaṃ viṣahiṣye 'ham īdṛśam
GE09ram_05_u:4356: 5.051.013a laṅkā carayitavyā me punar eva bhaved iti
GE09ram_05_u:4357: 5.051.013c rātrau na hi sudṛṣṭā me durgakarmavidhānataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4358: 5.051.013e avaśyam eva draṣṭavyā mayā laṅkā niśākṣaye
GE09ram_05_u:4359: 5.051.014a kāmaṃ bandhaiś ca me bhūyaḥ pucchasyoddīpanena ca
GE09ram_05_u:4360: 5.051.014c pīḍāṃ kurvantu rakṣāṃsi na me 'sti manasaḥ śramaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4364: 5.051.016c rākṣasāḥ krūrakarmāṇaś cārayanti sma tāṃ purīm
GE09ram_05_u:4367: 5.051.018a saṃvṛtān bhūmibhāgāṃś ca suvibhaktāṃś ca catvarān
GE09ram_05_u:4368: 5.051.018c rathyāś ca gṛhasaṃbādhāḥ kapiḥ śṛṅgāṭakāni ca
GE09ram_05_u:4370: 5.051.019c ghoṣayanti kapiṃ sarve cārīka iti rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4372: 5.051.020c rākṣasyas tā virūpākṣyaḥ śaṃsur devyās tad apriyam
GE09ram_05_u:4373: 5.051.021a yas tvayā kṛtasaṃvādaḥ sīte tāmramukhaḥ kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4379: 5.051.024a yady asti patiśuśrūṣā yady asti caritaṃ tapaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4380: 5.051.024c yadi cāsty ekapatnītvaṃ śīto bhava hanūmataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4381: 5.051.025a yadi kaś cid anukrośas tasya mayy asti dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4382: 5.051.025c yadi vā bhāgyaśeṣaṃ me śīto bhava hanūmataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4384: 5.051.026c sa vijānāti dharmātmā śīto bhava hanūmataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4385: 5.051.027a yadi māṃ tārayaty āryaḥ sugrīvaḥ satyasaṃgaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4386: 5.051.027c asmād duḥkhān mahābāhuḥ śīto bhava hanūmataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4388: 5.051.028c jajvāla mṛgaśāvākṣyāḥ śaṃsann iva śivaṃ kapeḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4389: 5.051.029a dahyamāne ca lāṅgūle cintayām āsa vānaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4390: 5.051.029c pradīpto 'gnir ayaṃ kasmān na māṃ dahati sarvataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4391: 5.051.030a dṛśyate ca mahājvālaḥ karoti ca na me rujam
GE09ram_05_u:4393: 5.051.031a atha vā tad idaṃ vyaktaṃ yad dṛṣṭaṃ plavatā mayā
GE09ram_05_u:4395: 5.051.032a yadi tāvat samudrasya mainākasya ca dhīmatha
GE09ram_05_u:4396: 5.051.032c rāmārthaṃ saṃbhramas tādṛk kim agnir na kariṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:4398: 5.051.033c pituś ca mama sakhyena na māṃ dahati pāvakaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4399: 5.051.034a bhūyaḥ sa cintayām āsa muhūrtaṃ kapikuñjaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4403: 5.051.036a sa bhūtvā śailasaṃkāśaḥ kṣaṇena punar ātmavān
GE09ram_05_u:4408: 5.051.038c rakṣiṇas tān punaḥ sarvān sūdayām āsa mārutiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4415: 5.052.002a kiṃ nu khalv aviśiṣṭaṃ me kartavyam iha sāmpratam
GE09ram_05_u:4416: 5.052.002c yad eṣāṃ rakṣasāṃ bhūyaḥ saṃtāpajananaṃ bhavet
GE09ram_05_u:4417: 5.052.003a vanaṃ tāvat pramathitaṃ prakṛṣṭā rākṣasā hatāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4420: 5.052.004c alpayatnena kārye 'smin mama syāt saphalaḥ śramaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4421: 5.052.005a yo hy ayaṃ mama lāṅgūle dīpyate havyavāhanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4422: 5.052.005c asya saṃtarpaṇaṃ nyāyyaṃ kartum ebhir gṛhottamaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4428: 5.052.009a pradīptam agniṃ pavanas teṣu veśmasu cārayat
GE09ram_05_u:4434: 5.052.012c vicitrān bhavanād dhātūn syandamānān dadarśa saḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4435: 5.052.013a nāgnis tṛpyati kāṣṭhānāṃ tṛṇānāṃ ca yathā tathā
GE09ram_05_u:4436: 5.052.013c hanūmān rākṣasendrāṇāṃ vadhe kiṃ cin na tṛpyati
GE09ram_05_u:4445: 5.052.016a sa rākṣasāṃs tān subahūṃś ca hatvā;
GE09ram_05_u:4452: 5.053.001c avekṣya hānumāṃl laṅkāṃ cintayām āsa vānaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4453: 5.053.002a tasyābhūt sumahāṃs trāsaḥ kutsā cātmany ajāyata
GE09ram_05_u:4454: 5.053.002c laṅkāṃ pradahatā karma kiṃsvit kṛtam idaṃ mayā
GE09ram_05_u:4455: 5.053.003a dhanyās te puruṣaśreṣṭha ye buddhyā kopam utthitam
GE09ram_05_u:4457: 5.053.004a yadi dagdhā tv iyaṃ laṅkā nūnam āryāpi jānakī
GE09ram_05_u:4458: 5.053.004c dagdhā tena mayā bhartur hataṃ kāryam ajānatā
GE09ram_05_u:4459: 5.053.005a yad artham ayam ārambhas tat kāryam avasāditam
GE09ram_05_u:4460: 5.053.005c mayā hi dahatā laṅkāṃ na sītā parirakṣitā
GE09ram_05_u:4461: 5.053.006a īṣatkāryam idaṃ kāryaṃ kṛtam āsīn na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4463: 5.053.007a vinaṣṭā jānakī vyaktaṃ na hy adagdhaḥ pradṛśyate
GE09ram_05_u:4464: 5.053.007c laṅkāyāḥ kaś cid uddeśaḥ sarvā bhasmīkṛtā purī
GE09ram_05_u:4465: 5.053.008a yadi tad vihataṃ kāryaṃ mayā prajñāviparyayāt
GE09ram_05_u:4467: 5.053.009a kim agnau nipatāmy adya āhosvid vaḍavāmukhe
GE09ram_05_u:4469: 5.053.010a kathaṃ hi jīvatā śakyo mayā draṣṭuṃ harīśvaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4471: 5.053.011a mayā khalu tad evedaṃ roṣadoṣāt pradarśitam
GE09ram_05_u:4473: 5.053.012a dhig astu rājasaṃ bhāvam anīśam anavasthitam
GE09ram_05_u:4474: 5.053.012c īśvareṇāpi yad rāgān mayā sītā na rakṣitā
GE09ram_05_u:4475: 5.053.013a vinaṣṭāyāṃ tu sītāyāṃ tāv ubhau vinaśiṣyataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4477: 5.053.014a etad eva vacaḥ śrutvā bharato bhrātṛvatsalaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4484: 5.053.017c pūram apy upalabdhāni sākṣāt punar acintayat
GE09ram_05_u:4485: 5.053.018a atha vā cārusarvāṅgī rakṣitā svena tejasā
GE09ram_05_u:4486: 5.053.018c na naśiṣyati kalyāṇī nāgnir agnau pravartate
GE09ram_05_u:4487: 5.053.019a na hi dharmān manas tasya bhāryām amitatejasaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4491: 5.053.021a trayāṇāṃ bharatādīnāṃ bhrātṝṇāṃ devatā ca yā
GE09ram_05_u:4492: 5.053.021c rāmasya ca manaḥkāntā sā kathaṃ vinaśiṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:4493: 5.053.022a yad vā dahanakarmāyaṃ sarvatra prabhur avyayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4494: 5.053.022c na me dahati lāṅgūlaṃ katham āryāṃ pradhakṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:4496: 5.053.023c api sā nirdahed agniṃ na tām agniḥ pradhakṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:4497: 5.053.024a sa tathā cintayaṃs tatra devyā dharmaparigraham
GE09ram_05_u:4499: 5.053.025a aho khalu kṛtaṃ karma durviṣahyaṃ hanūmatā
GE09ram_05_u:4502: 5.053.026c jānakī na ca dagdheti vismayo 'dbhuta eva naḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4503: 5.053.027a sa nimittaiś ca dṛṣṭārthaiḥ kāraṇaiś ca mahāguṇaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4511: 5.054.002a tatas taṃ prasthitaṃ sītā vīkṣamāṇā punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4513: 5.054.003a kāmam asya tvam evaikaḥ kāryasya parisādhane
GE09ram_05_u:4515: 5.054.004a balais tu saṃkulāṃ kṛtvā laṅkāṃ parabalārdanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4516: 5.054.004c māṃ nayed yadi kākutsthas tasya tat sādṛśaṃ bhavet
GE09ram_05_u:4517: 5.054.005a tad yathā tasya vikrāntam anurūpaṃ mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4520: 5.054.006c niśamya hanumāṃs tasyā vākyam uttaram abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:4522: 5.054.007c yas te yudhi vijityārīñ śokaṃ vyapanayiṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:4528: 5.054.010c sālatālāśvakarṇaiś ca vaṃśaiś ca bahubhir vṛtam
GE09ram_05_u:4539: 5.054.016a sa tam āruhya śailendraṃ vyavardhata mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4545: 5.054.019a sa tadā pīḍitas tena kapinā parvatottamaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4546: 5.054.019c rarāsa saha tair bhūtaiḥ prāviśad vasudhātalam
GE09ram_05_u:4547: 5.054.019e kampamānaiś ca śikharaiḥ patadbhir api ca drumaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4551: 5.054.021c siṃhānāṃ ninado bhīmo nabho bhindan sa śuśruve
GE09ram_05_u:4557: 5.054.024c pīḍitaṃ taṃ nagavaraṃ tyaktvā gaganam āsthitāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4558: 5.054.025a sa ca bhūmidharaḥ śrīmān balinā tena pīḍitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4561: 5.054.026c dharaṇyāṃ samatāṃ yātaḥ sa babhūva dharādharaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4574: 5.055.007a praviśann abhrajālāni niṣkramaṃś ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4575: 5.055.007c pracchannaś ca prakāśaś ca candramā iva lakṣyate
GE09ram_05_u:4580: 5.055.010a sa kiṃ cid anusaṃprāptaḥ samālokya mahāgirim
GE09ram_05_u:4582: 5.055.011a niśamya nadato nādaṃ vānarās te samantataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4585: 5.055.012c upāmantrya harīn sarvān idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:4587: 5.055.013c na hy asyākṛtakāryasya nāda evaṃvidho bhavet
GE09ram_05_u:4588: 5.055.014a tasyā bāhūruvegaṃ ca ninādaṃ ca mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4589: 5.055.014c niśamya harayo hṛṣṭāḥ samutpetus tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4590: 5.055.015a te nagāgrān nagāgrāṇi śikharāc chikharāṇi ca
GE09ram_05_u:4592: 5.055.016a te prītāḥ pādapāgreṣu gṛhya śākhāḥ supuṣpitāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4595: 5.055.017c dṛṣṭvā te vānarāḥ sarve tasthuḥ prāñjalayas tadā
GE09ram_05_u:4596: 5.055.018a tatas tu vegavāṃs tasya girer girinibhaḥ kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4600: 5.055.020a parivārya ca te sarve parāṃ prītim upāgatāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4602: 5.055.021a upāyanāni cādāya mūlāni ca phalāni ca
GE09ram_05_u:4604: 5.055.022a vinedur muditāḥ ke cic cakruḥ kila kilāṃ tathā
GE09ram_05_u:4606: 5.055.023a hanūmāṃs tu gurūn vṛddhāñ jāmbavat pramukhāṃs tadā
GE09ram_05_u:4608: 5.055.024a sa tābhyāṃ pūjitaḥ pūjyaḥ kapibhiś ca prasāditaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4610: 5.055.025a niṣasāda ca hastena gṛhītvā vālinaḥ sutam
GE09ram_05_u:4612: 5.055.026a hanūmān abravīd dhṛṣṭas tadā tān vānararṣabhān
GE09ram_05_u:4618: 5.055.028c niśamya māruteḥ sarve muditā vānarā bhavan
GE09ram_05_u:4619: 5.055.029a kṣveḍanty anye nadanty anye garjanty anye mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4620: 5.055.029c cakruḥ kila kilām anye pratigarjanti cāpare
GE09ram_05_u:4627: 5.055.033a sattve vīrye na te kaś cit samo vānaravidyate
GE09ram_05_u:4628: 5.055.033c yad avaplutya vistīrṇaṃ sāgaraṃ punar āgataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4629: 5.055.034a diṣṭyā dṛṣṭā tvayā devī rāmapatnī yaśasvinī
GE09ram_05_u:4630: 5.055.034c diṣṭyā tyakṣyati kākutsthaḥ śokaṃ sītā viyogajam
GE09ram_05_u:4634: 5.055.036c darśanaṃ cāpi laṅkāyāḥ sītāyā rāvaṇasya ca
GE09ram_05_u:4636: 5.055.037a tasthau tatrāṅgadaḥ śrīmān vānarair bahubhir vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4642: 5.056.001a tatas tasya gireḥ śṛṅge mahendrasya mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4646: 5.056.003a kathaṃ dṛṣṭā tvayā devī kathaṃ vā tatra vartate
GE09ram_05_u:4647: 5.056.003c tasyāṃ vā sa kathaṃ vṛttaḥ krūrakarmā daśānanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4648: 5.056.004a tattvataḥ sarvam etan naḥ prabrūhi tvaṃ mahākape
GE09ram_05_u:4650: 5.056.005a yaś cārthas tatra vaktavyo gatair asmābhir ātmavān
GE09ram_05_u:4651: 5.056.005c rakṣitavyaṃ ca yat tatra tad bhavān vyākarotu naḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4654: 5.056.007a pratyakṣam eva bhavatāṃ mahendrāgrāt kham āplutaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4656: 5.056.008a gacchataś ca hi me ghoraṃ vighnarūpam ivābhavat
GE09ram_05_u:4658: 5.056.009a sthitaṃ panthānam āvṛtya mene vighnaṃ ca taṃ nagam
GE09ram_05_u:4660: 5.056.010c kṛtā me manasā buddhir bhettavyo 'yaṃ mayeti ca
GE09ram_05_u:4661: 5.056.011a prahataṃ ca mayā tasya lāṅgūlena mahāgireḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4663: 5.056.012a vyavasāyaṃ ca me buddhvā sa hovāca mahāgiriḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4665: 5.056.013a pitṛvyaṃ cāpi māṃ viddhi sakhāyaṃ mātariśvanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4671: 5.056.016a ahaṃ tu mokṣitas tasmāt tava pitrā mahātmanā
GE09ram_05_u:4673: 5.056.017a rāmasya ca mayā sāhye vartitavyam ariṃdama
GE09ram_05_u:4675: 5.056.018a etac chrutvā mayā tasya mainākasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4676: 5.056.018c kāryam āvedya tu girer uddhataṃ ca mano mama
GE09ram_05_u:4678: 5.056.019c uttamaṃ javam āsthāya śeṣam adhvānam āsthitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4680: 5.056.020c tataḥ paśyāmy ahaṃ devīṃ surasāṃ nāgamātaram
GE09ram_05_u:4681: 5.056.021a samudramadhye sā devī vacanaṃ mām abhāṣata
GE09ram_05_u:4682: 5.056.021c mama bhakṣyaḥ pradiṣṭas tvam amārair harisattamam
GE09ram_05_u:4683: 5.056.021e tatas tvāṃ bhakṣayiṣyāmi vihitas tvaṃ cirasya me
GE09ram_05_u:4684: 5.056.022a evam uktaḥ surasayā prāñjaliḥ praṇataḥ sthitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4687: 5.056.023c lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā sītayā ca paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4688: 5.056.024a tasya sītā hṛtā bhāryā rāvaṇena durātmanā
GE09ram_05_u:4691: 5.056.026a atha vā maithilīṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmaṃ cākliṣṭakāriṇam
GE09ram_05_u:4692: 5.056.026c āgamiṣyāmi te vaktraṃ satyaṃ pratiśṛṇoti me
GE09ram_05_u:4693: 5.056.027a evam uktā mayā sā tu surasā kāmarūpiṇī
GE09ram_05_u:4694: 5.056.027c abravīn nātivarteta kaś cid eṣa varo mama
GE09ram_05_u:4698: 5.056.029c tad dṛṣṭvā vyāditaṃ tv āsyaṃ hrasvaṃ hy akaravaṃ vapuḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4700: 5.056.030c abhipatyāśu tad vaktraṃ nirgato 'haṃ tataḥ kṣaṇāt
GE09ram_05_u:4701: 5.056.031a abravīt surasā devī svena rūpeṇa māṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4704: 5.056.032c sukhī bhava mahābāho prītāsmi tava vānara
GE09ram_05_u:4707: 5.056.034a chāyā me nigṛhītā ca na ca paśyāmi kiṃ cana
GE09ram_05_u:4708: 5.056.034c so 'haṃ vigatavegas tu diśo daśa vilokayan
GE09ram_05_u:4709: 5.056.034e na kiṃ cit tatra paśyāmi yena me 'pahṛtā gatiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4710: 5.056.035a tato me buddhir utpannā kiṃ nāma gamane mama
GE09ram_05_u:4711: 5.056.035c īdṛśo vighna utpanno rūpaṃ yatra na dṛśyate
GE09ram_05_u:4712: 5.056.036a adho bhāgena me dṛṣṭiḥ śocatā pātitā mayā
GE09ram_05_u:4713: 5.056.036c tato 'drākṣam ahaṃ bhīmāṃ rākṣasīṃ salile śayām
GE09ram_05_u:4714: 5.056.037a prahasya ca mahānādam ukto 'haṃ bhīmayā tayā
GE09ram_05_u:4717: 5.056.038c bhakṣaḥ prīṇaya me dehaṃ ciram āhāravarjitam
GE09ram_05_u:4718: 5.056.039a bāḍham ity eva tāṃ vāṇīṃ pratyagṛhṇām ahaṃ tataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4719: 5.056.039c āsya pramāṇād adhikaṃ tasyāḥ kāyam apūrayam
GE09ram_05_u:4720: 5.056.040a tasyāś cāsyaṃ mahad bhīmaṃ vardhate mama bhakṣaṇe
GE09ram_05_u:4721: 5.056.040c na ca māṃ sā tu bubudhe mama vā vikṛtaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_05_u:4726: 5.056.043a śṛṇomi khagatānāṃ ca siddhānāṃ cāraṇaiḥ saha
GE09ram_05_u:4727: 5.056.043c rākṣasī siṃhikā bhīmā kṣipraṃ hanumatā hṛtā
GE09ram_05_u:4728: 5.056.044a tāṃ hatvā punar evāhaṃ kṛtyam ātyayikaṃ smaran
GE09ram_05_u:4729: 5.056.044c gatvā ca mahad adhvānaṃ paśyāmi nagamaṇḍitam
GE09ram_05_u:4730: 5.056.044e dakṣiṇaṃ tīram udadher laṅkā yatra ca sā purī
GE09ram_05_u:4731: 5.056.045a astaṃ dinakare yāte rakṣasāṃ nilayaṃ purīm
GE09ram_05_u:4735: 5.056.047a tataḥ sītām apaśyaṃs tu rāvaṇasya niveśane
GE09ram_05_u:4737: 5.056.048a śocatā ca mayā dṛṣṭaṃ prākāreṇa samāvṛtam
GE09ram_05_u:4741: 5.056.050c tam āruhya ca paśyāmi kāñcanaṃ kadalī vanam
GE09ram_05_u:4746: 5.056.053a tāṃ dṛṣṭvā tādṛśīṃ nārīṃ rāmapatnīm aninditām
GE09ram_05_u:4751: 5.056.055c ahaṃ ca śiṃśapāvṛkṣe pakṣīva gahane sthitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4752: 5.056.056a tato rāvaṇadārāś ca rāvaṇaś ca mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4753: 5.056.056c taṃ deśaṃ samanuprāptā yatra sītābhavat sthitā
GE09ram_05_u:4755: 5.056.057c saṃkucyorū stanau pīnau bāhubhyāṃ parirabhya ca
GE09ram_05_u:4757: 5.056.058c avākśirāḥ prapatito bahu manyasva mām iti
GE09ram_05_u:4758: 5.056.059a yadi cet tvaṃ tu māṃ darpān nābhinandasi garvite
GE09ram_05_u:4760: 5.056.060a etac chrutvā vacas tasya rāvaṇasya durātmanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4764: 5.056.061e avācyaṃ vadato jihvā kathaṃ na patitā tava
GE09ram_05_u:4765: 5.056.062a kiṃsvid vīryaṃ tavānārya yo māṃ bhartur asaṃnidhau
GE09ram_05_u:4767: 5.056.063a na tvaṃ rāmasya sadṛśo dāsye 'py asyā na yujyase
GE09ram_05_u:4768: 5.056.063c yajñīyaḥ satyavāk caiva raṇaślāghī ca rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4769: 5.056.064a jānakyā paruṣaṃ vākyam evam ukto daśānanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4770: 5.056.064c jajvāla sahasā kopāc citāstha iva pāvakaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4771: 5.056.065a vivṛtya nayane krūre muṣṭim udyamya dakṣiṇam
GE09ram_05_u:4772: 5.056.065c maithilīṃ hantum ārabdhaḥ strībhir hāhākṛtaṃ tadā
GE09ram_05_u:4773: 5.056.066a strīṇāṃ madhyāt samutpatya tasya bhāryā durātmanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4774: 5.056.066c varā mandodarī nāma tayā sa pratiṣedhitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4775: 5.056.067a uktaś ca madhurāṃ vāṇīṃ tayā sa madanārditaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4777: 5.056.067e mayā saha ramasvādya madviśiṣṭā na jānakī
GE09ram_05_u:4779: 5.056.068c sārdhaṃ prabho ramasveha sītayā kiṃ kariṣyasi
GE09ram_05_u:4780: 5.056.069a tatas tābhiḥ sametābhir nārībhiḥ sa mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4781: 5.056.069c utthāpya sahasā nīto bhavanaṃ svaṃ niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4783: 5.056.070c sītāṃ nirbhartsayām āsur vākyaiḥ krūraiḥ sudāruṇaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4784: 5.056.071a tṛṇavad bhāṣitaṃ tāsāṃ gaṇayām āsa jānakī
GE09ram_05_u:4785: 5.056.071c tarjitaṃ ca tadā tāsāṃ sītāṃ prāpya nirarthakam
GE09ram_05_u:4788: 5.056.073a tatas tāḥ sahitāḥ sarvā vihatāśā nirudyamāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4790: 5.056.074a tāsu caiva prasuptāsu sītā bhartṛhite ratā
GE09ram_05_u:4792: 5.056.075a tāṃ cāhaṃ tādṛśīṃ dṛṣṭvā sītāyā dāruṇāṃ daśām
GE09ram_05_u:4793: 5.056.075c cintayām āsa viśrānto na ca me nirvṛtaṃ manaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4794: 5.056.076a saṃbhāṣaṇārthe ca mayā jānakyāś cintito vidhiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4798: 5.056.078a kas tvaṃ kena kathaṃ ceha prāpto vānarapuṃgava
GE09ram_05_u:4799: 5.056.078c kā ca rāmeṇa te prītis tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
GE09ram_05_u:4800: 5.056.079a tasyās tadvacanaṃ śrutvā aham apy abruvaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4801: 5.056.079c devi rāmasya bhartus te sahāyo bhīmavikramaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4803: 5.056.080a tasya māṃ viddhi bhṛtyaṃ tvaṃ hanūmantam ihāgatam
GE09ram_05_u:4805: 5.056.081a idaṃ ca puruṣavyāghraḥ śrīmān dāśarathiḥ svayam
GE09ram_05_u:4807: 5.056.082a tad icchāmi tvayājñaptaṃ devi kiṃ karavāṇy aham
GE09ram_05_u:4808: 5.056.082c rāmalakṣmaṇayoḥ pārśvaṃ nayāmi tvāṃ kim uttaram
GE09ram_05_u:4809: 5.056.083a etac chrutvā viditvā ca sītā janakanandinī
GE09ram_05_u:4810: 5.056.083c āha rāvaṇam utsādya rāghavo māṃ nayatv iti
GE09ram_05_u:4811: 5.056.084a praṇamya śirasā devīm aham āryām aninditām
GE09ram_05_u:4814: 5.056.085c prāyacchat paramodvignā vācā māṃ saṃdideśa ha
GE09ram_05_u:4817: 5.056.087a uttaraṃ punar evāha niścitya manasā tadā
GE09ram_05_u:4818: 5.056.087c hanūman mama vṛttāntaṃ vaktum arhasi rāghave
GE09ram_05_u:4819: 5.056.088a yathā śrutvaiva nacirāt tāv ubhau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_05_u:4821: 5.056.089a yady anyathā bhaved etad dvau māsau jīvitaṃ mama
GE09ram_05_u:4822: 5.056.089c na māṃ drakṣyati kākutstho mriye sāham anāthavat
GE09ram_05_u:4823: 5.056.090a tac chrutvā karuṇaṃ vākyaṃ krodho mām abhyavartata
GE09ram_05_u:4824: 5.056.090c uttaraṃ ca mayā dṛṣṭaṃ kāryaśeṣam anantaram
GE09ram_05_u:4826: 5.056.091c yuddhakāṅkṣī vanaṃ tac ca vināśayitum ārabhe
GE09ram_05_u:4829: 5.056.093a māṃ ca dṛṣṭvā vane tasmin samāgamya tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4831: 5.056.094a rājan vanam idaṃ durgaṃ tava bhagnaṃ durātmanā
GE09ram_05_u:4832: 5.056.094c vānareṇa hy avijñāya tava vīryaṃ mahābala
GE09ram_05_u:4834: 5.056.095c vadham ājñāpaya kṣipraṃ yathāsau vilayaṃ vrajet
GE09ram_05_u:4839: 5.056.098a teṣāṃ tu hataśeṣā ye te gatā laghuvikramāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4841: 5.056.099a tato me buddhir utpannā caityaprāsādam ākramam
GE09ram_05_u:4842: 5.056.100a tatrasthān rākṣasān hatvā śataṃ stambhena vai punaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4843: 5.056.100c lalāma bhūto laṅkāyā mayā vidhvaṃsito ruṣā
GE09ram_05_u:4847: 5.056.103a tac chrutvā rākṣasendras tu mantriputrān mahābalān
GE09ram_05_u:4852: 5.056.104e tān ahaṃ saha sainyān vai sarvān evābhyasūdayam
GE09ram_05_u:4853: 5.056.105a tataḥ punar daśagrīvaḥ putram akṣaṃ mahābalam
GE09ram_05_u:4854: 5.056.105c bahubhī rākasaiḥ sārdhaṃ preṣayām āsa saṃyuge
GE09ram_05_u:4855: 5.056.106a taṃ tu mandodarī putraṃ kumāraṃ raṇapaṇḍitam
GE09ram_05_u:4856: 5.056.106c sahasā khaṃ samutkrāntaṃ pādayoś ca gṛhītavān
GE09ram_05_u:4858: 5.056.107a tam akṣam āgataṃ bhagnaṃ niśamya sa daśānanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4859: 5.056.107c tata indrajitaṃ nāma dvitīyaṃ rāvaṇaḥ sutam
GE09ram_05_u:4861: 5.056.108a tasyāpy ahaṃ balaṃ sarvaṃ taṃ ca rākṣasapuṃgavam
GE09ram_05_u:4862: 5.056.108c naṣṭaujasaṃ raṇe kṛtvā paraṃ harṣam upāgamam
GE09ram_05_u:4865: 5.056.110a brāhmeṇāstreṇa sa tu māṃ prabadhnāc cātivegataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4866: 5.056.110c rajjūbhir abhibadhnanti tato māṃ tatra rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4867: 5.056.111a rāvaṇasya samīpaṃ ca gṛhītvā mām upānayan
GE09ram_05_u:4869: 5.056.112a pṛṣṭaś ca laṅkāgamanaṃ rākṣasānāṃ ca tad vadham
GE09ram_05_u:4870: 5.056.112c tat sarvaṃ ca mayā tatra sītārtham iti jalpitam
GE09ram_05_u:4873: 5.056.114a rāmadūtaṃ ca māṃ viddhi sugrīvasacivaṃ kapim
GE09ram_05_u:4875: 5.056.115a śṛṇu cāpi samādeśaṃ yad ahaṃ prabravīmi te
GE09ram_05_u:4876: 5.056.115c rākṣaseśa harīśas tvāṃ vākyam āha samāhitam
GE09ram_05_u:4880: 5.056.117a tena me kathitaṃ rājan bhāryā me rakṣasā hṛtā
GE09ram_05_u:4881: 5.056.117c tatra sāhāyyahetor me samayaṃ kartum arhasi
GE09ram_05_u:4886: 5.056.120a tasya sāhāyyam asmābhiḥ kāryaṃ sarvātmanā tv iha
GE09ram_05_u:4887: 5.056.120c tena prasthāpitas tubhyaṃ samīpam iha dharmataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4888: 5.056.121a kṣipram ānīyatāṃ sītā dīyatāṃ rāghavasya ca
GE09ram_05_u:4889: 5.056.121c yāvan na harayo vīrā vidhamanti balaṃ tava
GE09ram_05_u:4890: 5.056.122a vānarāṇāṃ prabhavo hi na kena viditaḥ purā
GE09ram_05_u:4891: 5.056.122c devatānāṃ sakāśaṃ ca ye gacchanti nimantritāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4892: 5.056.123a iti vānararājas tvām āhety abhihito mayā
GE09ram_05_u:4893: 5.056.123c mām aikṣata tato ruṣṭaś cakṣuṣā pradahann iva
GE09ram_05_u:4895: 5.056.125a tato vibhīṣaṇo nāma tasya bhrātā mahāmatiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4897: 5.056.126a dūtavadhyā na dṛṣṭā hi rājaśāstreṣu rākṣasa
GE09ram_05_u:4902: 5.056.128c rākṣasān etad evādya lāṅgūlaṃ dahyatām iti
GE09ram_05_u:4903: 5.056.129a tatas tasya vacaḥ śrutvā mama pucchaṃ samantataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4904: 5.056.129c veṣṭitaṃ śaṇavalkaiś ca paṭaiḥ kārpāsakais tathā
GE09ram_05_u:4906: 5.056.130c tad ādīpyanta me pucchaṃ hanantaḥ kāṣṭhamuṣṭibhiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4907: 5.056.131a baddhasya bahubhiḥ pāśair yantritasya ca rākṣasaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4908: 5.056.131c na me pīḍā bhavet kā cid didṛkṣor nagarīṃ divā
GE09ram_05_u:4909: 5.056.132a tatas te rākṣasāḥ śūrā baddhaṃ mām agnisaṃvṛtam
GE09ram_05_u:4911: 5.056.133a tato 'haṃ sumahad rūpaṃ saṃkṣipya punar ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4912: 5.056.133c vimocayitvā taṃ bandhaṃ prakṛtiṣṭhaḥ sthitaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4913: 5.056.134a āyasaṃ parighaṃ gṛhya tāni rakṣāṃsy asūdayam
GE09ram_05_u:4915: 5.056.135a pucchena ca pradīptena tāṃ purīṃ sāṭṭagopurām
GE09ram_05_u:4916: 5.056.135c dahāmy aham asaṃbhrānto yugāntāgnir iva prajāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4917: 5.056.136a dagdhvā laṅkāṃ punaś caiva śaṅkā mām abhyavartata
GE09ram_05_u:4918: 5.056.136c dahatā ca mayā laṅkāṃ daghdā sītā na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4921: 5.056.138a tato me buddhir utpannā śrutvā tām adbhutāṃ giram
GE09ram_05_u:4922: 5.056.138c punar dṛṣṭā ca vaidehī visṛṣṭaś ca tayā punaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4924: 5.056.139c sugrīvasya ca kāryārthaṃ mayā sarvam anuṣṭhitam
GE09ram_05_u:4925: 5.056.140a etat sarvaṃ mayā tatra yathāvad upapāditam
GE09ram_05_u:4926: 5.056.140c atra yan na kṛtaṃ śeṣaṃ tat sarvaṃ kriyatām iti
GE09ram_05_u:4927: 5.057.001a etad ākhyānaṃ tat sarvaṃ hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4930: 5.057.002c śīlam āsādya sītāyā mama ca plavanaṃ mahat
GE09ram_05_u:4932: 5.057.003c tapasā dhārayel lokān kruddhā vā nirdahed api
GE09ram_05_u:4934: 5.057.004c yasya tāṃ spṛśato gātraṃ tapasā na vināśitam
GE09ram_05_u:4935: 5.057.005a na tad agniśikhā kuryāt saṃspṛṣṭā pāṇinā satī
GE09ram_05_u:4942: 5.057.008c pativratā ca suśroṇī avaṣṭabdhā ca jānakī
GE09ram_05_u:4943: 5.057.009a anuraktā hi vaidehī rāmaṃ sarvātmanā śubhā
GE09ram_05_u:4947: 5.057.011a sā mayā rākṣasī madhye tarjyamānā muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4948: 5.057.011c rākṣasībhir virūpābhir dṛṣṭā hi pramadā vane
GE09ram_05_u:4953: 5.057.014a tataḥ saṃbhāṣitā caiva sarvam arthaṃ ca darśitā
GE09ram_05_u:4956: 5.057.016a yan na hanti daśagrīvaṃ sa mahātmā daśānanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4957: 5.057.016c nimittamātraṃ rāmas tu vadhe tasya bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:4959: 5.057.017c yad atra pratikartavyaṃ tat sarvam upapādyatām
GE09ram_05_u:4962: 5.058.002a asminn evaṃgate kārye bhavatāṃ ca nivedite
GE09ram_05_u:4963: 5.058.002c nyāyyaṃ sma saha vaidehyā draṣṭuṃ tau pārthivātmajau
GE09ram_05_u:4965: 5.058.003c tāṃ laṅkāṃ tarasā hantuṃ rāvaṇaṃ ca mahābalam
GE09ram_05_u:4966: 5.058.004a kiṃ punaḥ sahito vīrair balavadbhiḥ kṛtātmabhiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4968: 5.058.005a ahaṃ tu rāvaṇaṃ yuddhe sasainyaṃ sapuraḥsaram
GE09ram_05_u:4970: 5.058.006a brāhmam aindraṃ ca raudraṃ ca vāyavyaṃ vāruṇaṃ tathā
GE09ram_05_u:4973: 5.058.007a bhavatām abhyanujñāto vikramo me ruṇaddhi tam
GE09ram_05_u:4975: 5.058.008c devān api raṇe hanyāt kiṃ punas tān niśācarān
GE09ram_05_u:4976: 5.058.009a sāgaro 'py atiyād velāṃ mandaraḥ pracaled api
GE09ram_05_u:4979: 5.058.010c alam eko vināśāya vīro vāyusutaḥ kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4981: 5.058.011c mandaro 'py avaśīryeta kiṃ punar yudhi rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4988: 5.058.015a varotsekena mattau ca pramathya mahatīṃ camūm
GE09ram_05_u:4991: 5.058.016c laṅkāṃ nāśayituṃ śaktau sarve tiṣṭhantu vānarāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4992: 5.058.017a ayuktaṃ tu vinā devīṃ dṛṣṭabadbhiḥ plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:4994: 5.058.018a dṛṣṭā devī na cānītā iti tatra nivedanam
GE09ram_05_u:4996: 5.058.019a na hi vaḥ plavate kaś cin nāpi kaś cit parākrame
GE09ram_05_u:4999: 5.058.020c kim anyad atra kartavyaṃ gṛhītvā yāma jānakīm
GE09ram_05_u:5002: 5.058.022a na tāvad eṣā matir akṣamā no;
GE09ram_05_u:5014: 5.059.005a rāghave cārthanirvṛttiṃ bhartuś ca paramaṃ yaśaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5018: 5.059.007a plavamānāḥ kham āplutya tatas te kānanaukṣakaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5022: 5.059.009a yad rakṣati mahāvīryaḥ sadā dadhimukhaḥ kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5024: 5.059.010a te tad vanam upāgamya babhūvuḥ paramotkaṭāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5026: 5.059.011a tatas te vānarā hṛṣṭā dṛṣṭvā madhuvanaṃ mahat
GE09ram_05_u:5028: 5.059.012a tataḥ kumāras tān vṛddhāñ jāmbavatpramukhān kapīn
GE09ram_05_u:5031: 5.059.013c muditāś ca tatas te ca pranṛtyanti tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5032: 5.059.014a gāyanti ke cit praṇamanti ke cin;
GE09ram_05_u:5033: nṛtyanti ke cit prahasanti ke cit
GE09ram_05_u:5034: 5.059.014c patanti ke cid vicaranti ke cit;
GE09ram_05_u:5035: plavanti ke cit pralapanti ke cit
GE09ram_05_u:5048: 5.059.017e na cātra kaś cin na babhūva matto;
GE09ram_05_u:5049: na cātra kaś cin na babhūva tṛpto
GE09ram_05_u:5075: 5.060.003c akāryam api kartavyaṃ kim aṅga punar īdṛśam
GE09ram_05_u:5077: 5.060.004c sādhu sādhv iti saṃhṛṣṭā vānarāḥ pratyapūjayan
GE09ram_05_u:5079: 5.060.005c jagmur madhuvanaṃ yatra nadīvega iva drutam
GE09ram_05_u:5080: 5.060.006a te prahṛṣṭā madhuvanaṃ pālān ākramya vīryataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5081: 5.060.006c atisargāc ca paṭavo dṛṣṭvā śrutvā ca maithilīm
GE09ram_05_u:5082: 5.060.007a utpatya ca tataḥ sarve vanapālān samāgatāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5083: 5.060.007c tāḍayanti sma śataśaḥ saktān madhuvane tadā
GE09ram_05_u:5085: 5.060.008c ghnanti sma sahitāḥ sarve bhakṣayanti tathāpare
GE09ram_05_u:5087: 5.060.009c madhūcciṣṭena ke cic ca jaghnur anyonyam utkaṭāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5089: 5.060.010c atyarthaṃ ca madaglānāḥ parṇāny āstīrya śerate
GE09ram_05_u:5091: 5.060.011c kṣipanty api tathānyonyaṃ skhalanty api tathāpare
GE09ram_05_u:5092: 5.060.012a ke cit kṣveḍān prakurvanti ke cit kūjanti hṛṣṭavat
GE09ram_05_u:5093: 5.060.012c harayo madhunā mattāḥ ke cit suptā mahītale
GE09ram_05_u:5094: 5.060.013a ye 'py atra madhupālāḥ syuḥ preṣyā dadhimukhasya tu
GE09ram_05_u:5095: 5.060.013c te 'pi tair vānarair bhīmaiḥ pratiṣiddhā diśo gatāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5096: 5.060.014a jānubhiś ca prakṛṣṭāś ca devamārgaṃ ca darśitāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5099: 5.060.015c vayaṃ ca jānubhiḥ kṛṣṭā devamārgaṃ ca darśitāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5100: 5.060.016a tato dadhimukhaḥ kruddho vanapas tatra vānaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5101: 5.060.016c hataṃ madhuvanaṃ śrutvā sāntvayām āsa tān harīn
GE09ram_05_u:5105: 5.060.018c punar vīrā madhuvanaṃ tenaiva sahitā yayuḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5107: 5.060.019c samabhyadhāvad vegenā te ca sarve plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5108: 5.060.020a te śilāḥ pādapāṃś cāpi pāṣāṇāṃś cāpi vānarāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5110: 5.060.021a te svāmivacanaṃ vīrā hṛdayeṣv avasajya tat
GE09ram_05_u:5112: 5.060.022a vṛkṣasthāṃś ca talasthāṃś ca vānarān baladarpitān
GE09ram_05_u:5113: 5.060.022c abhyakrāmanta te vīrāḥ pālās tatra sahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5118: 5.060.025a madāndhaś a na vedainam āryako 'yaṃ mameti saḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5122: 5.060.027a sa kathaṃ cid vimuktas tair vānarair vānararṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5124: 5.060.028a ete tiṣṭhantu gacchāmo bhartā no yatra vānaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5128: 5.060.030a iṣṭaṃ madhuvanaṃ hy etat sugrīvasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5130: 5.060.031a sa vānarān imān sarvān madhulubdhān gatāyuṣaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5132: 5.060.032a vadhyā hy ete durātmāno nṛpājñā paribhāvinaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5138: 5.060.035a rāmaṃ ca lakṣmaṇaṃ caiva dṛṣṭvā sugrīvam eva ca
GE09ram_05_u:5140: 5.060.036a sa nipatya mahāvīryaḥ sarvais taiḥ parivāritaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5142: 5.060.037a sa dīnavadano bhūtvā kṛtvā śirasi cāñjalim
GE09ram_05_u:5146: 5.061.002a uttiṣṭhottiṣṭha kasmāt tvaṃ pādayoḥ patito mama
GE09ram_05_u:5147: 5.061.002c abhayaṃ te bhaved vīra satyam evābhidhīyatām
GE09ram_05_u:5148: 5.061.003a sa tu viśvāsitas tena sugrīveṇa mahātmanā
GE09ram_05_u:5150: 5.061.004a naivarkṣarajasā rājan na tvayā nāpi vālinā
GE09ram_05_u:5151: 5.061.004c vanaṃ nisṛṣṭapūrvaṃ hi bhakṣitaṃ tat tu vānaraiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5155: 5.061.006c nivāryamāṇās te sarve bhruvau vai darśayanti hi
GE09ram_05_u:5156: 5.061.007a ime hi saṃrabdhatarās tathā taiḥ saṃpradharṣitāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5158: 5.061.008a tatas tair bahubhir vīrair vānarair vānararṣabhāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5160: 5.061.009a pāṇibhir nihatāḥ ke cit ke cij jānubhir āhatāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5161: 5.061.009c prakṛṣṭāś ca yathākāmaṃ devamārgaṃ ca darśitāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5162: 5.061.010a evam ete hatāḥ śūrās tvayi tiṣṭhati bhartari
GE09ram_05_u:5163: 5.061.010c kṛtsnaṃ madhuvanaṃ caiva prakāmaṃ taiḥ prabhakṣyate
GE09ram_05_u:5166: 5.061.012a kim ayaṃ vānaro rājan vanapaḥ pratyupasthitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5167: 5.061.012c kaṃ cārtham abhinirdiśya duḥkhito vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:5168: 5.061.013a evam uktas tu sugrīvo lakṣmaṇena mahātmanā
GE09ram_05_u:5170: 5.061.014a ārya lakṣmaṇa saṃprāha vīro dadhimukhaḥ kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5173: 5.061.015c vanaṃ yathābhipannaṃ taiḥ sādhitaṃ karma vānaraiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5174: 5.061.016a dṛṣṭā devī na saṃdeho na cānyena hanūmatā
GE09ram_05_u:5175: 5.061.016c na hy anyaḥ sādhane hetuḥ karmaṇo 'sya hanūmataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5177: 5.061.017c vyavasāyaś ca vīryaṃ ca śrutaṃ cāpi pratiṣṭhitam
GE09ram_05_u:5178: 5.061.018a jāmbavān yatra netā syād aṅgadasya baleśvaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5179: 5.061.018c hanūmāṃś cāpy adhiṣṭhātā na tasya gatir anyathā
GE09ram_05_u:5182: 5.061.020a āgataiś ca praviṣṭaṃ tad yathā madhuvanaṃ hi taiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5183: 5.061.020c dharṣitaṃ ca vanaṃ kṛtsnam upayuktaṃ ca vānaraiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5184: 5.061.020e vāritāḥ sahitāḥ pālās tathā jānubhir āhatāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5185: 5.061.021a etadartham ayaṃ prāpto vaktuṃ madhuravāg iha
GE09ram_05_u:5187: 5.061.022a dṛṣṭā sītā mahābāho saumitre paśya tattvataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5188: 5.061.022c abhigamya yathā sarve pibanti madhu vānarāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5189: 5.061.023a na cāpy adṛṣṭvā vaidehīṃ viśrutāḥ puruṣarṣabha
GE09ram_05_u:5190: 5.061.023c vanaṃ dātta varaṃ divyaṃ dharṣayeyur vanaukasaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5193: 5.061.025a prāhṛṣyata bhṛśaṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇaś ca mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5194: 5.061.025c śrutvā dadhimukhasyedaṃ sugrīvas tu prahṛṣya ca
GE09ram_05_u:5196: 5.061.026a prīto 'smi saumya yad bhuktaṃ vanaṃ taiḥ kṛtakarmabhiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5202: 5.062.001a sugrīveṇaivam uktas tu hṛṣṭo dadhimukhaḥ kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5204: 5.062.002a sa praṇamya ca sugrīvaṃ rāghavau ca mahābalau
GE09ram_05_u:5205: 5.062.002c vānaraiḥ sahitaiḥ śūrair divam evotpapāta ha
GE09ram_05_u:5206: 5.062.003a sa yathaivāgataḥ pūrvaṃ tathaiva tvarito gataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5207: 5.062.003c nipatya gaganād bhūmau tad vanaṃ praviveśa ha
GE09ram_05_u:5210: 5.062.005a sa tān upāgamad vīro baddhvā karapuṭāñjalim
GE09ram_05_u:5211: 5.062.005c uvāca vacanaṃ ślakṣṇam idaṃ hṛṣṭavad aṅgadam
GE09ram_05_u:5212: 5.062.006a saumya roṣo na kartavyo yad ebhir abhivāritaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5214: 5.062.007a yuvarājas tvam īśaś ca vanasyāsya mahābala
GE09ram_05_u:5215: 5.062.007c maurkhyāt pūrvaṃ kṛto doṣas tad bhavān kṣantum arhati
GE09ram_05_u:5216: 5.062.008a yathaiva hi pitā te 'bhūt pūrvaṃ harigaṇeśvaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5217: 5.062.008c tathā tvam api sugrīvo nānyas tu harisattama
GE09ram_05_u:5218: 5.062.009a ākhyātaṃ hi mayā gatvā pitṛvyasya tavānagha
GE09ram_05_u:5221: 5.062.010c prahṛṣṭo na tu ruṣṭo 'sau vanaṃ śrutvā pradharṣitam
GE09ram_05_u:5222: 5.062.011a prahṛṣṭo māṃ pitṛvyas te sugrīvo vānareśvaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5223: 5.062.011c śīghraṃ preṣaya sarvāṃs tān iti hovāca pārthivaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5227: 5.062.013c tat kṣamaṃ neha naḥ sthātuṃ kṛte kārye paraṃtapāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5229: 5.062.014c kiṃ śeṣaṃ gamanaṃ tatra sugrīvo yatra me guruḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5230: 5.062.015a sarve yathā māṃ vakṣyanti sametya hariyūthapāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5231: 5.062.015c tathāsmi kartā kartavye bhavadbhiḥ paravān aham
GE09ram_05_u:5234: 5.062.017a bruvataś cāṅgadaś caivaṃ śrutvā vacanam avyayam
GE09ram_05_u:5236: 5.062.018a evaṃ vakṣyati ko rājan prabhuḥ san vānararṣabha
GE09ram_05_u:5238: 5.062.019a tava cedaṃ susadṛśaṃ vākyaṃ nānyasya kasya cit
GE09ram_05_u:5240: 5.062.020a sarve vayam api prāptās tatra gantuṃ kṛtakṣaṇāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5241: 5.062.020c sa yatra harivīrāṇāṃ sugrīvaḥ patir avyayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5242: 5.062.021a tvayā hy anuktair haribhir naiva śakyaṃ padāt padam
GE09ram_05_u:5243: 5.062.021c kva cid gantuṃ hariśreṣṭha brūmaḥ satyam idaṃ tu te
GE09ram_05_u:5244: 5.062.022a evaṃ tu vadatāṃ teṣām aṅgadaḥ pratyabhāṣata
GE09ram_05_u:5245: 5.062.022c bāḍhaṃ gacchāma ity uktvā utpapāta mahītalāt
GE09ram_05_u:5252: 5.062.026a samāśvasihi bhadraṃ te dṛṣṭā devī na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5253: 5.062.026c nāgantum iha śakyaṃ tair atīte samaye hi naḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5254: 5.062.027a na matsakāśam āgacchet kṛtye hi vinipātite
GE09ram_05_u:5256: 5.062.028a yady apy akṛtakṛtyānām īdṛśaḥ syād upakramaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5259: 5.062.029c na me madhuvanaṃ hanyād ahṛṣṭaḥ plavageśvaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5261: 5.062.030c dṛṣṭā devī na saṃdeho na cānyena hanūmatā
GE09ram_05_u:5262: 5.062.030e na hy anyaḥ karmaṇo hetuḥ sādhane tadvidho bhavet
GE09ram_05_u:5263: 5.062.031a hanūmati hi siddhiś ca matiś ca matisattama
GE09ram_05_u:5264: 5.062.031c vyavasāyaś ca vīryaṃ ca sūrye teja iva dhruvam
GE09ram_05_u:5265: 5.062.032a jāmbavān yatra netā syād aṅgadaś ca baleśvaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5266: 5.062.032c hanūmāṃś cāpy adhiṣṭhātā na tasya gatir anyathā
GE09ram_05_u:5267: 5.062.033a mā bhūś cintā samāyuktaḥ saṃpraty amitavikrama
GE09ram_05_u:5268: 5.062.034a tataḥ kila kilā śabdaṃ śuśrāvāsannam ambare
GE09ram_05_u:5271: 5.062.035a tataḥ śrutvā ninādaṃ taṃ kapīnāṃ kapisattamaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5274: 5.062.036c aṅgadaṃ purataḥ kṛtvā hanūmantaṃ ca vānaram
GE09ram_05_u:5277: 5.062.038a hanūmāṃś ca mahābahuḥ praṇamya śirasā tataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5283: 5.063.001a tataḥ prasravaṇaṃ śailaṃ te gatvā citrakānanam
GE09ram_05_u:5284: 5.063.001c praṇamya śirasā rāmaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahābalam
GE09ram_05_u:5288: 5.063.003c rāme samanurāgaṃ ca yaś cāpi samayaḥ kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5289: 5.063.004a etad ākhyānti te sarve harayo rāma saṃnidhau
GE09ram_05_u:5290: 5.063.004c vaidehīm akṣatāṃ śrutvā rāmas tūttaram abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:5291: 5.063.005a kva sītā vartate devī kathaṃ ca mayi vartate
GE09ram_05_u:5292: 5.063.005c etan me sarvam ākhyāta vaidehīṃ prati vānarāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5295: 5.063.007a śrutvā tu vacanaṃ teṣāṃ hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5296: 5.063.007c uvāca vākyaṃ vākyajñaḥ sītāyā darśanaṃ yathā
GE09ram_05_u:5301: 5.063.010a tatra dṛṣṭā mayā sītā rāvaṇāntaḥpure satī
GE09ram_05_u:5302: 5.063.010c saṃnyasya tvayi jīvantī rāmā rāma manoratham
GE09ram_05_u:5303: 5.063.011a dṛṣṭā me rākṣasī madhye tarjyamānā muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5310: 5.063.014c devī kathaṃ cit kākutstha tvanmanā mārgitā mayā
GE09ram_05_u:5313: 5.063.016a tataḥ saṃbhāṣitā devī sarvam arthaṃ ca darśitā
GE09ram_05_u:5315: 5.063.017a niyataḥ samudācāro bhaktiś cāsyās tathā tvayi
GE09ram_05_u:5318: 5.063.018a abhijñānaṃ ca me dattaṃ yathāvṛttaṃ tavāntike
GE09ram_05_u:5320: 5.063.019a vijñāpyaś ca nara vyāghro rāmo vāyusuta tvayā
GE09ram_05_u:5321: 5.063.019c akhileneha yad dṛṣṭam iti mām āha jānakī
GE09ram_05_u:5324: 5.063.021a eṣa cūḍāmaṇiḥ śrīmān mayā te yatnarakṣitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5326: 5.063.022a eṣa niryātitaḥ śrīmān mayā te vārisaṃbhavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5327: 5.063.022c etaṃ dṛṣṭvā pramodiṣye vyasane tvām ivānagha
GE09ram_05_u:5329: 5.063.023c ūrdhvaṃ māsān na jīveyaṃ rakṣasāṃ vaśam āgatā
GE09ram_05_u:5330: 5.063.024a iti mām abravīt sītā kṛśāṅgī dharma cāriṇī
GE09ram_05_u:5332: 5.063.025a etad eva mayākhyātaṃ sarvaṃ rāghava yad yathā
GE09ram_05_u:5339: 5.064.001c taṃ maṇiṃ hṛdaye kṛtvā praruroda salakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5340: 5.064.002a taṃ tu dṛṣṭvā maṇiśreṣṭhaṃ rāghavaḥ śokakarśitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5342: 5.064.003a yathaiva dhenuḥ sravati snehād vatsasya vatsalā
GE09ram_05_u:5344: 5.064.004a maṇiratnam idaṃ dattaṃ vaidehyāḥ śvaśureṇa me
GE09ram_05_u:5345: 5.064.004c vadhūkāle yathā baddham adhikaṃ mūrdhni śobhate
GE09ram_05_u:5348: 5.064.006a imaṃ dṛṣṭvā maṇiśreṣṭhaṃ tathā tātasya darśanam
GE09ram_05_u:5349: 5.064.006c adyāsmy avagataḥ saumya vaidehasya tathā vibhoḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5350: 5.064.007a ayaṃ hi śobhate tasyāḥ priyāyā mūrdhni me maṇiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5351: 5.064.007c adyāsya darśanenāhaṃ prāptāṃ tām iva cintaye
GE09ram_05_u:5352: 5.064.008a kim āha sītā vaidehī brūhi saumya punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5354: 5.064.009a itas tu kiṃ duḥkhataraṃ yad imaṃ vārisaṃbhavam
GE09ram_05_u:5355: 5.064.009c maṇiṃ paśyāmi saumitre vaidehīm āgataṃ vinā
GE09ram_05_u:5356: 5.064.010a ciraṃ jīvati vaidehī yadi māsaṃ dhariṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:5357: 5.064.010c kṣaṇaṃ saumya na jīveyaṃ vinā tām asitekṣaṇām
GE09ram_05_u:5358: 5.064.011a naya mām api taṃ deśaṃ yatra dṛṣṭā mama priyā
GE09ram_05_u:5359: 5.064.011c na tiṣṭheyaṃ kṣaṇam api pravṛttim upalabhya ca
GE09ram_05_u:5360: 5.064.012a kathaṃ sā mama suśroṇi bhīru bhīruḥ satī tadā
GE09ram_05_u:5363: 5.064.013c āvṛtaṃ vadanaṃ tasyā na virājati rākṣasaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5364: 5.064.014a kim āha sītā hanumaṃs tattvataḥ kathayasva me
GE09ram_05_u:5366: 5.064.015a madhurā madhurālāpā kim āha mama bhāminī
GE09ram_05_u:5368: 5.064.015e duḥkhād duḥkhataraṃ prāpya kathaṃ jīvati jānakī
GE09ram_05_u:5369: 5.065.001a evam uktas tu hanumān rāghaveṇa mahātmanā
GE09ram_05_u:5373: 5.065.003a sukhasuptā tvayā sārdhaṃ jānakī pūrvam utthitā
GE09ram_05_u:5375: 5.065.004a paryāyeṇa ca suptas tvaṃ devyaṅke bharatāgraja
GE09ram_05_u:5376: 5.065.004c punaś ca kila pakṣī sa devyā janayati vyathām
GE09ram_05_u:5377: 5.065.005a tataḥ punar upāgamya virarāda bhṛśaṃ kila
GE09ram_05_u:5378: 5.065.005c tatas tvaṃ bodhitas tasyāḥ śoṇitena samukṣitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5380: 5.065.006c bodhitaḥ kila devyās tvaṃ sukhasuptaḥ paraṃtapa
GE09ram_05_u:5381: 5.065.007a tāṃ tu dṛṣṭvā mahābāho rāditāṃ ca stanāntare
GE09ram_05_u:5383: 5.065.008a nakhāgraiḥ kena te bhīru dāritaṃ tu stanāntaram
GE09ram_05_u:5386: 5.065.009c nakhaiḥ sarudhirais tīkṣṇair mām evābhimukhaṃ sthitam
GE09ram_05_u:5387: 5.065.010a sutaḥ kila sa śakrasya vāyasaḥ patatāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5390: 5.065.011c vāyase tvaṃ kṛtvāḥ krūrāṃ matiṃ matimatāṃ vara
GE09ram_05_u:5391: 5.065.012a sa darbhaṃ saṃstarād gṛhya brahmāstreṇa nyayojayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5392: 5.065.012c sa dīpta iva kālāgnir jajvālābhimukhaḥ khagam
GE09ram_05_u:5393: 5.065.013a sa tvaṃ pradīptaṃ cikṣepa darbhaṃ taṃ vāyasaṃ prati
GE09ram_05_u:5394: 5.065.013c tatas tu vāyasaṃ dīptaḥ sa darbho 'nujagāma ha
GE09ram_05_u:5395: 5.065.014a sa pitrā ca parityaktaḥ suraiḥ sarvair maharṣibhiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5397: 5.065.015a taṃ tvaṃ nipatitaṃ bhūmau śaraṇyaḥ śaraṇāgatam
GE09ram_05_u:5399: 5.065.016a mogham astraṃ na śakyaṃ tu kartum ity eva rāghava
GE09ram_05_u:5400: 5.065.016c tatas tasyākṣikākasya hinasti sma sa dakṣiṇam
GE09ram_05_u:5401: 5.065.017a rāma tvāṃ sa namaskṛtvā rājño daśarathasya ca
GE09ram_05_u:5402: 5.065.017c visṛṣṭas tu tadā kākaḥ pratipede kham ālayam
GE09ram_05_u:5403: 5.065.018a evam astravidāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ sattvavāñ śīlavān api
GE09ram_05_u:5404: 5.065.018c kimartham astraṃ rakṣaḥsu na yojayasi rāghava
GE09ram_05_u:5405: 5.065.019a na nāgā nāpi gandharvā nāsurā na marudgaṇāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5406: 5.065.019c tava rāma mukhe sthātuṃ śaktāḥ pratisamādhitum
GE09ram_05_u:5407: 5.065.020a tava vīryavataḥ kaccin mayi yady asti saṃbhramaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5408: 5.065.020c kṣipraṃ suniśitair bāṇair hanyatāṃ yudhi rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5409: 5.065.021a bhrātur ādeśam ādāya lakṣmaṇo vā paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5410: 5.065.021c sa kimarthaṃ naravaro na māṃ rakṣati rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5412: 5.065.022c surāṇām api durdharṣau kimarthaṃ mām upekṣataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5413: 5.065.023a mamaiva duṣkṛtaṃ kiṃ cin mahad asti na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5414: 5.065.023c samarthau sahitau yan māṃ nāpekṣete paraṃtapau
GE09ram_05_u:5416: 5.065.024c punar apy aham āryāṃ tām idaṃ vacanam abruvam
GE09ram_05_u:5417: 5.065.025a tvacchokavimukho rāmo devi satyena te śape
GE09ram_05_u:5419: 5.065.026a kathaṃ cid bhavatī dṛṣṭā na kālaḥ pariśocitum
GE09ram_05_u:5420: 5.065.026c imaṃ muhūrtaṃ duḥkhānām antaṃ drakṣyasi bhāmini
GE09ram_05_u:5423: 5.065.028a hatvā ca samare raudraṃ rāvaṇaṃ saha bāndhavam
GE09ram_05_u:5424: 5.065.028c rāghavas tvāṃ mahābāhuḥ svāṃ purīṃ nayate dhruvam
GE09ram_05_u:5425: 5.065.029a yat tu rāmo vijānīyād abhijñānam anindite
GE09ram_05_u:5428: 5.065.030c muktvā vastrād dadau mahyaṃ maṇim etaṃ mahābala
GE09ram_05_u:5429: 5.065.031a pratigṛhya maṇiṃ divyaṃ tava heto raghūttama
GE09ram_05_u:5432: 5.065.032c vivardhamānaṃ ca hi mām uvāca janakātmajā
GE09ram_05_u:5435: 5.065.033c sugrīvaṃ ca sahāmātyaṃ sarvān brūyā anāmayam
GE09ram_05_u:5436: 5.065.034a yathā ca sa mahābāhur māṃ tārayati rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5444: 5.065.036c etac ca buddhvā gaditaṃ mayā tvaṃ;
GE09ram_05_u:5446: 5.066.001a athāham uttaraṃ devyā punar uktaḥ sasaṃbhramam
GE09ram_05_u:5447: 5.066.001c tava snehān naravyāghra sauhāryād anumānya ca
GE09ram_05_u:5448: 5.066.002a evaṃ bahuvidhaṃ vācyo rāmo dāśarathis tvayā
GE09ram_05_u:5449: 5.066.002c yathā mām āpnuyāc chīghraṃ hatvā rāvaṇam āhave
GE09ram_05_u:5450: 5.066.003a yadi vā manyase vīra vasaikāham ariṃdama
GE09ram_05_u:5451: 5.066.003c kasmiṃś cit saṃvṛte deśe viśrāntaḥ śvo gamiṣyasi
GE09ram_05_u:5452: 5.066.004a mama cāpy alpabhāgyāyāḥ sāmnidhyāt tava vānara
GE09ram_05_u:5454: 5.066.005a gate hi tvayi vikrānte punarāgamanāya vai
GE09ram_05_u:5455: 5.066.005c prāṇānām api saṃdeho mama syān nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5460: 5.066.008a kathaṃ nu khalu duṣpāraṃ tariṣyanti mahodadhim
GE09ram_05_u:5463: 5.066.009c śaktiḥ syād vainateyasya vāyor vā tava vānagha
GE09ram_05_u:5465: 5.066.010c kiṃ paśyasi samādhānaṃ brūhi kāryavidāṃ vara
GE09ram_05_u:5466: 5.066.011a kāmam asya tvam evaikaḥ kāryasya parisādhane
GE09ram_05_u:5468: 5.066.012a balaiḥ samagrair yadi māṃ hatvā rāvaṇam āhave
GE09ram_05_u:5469: 5.066.012c vijayī svāṃ purīṃ rāmo nayet tat syād yaśaskaram
GE09ram_05_u:5470: 5.066.013a yathāhaṃ tasya vīrasya vanād upadhinā hṛtā
GE09ram_05_u:5471: 5.066.013c rakṣasā tad bhayād eva tathā nārhati rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5472: 5.066.014a balais tu saṃkulāṃ kṛtvā laṅkāṃ parabalārdanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5473: 5.066.014c māṃ nayed yadi kākutsthas tat tasya sadṛśaṃ bhavet
GE09ram_05_u:5474: 5.066.015a tad yathā tasya vikrāntam anurūpaṃ mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5477: 5.066.016c niśamyāhaṃ tataḥ śeṣaṃ vākyam uttaram abruvam
GE09ram_05_u:5482: 5.066.019a yeṣāṃ nopari nādhastān na tiryak sajjate gatiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5483: 5.066.019c na ca karmasu sīdanti mahatsv amitatejasaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5486: 5.066.021a madviśiṣṭāś ca tulyāś ca santi tatra vanaukasaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5487: 5.066.021c mattaḥ pratyavaraḥ kaś cin nāsti sugrīvasaṃnidhau
GE09ram_05_u:5488: 5.066.022a ahaṃ tāvad iha prāptaḥ kiṃ punas te mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5489: 5.066.022c na hi prakṛṣṭāḥ preṣyante preṣyante hītare janāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:5490: 5.066.023a tad alaṃ paritāpena devi manyur vyapaitu te
GE09ram_05_u:5492: 5.066.024a mama pṛṣṭhagatau tau ca candrasūryāv ivoditau
GE09ram_05_u:5495: 5.066.025c lakṣmaṇaṃ ca dhanuṣpāṇiṃ laṅkā dvāram upasthitam
